'dug go /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag de nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe/ gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas gtso cher tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'ong ba la sdod do/ /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na/ chu klung dbyar bzang ldan brgal ba dang / chu rlabs chen po byung ba des de'i snam sbyar gshar bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung

chen po snam sbyar de/ 'tshir ba dang / 'ding ba dang / skem pa na yun ring du thogs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos snam sbyar de/ btsir cing bting ste bskams nas gso sbyong gi gnas

ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa

'od srung chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas gtso cher tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la sdod cing 'khod

na| 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po phyis par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /'di na bdag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na/ chu klung dbyar bzang ldan brgal ba dang chu rlabs chen po byung ba
des| bdag gi snam sbyar gsher bar gyur nas bdag snam sbyar 'tshir ba dang / 'ding ba dang / skem pa na yun ring zhig thogs par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /da ltar
bdag dge slong 'od srung chen po rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa lags la/ bdag gi snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs na/ bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i skabs
de| dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis dge slong 'od srung chen po/ rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur
pa dang / gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin cig /'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig
gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dkyil 'khor par dge slong bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong 'od srung gis bla
gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rim bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod
par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa lags la/ bdag gi snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rdo
mi thogs nas bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa/ dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis
thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la/ snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du
bzlas/ de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'od srung 'di/ rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa lags la/ 'di'i snam
sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/ dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa 'di/ dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/ gal te
dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i
gnang ba stsol to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'od srung 'di/ rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la gsal/ 'di'i snam sbyar
ni| lci bas yongs su skyong par rngo mi thogs nas/ dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa 'di/ dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge
'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong 'od
srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang zag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/
dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi
gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis dge slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin par gyur na/ des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang

bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dug cing mthun par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams
la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /da ltar bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags na/ bdag gi snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs na/ bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i
skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can dang / gzhan yang de lta bu/
gang yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin cig /'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag
par bsgo nas/ dkyil 'khor par dge slong bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong shA ri'i bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rim bzhin
du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags la/ bdag gi snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/ bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral
bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong
shA ri'i bu 'di/ rlung nad can lags la/ 'di'i snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/ dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di/ dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar
mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu
rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di
rlung nad can lags la/ 'di'i snam sbyar ni/ lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thogs nas/ dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di/ dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang

ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la
snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge
'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis dge
slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin par gyur na/ des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod
par mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang / phri ba rnams dang / sbyangs
pa'i yon tan rnams dang / mdzes pa rnams dang / tshod shes pa rnams kyi yon tan brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa yin la/ 'di ni/
gnang ba yin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba rnams la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na/ gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las
chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /chos gos zin pas

sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni/ chos gos zin la sra brkyang ma phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos ma zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos zin cing sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang
ma phyung ba yang yod de/ snga ma bzhin du mu bzhir rgyas par sbyar ro/ /gal te nub gcig kyang zhes bya ba ni/ nub gcig gi mthar yang ngo / /chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang zhes

bya ba ni/ snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang / mthang gos las gang yang rung ba dang ngo / /mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/ /dge 'dun gyis
gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/ dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/
des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ bar sdom la/ khyim gcig pa dang khyim gnyis dang / /khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa dang / /rtsig pa

rib ma 'obs bskor dang / /rnam bzhir bya ba grong dang khyim/ /bsten 'gro mu stegs tshong rdal dang / /tshong khang dgra khang g.yul dang ni/ /g.yul tshoms gru dang shing rta dang / /shing ljon kun dga'i
ra ba yin/ /lam du 'gro sdod 'dug nyal dang / /thad kar yang ni de bzhin te/ /mtshams gzhan nyal ba tha ma yi/ /sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/ /khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong dang / khyim

gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong dang / khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i grong dang / rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong dang / rib mas bskor ba'i grong dang / 'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong dang / rnam pa bzhir bya ba grong

nye 'khor gcig pa dang / grong nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang / khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa
dang / khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / bsten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang / bsten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / bsten
'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / bsten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor gcig pa dang / mu stegs

can gyi khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / tshong rdal nye 'khor gcig pa

dang / tshong rdal nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / tshong khang nye 'khor gcig pa dang / tshong khang nye 'khor tha dad pa dang

tshong khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / tshong khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / dgra khang nye 'khor gcig pa dang / dgra khang nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / dgra khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa

dang / dgra khang rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / g.yul nye 'khor gcig pa dang / g.yul nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / g.yul rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / g.yul rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha

dad pa dang / g.yul gyi tshoms nye 'khor gcig pa dang / g.yul gyi tshoms nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad

pa dang / gru nye 'khor gcig pa dang / gru nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / gru rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / gru rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / shing rta nye 'khor gcig pa dang / shing rta nye 'khor
tha dad pa dang / shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / shing rta rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / shing ljon pa nye 'khor gcig pa dang / shing ljon pa nye
'khor tha dad pa dang / shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / kun dga' ra ba nye 'khor gcig pa dang / kun dga' ra ba nye 'khor
tha dad pa dang / kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa dang / kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa dang / lam du 'gro ba la sogs pa dang / thad kar 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
mtshams gzhan dag gi gnas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bye brag gis dge slong chos gos dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'bral ba'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i bye brag rgya cher ston to/ /de la khyim

gcig pa dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ri khrod pa rnams dang / bod rnams dang / kla klo rnams kyi grong ngo / /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang

du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang / rdo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /

dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do//

nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i

grong ji lta ba bzhin du khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong yang de bzhin no/ /khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong sgo sna tshogs nas kun nas gnas pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor

gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong rtsig pas bskor ba gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang

thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta smig ma can gyis khyab cing 'dug pa dang / bya gag spar nas 'dug pa'i bar de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis

nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye
'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /rib mas bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong rib mas bskor ba gang yin pa'o//
de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du ra lug bton pa dag gis rmig pas bslang ba'i rdul 'bab pa dang / mi rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha dang ldan pa bshang sar
'gro ba'i bar de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos

dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'obs
kyis bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong 'obs kyis bskor ba gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du skas gdang bu bcu gnyis
pas khyab cing 'dug pa dang / phyag dar bor ba'i bong ba rags pa 'dril ba'i bar de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na

ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/
spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /grong nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong gang na skyed mos tshal lam/ 'dun sa'am/ lha'i gnas gcig yod pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe
na| so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ lha'i gnas so/ /dge slong gis grong du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /lha'i gnas su

chos gos dag bzhag ste/ grong du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /grong ngam lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur

ro| |grong nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong gang na skyed mos tshal lam/ 'dun sa'am/ lha'i gnas rab tu mang po dag yod pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci
zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong gang dag na skyed mos tshal lam/ 'dun sa'am/ lha'i gnas gcig yod pa gang yin

pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ lha'i gnas so/ /dge slong gis grong du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung

ba med do/ /lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/ grong du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /grong ngam lha'i gnas su chos gos bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang

ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /grong rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong gang dag na skyed mos tshal lam/ 'dun sa 'am/ lha'i gnas rab tu mang po dag yod pa gang yin pa'o/ /

de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi khyim
gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang / rngo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa dang /

'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar
byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char

bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /khyim nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi khyim gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so
so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ sgo'o/ /dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ sgor skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du
skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /khyim rab tu mang po nye
'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi khyim rab tu mang po dag gang yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi

rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang / rngo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de
dag gi nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar

byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no//
bsten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi bsten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol

'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag gi gling bu 'jog par byed pa dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / su g+ho sha ka 'jog par byed pa dang / mong phang dang / phang lo 'jog

par byed pa dang / gang du rdung bar byed pa dang / rngo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de'i nye 'khor
yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs
'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsten 'gro'i khyim nye 'khor tha

dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi bsten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ rgyal
mtshan gyi shing ngo / /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi shing la skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/ /rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang
du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsten
'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi bsten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe

na| nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag gi gling bu 'jog par byed pa dang / rnga ba Ta ha dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / su g+ho sha ka 'jog

par byed pa dang / mong phang dang / phang lo 'jog par byed pa dang / gang du rdung bar byed pa dang / rngo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang /

khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de dag gi nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang

du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsten 'gro'i khyim rab tu

mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi bsten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /
ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /mu stegs can gyi khyim nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can gyi khyim lta ba gcig pa dang / bzod pa gcig pa dang / 'dod pa gcig
pa dang / bsam pa gcig pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag lci bdag 'ding bar byed pa dang / yam bsreg shing dag 'jog par
byed pa dang / g.yang gzhi dag dang / shing shun dag dang / dbyig gu dag dang / ril ba dag dang / blugs gzar dag dang / dgang gzar dag 'jog pa dang / me sbar bar byed pa dang / yam bsreg shing
dag sreg par byed pa dang / gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang / rdo bar byed pa dang / 'thag bar byed pa dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang /
khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de'i nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang
du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can gyi khyim

nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can gyi khyim lta ba tha dad pa dang / bzod pa tha dad pa dang / 'dod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/
so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ lha'i gnas so/ /dge slong gis mu stegs can gyi khyim du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba
med do/ /lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste/ mu stegs can gyi khyim du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /mu stegs can gyi khyim mam/ lha'i gnas su chos gos
dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can
gyi khyim rab tu mang po lta ba gcig pa dang / bzod pa gcig pa dang / 'dod pa gcig pa dang / bsam pa gcig pa gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol
'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag lci ba dag 'ding bar byed pa dang / yam sreg shing dag 'jog par byed pa dang / g.yang gzhi dag dang / shing shun dag dang / dbyig gu dag dang / ril ba dag dang / blugs

gzar dag dang / dgang gzar dag 'jog par byed pa dang / me sbar bar byed pa dang / yam sreg shing sreg par byed pa dang / gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang / rngo bar byed pa dang / 'thag par byed pa

dang / 'cha' bar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khye'u sus byed pa de ni/ de dag gi nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs
'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya

rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po lta ba tha dad pa

dang / bzod pa tha dad pa dang / 'dod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no//
tshong rdal nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgom bye ba dag gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang /

phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / tshong bar byed pa dang / bgrang bar byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / 'jog par byed pa de ni/ de'i nye
'khor yin no/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed
na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshong rdal nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di
lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ gzhag stegs so/ /dge slong gis
nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhag stegs su skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /gzhag stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang
ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam gzhag stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig
pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong rdal rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/

gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / tshong bar byed pa dang / bgrang bar byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / 'jog par byed pa de ni/ de dag gi nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong
gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang

ngam nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshong rdal rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa

dag gi'am/ spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong rdal rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /tshong khang nye 'khor

gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong khang gang dag yin pa'o/ /de'i nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag zong

'jog par byed pa dang / gro dag dang / nas dag dang / mon sran gre'u dag dang / sA lu dag dang / 'bras dag dang / til dag dang / 'bras thug po che dang / bu ram dag dang / bu ram dag dang / ras dag dang / ras bal
dag dang / skud pa dag dang / gos dag 'jog par byed pa dang / 'bru spungs par byed pa dang / bre'u chung dang / gle ba 'jog bar byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / rlung

so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ khron pa'o/ /dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ khron par skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba
med do/ /khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang
ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor gcig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi gcig gi'am/ spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po gang dag yin
pa'o| |de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ nang thams cad dang / phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/ gang du de dag me tog dag 'thu bar byed pa dang / skon pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang / phreng ba dag rgyud

par byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / tshong bar byed pa dang / bre'u chung dang / phul 'jog par byed pa de ni/ de dag gi nye 'khor yin no/ /dge slong gi nang du chos gos dag
bzhag ste/ nye 'khor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /nye 'khor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/ nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/ /nang ngam nye 'khor du chos
gos dag bzhag ste/ gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po nye 'khor tha dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi tha dad pa dag gi'am

spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun dga' ra ba rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/ /de dag gi nye 'khor gang zhe na/ so so tha dad pa'o/ /ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/ ci yang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis chos gos dag dge slong la gtad de/ mgron lam du mchi na/ btsun pa/ de'i nye 'khor gang lags/ nye bar 'khor/ ngas bram
ze gro bzhin skyes la a mra'i sdong po shin tu me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ga phun sum tshogs pa/ 'dom bdun gyis bar du chod pa'i a mra'i sdong po bdun po
gang dag yin pa de dag la 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod par bstan pa de ni/ dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i chos gos dag gi nye 'khor bzhin no/ /'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i nye 'khor
ni| 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go /thad kar 'gro ba'i nye 'khor yang / 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go /thad kar 'greng ba dang / nyal ba'i nye 'khor yang / 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go /btsun pa/
dge slong gis mtshams gzhan du mchis nas nyal bar bgyid na/ de'i chos gos dag gi nye 'khor gang lags/ nye bar 'khor/ ji tsam du chos gos kyi grwa lus dang ma bral ba tshun chad do/ /dge slong
gis chos gos spang bar gyur na/ de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis chos gos spang bar
gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur
na| de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral
bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de la ltung ba med do/ /de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing / so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed
dam/ chos gos sam/ dra ba'am/ phor bu'am/ ska rags sam/ dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /
las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'bral ba'i spang ba ste/ gnyis pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la gos mang ba nyid/ 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ dge slong gang yang rung bas
gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/ des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe/ 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go/ snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing / sngon po ji lta ba

bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong don nyung ngu dag/ ci'i phyir dge slong rnams gos mang ba nyid/ 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ dge slong gang yang rung bas gos

sngon po zhig rnyed na/ des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go/ snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing / sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /
dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni| mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed la gos mang

ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ dge slong gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/ des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe 'di 'dra rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe byed du gzhug go/ snyam du re bas de
'jog par byed cing / sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin du bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che
ba dang / chog mi shes pa dang / gso dka' ba dang / dgang dka' ba rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa brjod

cing / chog shes pa dang / gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / phri ba dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / mdzes pa nyid dang / drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs
pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyur na/ dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la
'dod na/ dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas gal te longs na/ myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /gal te mi langs la kha ma longs pa kha skong ba'i gos la re ba yod
na| dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de las 'das par 'jog na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /chos gos zin pas sra brkyang
phyung na zhes bya ba ni/ chos gos zin la sra brkyang ma phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos ma zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos zin cing sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/ chos gos ma zin cing
sra brkyang ma phyung ba yang yod de/ mu bzhir bcad pa snga ma bzhin no/ /dus ma yin pa'i gos shig ces bya ba la/ dge slong gi gos kyi dus ni/ gang yin/ dus ma yin pa ni/ gang yin zhe na/ sra brkyang
bting ba'i gnas na ni/ ston zla 'bring po'i nya nas dpyid zla ra ba'i nya'i bar gyi zla ba de dag ni/ gos kyis dus yin la/ de phan chad ni/ dus ma yin no/ /sra brkyang ma bting ba'i gnas na ni/ thams
cad dus ma yin no/ /rnyed la zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las so/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni/ gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdag gir bya'o/ /gal te longs

na zhes bya ba ni/ gal te chog na'o/ /myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi bsgyang ba kho nar byin gyis brlab tu rung bar byas te'o/ /kha ma longs pa kha skong ba'i zhes bya ba
ni| snam sbyar ram/ bla gos sam/ mthang gos kha ma longs pa kha skong ba'o/ /gos la re ba yod na zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong la mas bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am/ pha'am/ bu nu'am/ sring mo'am/
slob dpon nam/ mkhan pos bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am/ lo lnga'i dus ston gyi tshe'am/ lo drug gi dus ston gyi tshe'am/ gtsug phud 'breg pa'i dus ston gyi tshe'am/ dus ston chen po'i che
rnyed du re ba yod na'o/ /dge slong des gos de/ zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ zla ba gcig gi mtha' tshun chad du'o/ /de las 'das par 'jog na zhes bya ba ni/ de las thal bar
ro| |spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung
bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ bar sdom la/ dogs bcas dogs pa med pa dang / /nyams gyur grub par ma gyur dang / /rgyun chad gos lnga gos gnyis dang / /sbyar ba dang ni tshad rnams so/ /dge slong

gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/ des de byed du mi 'jug par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go/ snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing / des tshes
de nyid la gos sngon po dogs pa dang bcas pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya
ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang
ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes gsum mam/ tshes bcu tshun chad kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin
gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin

par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes bcu la ma rnyed kyang nyi ma bcu dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma nyi shu po de nyid kyi nang du byin
gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi

byed na/ nyi ma nyi shu ba'i skya rengs shar na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma nyi shu pa la ma rnyed kyang / nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin
gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin

par mi byed na/ nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin

no/ /dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/ des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur ba de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go/ snyam du re ba med pas de 'jog par
byed cing / des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po dogs pa med pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/
rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu
gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes bcu tshun chad dam/ nyi ma bcu dgu tshun chad dam/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad
kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtong bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis
rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gos sngon
po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/ des de phyed du mi 'jud par de gos la
re ba yod pas de 'jog par byed cing / de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de nyams par gyur/ 'gyang bar 'gyur/ nyam chung bar gyur cing / des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po gzhan zhig rnyed par
gyur na/ dge slong des nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/

gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ tshes bcu

tshun chad dam/ tshes bcu la ma rnyed kyang nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung
bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya rengs
shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig
rnyed nas/ des de byed du mi 'jud par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing / de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa grub par ma gyur/ rgyun chad par ma gyur par des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po gzhan zhig
rnyed par gyur na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi
byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis
sam/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na/ dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ /
gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma sum cu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i

ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/ des de byed
du mi 'jug par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing / de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis
brlab par bya ba'am/ btang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la

sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed nas/ des de byed
du mi 'jud par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing / de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur na/ dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin

gyis brlab par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rung bar bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rung bar mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu
gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gos sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang / srab mo yang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gos dag du mchis/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga ste/ gos bdag po yod pa dang / gos bdag po med pa dang / gos por blangs pa dang / gos dur khrod pa
dang / gos phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni/ lnga pa'o/ /de la/ gos bdag po yod pa gang zhe na/ gang la bdag po skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning yod pa de ni/ gos bdag po yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gos bdag
po med pa gang zhe na/ gang la bdag po skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning med pa de ni/ gos bdag po med pa zhes bya'o/ /gos bor blangs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nye du dag gis/ nye du nyams pa dang /
shi ba dang / dus la bab par rig nas de'i rgyab nas gos kyis bka' ste dur khrod du khyer nas de dag gis gos de yang phyir khyer te 'ongs nas dge 'dun la phul ba de ni/ gos bor blangs zhes bya'o/ /gos

dur khrod pa gang zhe na/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i dur khrod nas blangs pa gang yin pa de ni/ gos dur khrod pa zhes bya'o/ /gos phyag dar khrod pa gang zhe na/ phyag dar khrod pa rnam pa lnga ste/ lam po
che'i gos dang / dgon par bor ba dang / chu 'gram pa dang / sril zan dang / ral rul nyid ni/ lnga pa yin te/ ral rul zhes bya ba ni/ ha cang zegs pa gang yin pa'o/ /
gzhan yang phyag dar khrod pa lnga ste/ mes tshig pa dang / chus reg pa dang / byi bas zos pa dang / be 'us zos pa dang / ma ma'i gos nyid ni/ lnga pa yin no/ /gzhan yang gos gnyis te/ gsar pa dang /
dus tshigs su spyad pa'o/ /gos gsar pa gang zhe na/ thag pas gsar du btags pa/ dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su ma spyad pa gang yin pa de
ni| gos gsar pa zhes bya'o/ /gos dus tshigs su spyad pa gang zhe na/ dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su spyad pa gang yin pa ste/ dus tshigs zhes bya
ba ni| zla ba bzhi ste/ de ni/ gos dus tshigs su spyad pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong gis gos gsar pa rnyed na/ gal te dge slong des bcag pa dang / gding ba dang / dra ba dang / bcom pa dang / kha bsgyur
bar nus na/ dge slong des gos de las snam sbyar ni/ nyis rim du bya/ gding ba yang nyi rim du bya/ bla gos ni/ chig rkyang du bya/ mthang gos kyang chig rkyang du bya'o/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar
nyis rim la rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na/ de glon par byed pa na/ nyes byas su 'gyur la/ zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar nyis rim las
gzhan du glan no/ /snyam nas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/ de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar nyis rim las bkrus shing

kha bsgyur te de nyid la glan no/ /snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/ de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /snam sbyar la ji lta ba bzhin du gding ba la

yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong gis bla gos chig rkyang la rim pa glon par byed na/ de glon pa na/ nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du
mthang gos la'ang de bzhin no/ /dge slong gis gos dus tshigs su spyad pa zhig rnyed la/ gal te dge slong des bcag pa dang / gding ba dang / 'dra ba dang / btsem pa dang / kha bsgyur bar nus na/ dge
slong des gos de las snam sbyar ni/ bzhi rim du bya/ gding ba yang bzhi rim du bya/ bla gos ni/ nyis rim du bya/ mthang gos kyang nyi rim du bya'o/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim la lnga pa glon
par byed na/ de glon pa na/ nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim las gzhan du glan no/ /snyam pas rim pa 'bogs
par byed na/ 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim las bkrus shing kha bsgyur te/ 'di nyid glan par
bya'o| |snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/ de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /snam sbyar la ji lta ba bzhin du
gding ba la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim la rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na/ de glon pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du
'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim las gzhan du glan no/ /snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/ de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/ nyi ma bcu 'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed
du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim las 'di nyid bkrus shing kha bsgyur te 'di nyid du glan no/ /snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na/ de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/ nyi ma bcu
'das na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du mthang gos la yang de bzhin no/ /phyag dar khrod la ni/ ji tsam 'dod pa glan par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ snam sbyar dag gi snam phran du lags/ nye bar 'khor/ dgu ste/ snam phran dgu pa dang / snam phran bcu gcig pa dang / snam
phran bcu gsum pa dang / snam phran bco lnga pa dang / snam phran bcu bdun pa dang / snam phran bcu dgu pa dang / snam phran nyi shu gcig pa dang / snam phran nyi shu gsum pa dang / snam phran
nyi shu lnga pa'o/ /nye bar 'khor/ de la snam phran dgu pa ni/ gsum sbyar gsum mo/ /snam phran bcu gcig pa ni/ gsum sbyar gsum dang / snam phran gnyis so/ /snam phran bcu gsum pa ni/ gsum
sbyar bzhi dang snam phran gcig go /snam phran bco lnga pa ni/ gsum sbyar lnga pa'o/ /snam phran bcu bdun pa ni/ gsum sbyar lnga dang snam phran gnyis so/ /snam phran bcu dgu pa ni/ gsum sbyar drug
dang snam phran gcig go /snam phran nyi shu gcig pa ni/ gsum sbyar bdun no/ /snam phran nyi shu gsum pa ni/ gsum sbyar bdun dang snam phran gnyis so/ /snam phran nyi shu lnga pa ni/ gsum sbyar
brgyad dang snam phran gcig go /nye bar 'khor/ de la snam sbyar snam phran dgu pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran bcu gcig pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran bcu gsum pa gang yin pa de gsum ni/
glegs bu phyed dang gsum par byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /snam sbyar snam phran bco lnga pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran bcu bdun pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran bcu dgu pa gang yin pa de gsum ni/
glegs bu phyed dad bzhi par byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /snam sbyar snam phran nyi shu gcig pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran nyi shu gsum pa gang yin pa dang / snam phran nyi shu lnga pa gang yin pa de
gsum ni/ glegs bu phyed dang lnga par byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /nye bar 'khor/ de yan chad ni/ tshem bu'o/ /btsun pa/ snam sbyar gyi tshad ji tsam lags/ nye bar 'khor gsum ste/ snam sbyar chen
po dang / 'bring dang / chung ngur rig par bya'o/ /de la chen po ni/ khru gsum dang lnga'o/ /chung ngu ni/ khru phyed dang gsum dang / phyed dang lnga'o/ /'bring gi ni/ de gnyis kyi bar

ma'o| |snam sbyar ji lta ba bzhin du bla gos dang / mthang gos kyang de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang / mthang gos rnam pa gnyis te/ khru do dang lnga pa dang / khru do dang bzhi pa'o/ /mthang gos tha ma ni/ 'khor
gsum khebs pa gang yin pa'o/ /spang ba rnams kyi gos tha ma ni/ khru gang kho ra khor yug go /dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par
gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang
snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar
'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de la ltung ba med do/ /de bzhin du ji tsam du dge slong gis
spang ba'i dngos po de nyid kyis ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ dra ba'am/ phor bu'am/ ska rags sam/ dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad

gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med
do| |'jog pa'i spang ba ste/ gsum pa rdzogs so// //gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs nas gzigs pa lnga po/ /rigs dang / yul
dang / dus dang / rus dang / bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 'jig rten la gzigs nas glang po cher snang bar bsgyur te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe na/ sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur
cing / 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyis 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas nag
par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na/ snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang /
'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes shes par gyur
to| |gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu 'das nas yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi
bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun nag mun par byed pas nag par gyur
pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang / 'od des
sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes shes par gyur
to| |gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams par gyur pa de'i nyin mo rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gi bu yang btsas par gyur te/ mnyan yod na rgyal po chen po rtsibs
kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten gsal ba ltar snang bas/ gzhon nu 'di'i ming gsal rgyal du gdags so/ /snyam
nas| bu de'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po che po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i
gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing / 'di btsun mo gzugs can gyi bu yin pas/ gzhon nu 'di'i ming gzugs can snying por gdags so/ /snyam nas/ bu de'i ming gzugs can snying po
zhes bya bar btags so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi na rgyal po chen po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i
ming shar bar gdags so/ /snyam nas/ bu de'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /'phags rgyal na rgyal po chen po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas
pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang bas snang bar gyur pas/ gzhon nu 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so/ /snyam nas/ bu de'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po re res bsam pa/
yang bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no/ /bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no/ /snyam mod kyi/ de ni/ de lta ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi nyin mo
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa de nyid kyi nyin mo shAkya gzhon nu bzang ldan la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas so/ /bsnyen bkur ba 'dun byed la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas so//

rta rgod ma lnga brgya las kyang rte'u bsngags ldan la sogs lnga brgya 'brangs so/ /lha rnams kyis kyang gter lnga brgya nye bar bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de bram ze ltas pa dang /
mtshan mkhan dag gis lung bstan pa/ gal te gzhon nu pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin
po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni/ 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che
dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni/ bdun pa yin no/ /'di la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs
dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing
mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms bas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar
dad pas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung
bstan to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe na/ thams cad du gangs kyi ngos dang nye ba/ chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i 'gram/ drang srong ser
skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/ de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis/ gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na/ 'khor

los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni/ 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/

'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni/ bdun pa yin no/ /
'di la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod
par bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs
te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/ yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /zhes sgra grags par gyur to/ /nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis kyang gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba/ chu klung skal ldan

shing rta pa'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/ de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis/ gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na
bzhugs par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i

rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni/ 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim
bdag rin po che dang / dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni/ bdun pa yin no/ /'di la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong
tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing
snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas
kyang nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ da gzhon nu bsten na dus su 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur bas gang bsten na/ gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de da
gis bsam pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par bya ste/ de bsten na/ gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de dag gis rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par brtsams te/ dus dang mthun pa'i dus su
'dud pas pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag skur bar byed do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad grub pas/ de'i
phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /snyam nas/ de'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
chen por 'khrungs shing / des rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba gzigs nas thugs phyung ste nags kyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang dang shAkya legs par rab rtogs kyis bka'
mchid gsol ba'i mi nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu bkye ste/ de dag gis nyi ma re re zhing deng ni/ gzhon nu til 'bru gcig gam/ 'bras thug po che 'bru gcig gam/ mon sran sde'u 'bru
gcig gam/ mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig gam/ rgya shug gi 'bru gcig gam/ rgya sran 'bru gcig gis 'tsho bar mdzad do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid khyer te
'ong ngo / /nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis de ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba gzigs nas thugs byung ste rab tu byung ngo / /zhes thos nas de dag 'di
snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag cag rgyal po zas gtsang la bsten par byed pa'i gzhon nu de rab tu byung ngo / /snyam nas/ de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis 'dud pa dang / pho nya dang / dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bcad par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po'i mchog
sbed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod la/ rgyal po zas gtsang la ni/ mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char ka zhes bya ba yod de/ gang gi tshe ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho
nya gtong bar byed pa de'i tshe na/ blon po'i mchog sbed pa gtong bar byed de/ des rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag kyang byas nas 'char ka'i khyim du 'jug par byed do/ /gang gi
tshe rgyal po zas gtsang / ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du pho nya gtong bar byed pa de'i tshe na ni/ mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char ka gtong bar byed de/ des kyang rgyal po'i bya ba
dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed do/ /sbed pa la chung ma sbed ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes
bu dga' ba zhig yod de/ 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur te/ /sbed pas ji ltar 'char ka sped ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur par shes nas des bsam pa/ 'di gsad
par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /yang bsam pa/ gal te 'di bsad par gyur na/ yul 'khor gnyis 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur bas/ bdag gis bud med kyi lus kyi phyir ci'i phyir bram ze gsad par bya snyam nas
de btang snyoms su bzhag go /de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sbed pas 'phrigs so/ /snyam du rig nas/ skrag ste khyim nas byung zhing gzhan na 'dug pa dang / sbed pas smras pa/ 'char
ka /khyod ci'i phyir rang gi khyim spangs te gzhan na 'dug /tshur shog /'di khyod rang gi khyim yin gyi/ ci bder 'dug cig /de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ don gyis na 'dis bdag la rjes
su gnang ngo / /snyam du rig nas de nyid na 'dug go/ /'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nyer bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la
bab nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bu med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug go/ /sbed mas 'char ka la gang gi tshe bdag gi khyim thab gson

zhing 'dug ste/ 'tsho zhing sdod pa de'i tshe na khyod rtag pa kho nar byon na/ da de dus la bab ste/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu ma mchis pa'i slad du nor thams cad rang gi
mdzod dang bang bar stsal na/ da khyod kyis bka' mchid tsam yang mi spring ngam zhes yi ge spring ngo / /de nas 'char ka spring yig gi don thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag der song
bar gyur na/ gzhi de las 'char ka bud med la chags pa bud med kyi phyir der song ngo / /zhes gzhan dag kha zer bar 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/ /
snyam nas/ des lan gnyis sam gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so//
lha/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltams pa de'i tshe na/ nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po thams cad 'dud cing thams cad kyis pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag gsol nas/ gang gi tshe gzhon
nu don thams cad grub pa rgan po dang / nad pa dang / gum pa gzigs nas thugs byung ste nags su gshegs pa de'i tshe na/ nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag las/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis pho nya dang dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bkum nas/ lhas/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya dang dkor sgrom dag bka' stsal
cing bskur nas de lta de ltar rkyen par gyur pa las de yal bar bor na/ slad kyis gnod pa chen por 'gyur bas/ de skol dang mtshams 'brel par mchis pas de dag lhan cig rkyen par mdzad
pa'i rigs so/ /'char ka/ gal te de lta na/ khyod nyid pho nyar song zhig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas 'char kas dkor sgrom dag khyer te mnyan yod ga la ba der 'phags nas
mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ sten pa la bsten par mi bya bar bsten pa la bsten par bya ba yin pas/ je dang por blon po rnams blta bar bya zhing / de'i
'og tu rgyal po blta ste/ sbed ma'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des blon po rnams blta bar brtsams te smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed kyis kho bo ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes

pa de/ mi shes sam/ de'i khyim thab dus la bab nas/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu med pa'i phyir de'i nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug pas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po la
gsol ba byed kyi/ khyed kyis grogs kyis shig /de dag gis de bzhin du khas blangs so/ /de nas 'char ka ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ ko sa lar byung ba'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/ lan gnyis sam gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas te/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bdag gi gnas stsol cig /'char ka khyod sngon gang du zhugs/ lha/ blon po'i mchog sped pa'i sdum par mchis so/ /'char ka song la de nyid du
zhugs shig /lha/ blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab po/ /gal te de dus la bab na/ ci/ de'i khyim thab kyang dus la bab bam/ lha/ de'i sdum pa ni/ dus la ma bab mod kyi/ 'on kyang de na
stan tsam yang ma mchis so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed kyis 'char ka'i gnas byin cig /'char ka phyir byung ba dang blon po rnams
kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci lags/ 'char ka la gnas ma mchis snyam mam/ 'di ltar/ 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig mchid mjal bas don gyis na/ 'char kas sbed ma'i slad du lha la
gsol ba bgyis kyi/ lha/ 'char ka ni/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu lags pas/ bram ze ni/ mi 'dod bzhin du gzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ 'di legs par bzung na/ rgyal po zas gtsang
legs par bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos 'char ka bos te smras pa/ 'char ka/ ngas khyod ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes par sngar ma shes kyi/ da song la sbed ma dang / de'i khyim
dang / nor thams cad khyod khyer cig /lha/ bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras nas/ 'char ka sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang / sbed mas 'char ka 'ongs so/ /zhes thos
nas sgo khang du 'dug ste ngu bar brtsams so/ /'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma/ khyod ci'i phyir ru/ des smras pa/ bdag 'tshal ba'i khyim thab dus la bab na/ ci khyod kyis kyang yongs su
gtang ngam/ de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis mthun par smra na/ 'di shin tu ngu bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di tshar gcad par bya'o/ /snyam du rig nas/ 'char

kas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa gang gis btsun mo grags 'dzin dang / sa 'tshom dang / ri dwags skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba dag gis

rkang pa'i rdul tsam du yang khyod kyis mi phod do/ /de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / 'char kas smras pa/ kho bos khyod ma btang bas khyod nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'ongs pa yin no/ /kho bos rgyal po las khyod
dang / khyim dang / nor thams cad thob na/ ci/ khyod 'di nyid du 'dug gam/ ser skya'i gnas su 'gro/ des bsam pa/ gal te ser skya'i gnas su song na/ bram ze mo las srog kyang mi thob bo/ /snyam du
rig nas/ 'di nyid du mchis so/ /zhes smras te/ de de nyid du 'dug go/ de'i tshe na 'char ka la khyim gnyis yod de/ gcig ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /gcig ni/ ser skya'i gnas na'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de/ dka' ba byed pa ci yang med par rig nas ci bder dbugs rngub par mdzad/ ci bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / 'bras chan dang /
zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol bar mdzad/ zhun mar dang 'bru mar dag gis sku dag kyang skud par mdzad/ chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing / grong sde 'dong du
gshegs nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis las/ lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsrel ba gsol te/ klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na/ rtswa bkra shis
tshong pa las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas skyil
mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrangs nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod pa/ ji srid zag med ma thob par/ /de srid skyil krung gzhig mi bya/ /de yis
ji srid zag med pa/ /ma brnyes skyil krung 'jig mi mdzad/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan
pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te/ bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud nas/ tshangs pas gsol te wA ra NA sir gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos

dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang / nye lnga dag dang / grong pa'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba lnga bcu btul to/ /wA ra NA si'i gseb tu gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug cu bden pa
dag la bkod do/ /grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do/ /lteng rgyas su gshegs nas ral ba can stong rab tu byung
zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/ /ga ya mgo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po dag cho 'phrul gsum gyis gdams pa mdzad nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te

shin tu mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/ /shar pa'i tshal gseb tu gshegs nas ma ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /
ma ga d+har byung ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag go/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal bzhes te/ shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu
'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa rab tu byung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/ /mnyan yod du gshegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes te/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon
nu'i dpes mdos btul nas/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal
po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya btang ste/ lha dgyes pa skyed cig /khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing mnyan yod na rgyal
byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes spring ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu bdag gis

ring du ma mthong ste/ bdag gzhon nu mthong bas yongs su skom mo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / pho nya de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / /pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang / de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / /bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba ni/ legs par gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas
gtsang gis de thos nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de/ thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs/
'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba dag spyod pa de'i tshe/ ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na/ de dag nyi ma re re zhing gtam khyer te 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams
cad grub pa gnas pa 'dis gnas so/ /zhes gtam bsnyad par byed na/ da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing mnyan
yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos nas/ ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na/ 'gas kyang gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i gtam
khyer te mi 'ong bar gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de/ de nyid du 'dug par gyur na/ nga ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du mi chud cing mi 'dug tu rung / 'char kas smras
pa| lha/ bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ khyod kyang der 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /lha/ bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis rang nyid kyis 'phrin
yig 'di skad ces/ mal rum bzhugs pa tshun chad nas/ /bdag gis legs par khyod bsrungs te/ /nyon mongs gdugs kyis rab gdungs pas/ /rgyal ba'i ljon shing sdod cing mchis/ /slob ma'i
yal ga rtsa lag gis/ /de ltar khyod ni rgyas gyur pas/ /gzhan dag bde bas dga' mdzad na/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal bsten par gyur/ /gang tshe dang po khyod 'khrungs tshe/ /shin tu don chen mdzad nas

ni| |nye du rjes su gzung mdzad ces/ /de tshe khyod kyis thugs dam bcas/ /de slad go 'phang zhi brnyes khyod/ /bdag dang nye du'i tshogs rnams la/ /rjes su thugs brtse nyer bzung ste/ /byon pa'i blo gros
mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bris so/ /de nas 'char ka 'phrin yig de blangs te/ mnyan yod du 'phags nas de mthar gyis mnyan yod ji tsam na 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin yig phul ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'phrin yig bklag pa mdzad dus/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs sam/ 'char ka 'ong ngo / /'char kas sngon gyi gcugs pa
de nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs na/ bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/

gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/ /dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa/ /spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/ /dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa//
rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/ /'jig rten ma rgyal yong med pa/ /spyod yas gzhi med
sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/ /'jig rten ma rgyal yong med pa/ /rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/ /gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/ /'char
kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rgyal po zas gtsang la brjod du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka/ rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ni/ de lta bu ma yin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ 'o na rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ji lta bu lags/ skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa rab tu byung ba dag yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar
mchid kyis 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab tu byung ste song zhig/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon tshe rabs brjes pa de dang de dag
tu yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcags pas/ bka' stsal ma thag tu 'char kas
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'char ka rab tu phyung zhig dang / de ni/ 'di
la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par

byas te/ de la 'di ni/ khyod kyi bya ba yin no/ /'di ni/ khyod kyi bya ba ma yin/ 'char ka/ khyod kyis deng phyin chad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig tu nyal bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun tu spyad pa'i
chos thams cad brjod do/ /'char kas/ mkhan po/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka/ khyod kyis tsham tshom med par rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par mi bya bar sgor 'greng ste/ shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te shAkya'i dge slong
gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes 'dri na/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te zhugs shig ces zer na/ 'jug par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad

grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin na ma zhes dri na/ cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams
cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas 'cha' bar mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/ gnas 'cha' bar mi byed do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas 'cha'
bar byed ces 'dri na/ dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam zhes 'dri na/ 'ong ngo / /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te yun ji
tsam na 'ong zhes 'dri na/ zhag bdun 'das nas so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /'char ka 'ong ba'i tshe mnyan yod du nyi ma mang po dag gis phyin na/ phyir 'gro ba'i tshe/ 'di
lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha rnams kyis mthus nyi ma gcig gis ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho
brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod song la rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so/ /zhes sbron cig/ des smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang
mchis sam/ 'char kas smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya 'jug tu chug cig /su zhig shAkya zlog

par byed/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo bas ngo shes nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod la bcom ldan
'das a ro kya zhes gsung ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'char ka skad las ngo shes nas smras pa/ khyod 'char ka yin nam/ lha/ bdag skye bos de ltar 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam/ lha/ cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid lags so/ /rgyal po seng ge'i khri las brgyal te sa la lhung nas chus dbang bskur bas srog phyir 'ongs
nas dris pa/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam/ lha/ mchi'o/ /yun ji tsam na 'ong / dgung bdun 'das nas so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dengs la rgyal
po'i pho brang dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dag byi dor gyis shig/ lha/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas 'cha' bar mi bgyid do/ /'o na
gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed/ dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ /gtsug lag khang ji 'dra bar/ 'char kas mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang ji 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba brjod do/ /de'i

tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang la skyed mos tshal skye yod dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod pas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/
shes ldan dag/ khyed dengs la skyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu skyed mos tshal re re yang rgyal byed kyi

tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang dang / khang chen bcu drug dang / khang pa'i gzhi drug cu yod pa dag myur du byed du chug la/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo
