med par gnas par gyis shig /rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub pa yin la/ lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin/ rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad
'grub pa yin pas/ blon po rnams kyis/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas skyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / tshangs pa'i
gnas dag tu skyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang / khang chen bcu drug dang / khang pa'i gzhi drug cu yod pa dag byed du bcug cing / grong khyer ser skya'i gnas
thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par gnas par byas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la ni chos nyid kyis gdon mi za bar
bgyi ba bcu mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du sangs rgyas su lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du sems can gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ma bskyed

pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad ma btul ba dang / ji srid du sku tshe'i cha lnga pa ma lus pa dang / ji srid du mtshams gcad pa ma mdzad pa dang / ji srid du nyan thos zung cig mchog tu ma

bstan pa dang / ji srid du grong khyer kun 'od du lha las 'bab pa ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos rnams dang thabs cig

sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la ma bkod pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen
po zas gtsang dang / shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gdul ba'i dus nye bar gnas par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la gzhag pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gdon mi za bar mdzad pa yin

no snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ser skya'i gnas su gshegs

kyi| khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang / yab dang sras mjal ba lta bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig ces sgos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
gyi bu chen pos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las
gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang / yab dang sras mjal ba lta bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong de
dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de bzhin bgyi'o/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po las mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/
grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba

'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su
bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram
ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs
pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su
bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig me bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gnod

sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thags bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs

pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po

ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong

pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang po/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/
'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag gcig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/
bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/ 'dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas
pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga slangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug
dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan

thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu la sogs pa dge

slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ser skya'i gnas ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma bdun pa la grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad rdo ba dang /
gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par bzhag cing / bdug pa dang / phye ma 'khrigs pa dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen

po dag bshams shing / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi bar/ lam thams

cad mdzes shing / rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par bzhag ste spos chu'i chag chag btab cing / bar bar du dar gyi chun po mang po dpyangs shing / me tog gi tshogs dag kyang bshams/ bdug spos

dri zhim po'i du ba 'khrigs pa dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dag rnam par bzhag go/ rgyal po zas gtsang nyid kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i

mthu chen pos n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu klung ro ha ka'i 'gram du gshegs so/ /de

nas dge slong kha cig ni/ lag pa dang rkang pa dag 'khru bar byed/ kha cig so shing 'dor bar byed/ kha cig ni/ chu 'tshag par byed do/ /kha cig ni/ khrus byed/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya
rnams kyis/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ongs shing / rgyal po zas gtsang gis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gnas mal bshams zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shAkya

'bum phrag du ma dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'dus par gyur cing / de nas kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul cing lhags so/ /kha cig ni/ ya mtshan skyes te/ je dang por yab kyis
sras kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad dam/ 'on te sras kyis yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa blta'o/ /snyam pas lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di
snyam du dgongs te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis ser skya'i gnas su gshegs na shAkya nga rgyal can dag /gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas chen po ma rnyed de/ 'di ltar/ 'di sngon
byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas lha 'bum phrag du mas bsus te steng gi nam mkha' las byung ste song nas/ da 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs kyang rkang pas 'ongs
so| |zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis ser skya'i gnas su 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs shing rig nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed ni/ rkang
pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka la rgol cig /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs so/ /dge slong rnams kyis/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas

rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka brgal te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas ting
nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis chu klung ro ha ka'i pha rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur cing / steng gi nam mkha' la dang ba'i

rgyal po 'dab ma brkyangs pa ltar mngon par 'phags nas ser skya'i gnas kyi steng n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo
krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dag mdzad do/ /me'i khams la yang snyoms
par 'jug par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang / ser po dag dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po

dag dang / btsod ka dag dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar zhing / sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab

par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar zhing / sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin
mdzad de/ de ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi ston par mdzad do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po zas gtsang
gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni/ de'i spyi bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur la/ gal te rgyal po zas gtsang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni/ shAkya
nga rgyal can dag /ci'i phyir yab tu gyur pas sras kyi rkang pa gnyis la thug par byed ces ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus
ma btud bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bar mngon par 'du bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs shing rig nas/ ta la bdun
srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs shing / ta la drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /de nas skyes bu bdun srid tsam na gzhes
shing / skyes bu drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na gzhes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shAkya rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang tshe khyod bltams dog sa rab g.yos dang / /'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku ma btang
dang / /'di dang lan gsum kun gzigs mkhyen ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas khyod kyi zhabs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ltar bsdu ba
mdzad nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar gshegs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang dang / bre bo zas dang / zas dkar dang /
bdud rtsi zas dang / shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /shAkya kha cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /shAkya kha cig ni/ thag ring po khon nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas cang mi smra bar mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan
'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ dpa' bo bcibs pa glang po dang / /chibs dang shing rtas khab gshegs na/ /tsher bcas dog sa'i gzhi dag la/ /ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs par
mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis/ /nyon mongs tsher mas ma rmas par/ /sa gzhi kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /rgyal pos gsol
pa| dpa' bo sngon chad ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' gsol bas rnam mdzes na/ /ngur smrig na bza' rtsub po dag/ ji ltar khyod skus bzod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po bdag
gi khrel 'dzem pa'i/ /snam sbyar gos gyon mdzes pa yin/ /gang gi thub pa'i gos gyon pa/ /zhi ba'i nags na mdzes par gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ brtan pa sngon chad gser snod nas/ /zhal
zas ro mang ldan gsol na/ /de ltar bsod snyoms ngan pa dag/ ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos ldan dga' ba bdag gi zas/ /nges 'byung ldan zhing
mnyam bzhag yin/ /zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun/ /rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ blo bzang khyod sngon yang thog gi/ gzhal med khang
steng dus mthun bzhugs/ /nyag gcig nags na khyod bzhugs na/ /ji ltar bsnyengs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam 'jigs kun rtsa dang srid/ /de bdag
bag nyal bcas spangs pas/ /mya ngan 'jigs bral nags gnas te/ /de na bdag 'jigs ci yang med/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ thub dbang khyod sngon rab dgyes pa'i/ /khab na rtag tu khrus
mchog mdzad/ /nags na nyag gcig khyod bzhugs na/ /de na 'byor khrus su dag bgyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam chos rdzing bsod nams 'gram/ /rnyog
med dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/ /rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo rang gi pho brang na/ /gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na//
chab tshan rnyog dang bcas pa yis/ /ji ltar khyod kyis sku khrus mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam dang klung tshul khrims 'gram/ /dang ba bsil ba mkhas pas bsngags//
mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/ /rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing / /'jigs skrag gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
yid 'byung gang nas skye 'gyur ba/ /zhus pa de ni bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing / /'jigs skrag gang nas 'byung 'gyur dang / /yid
'byung gang nas skye 'gyur ba/ /gson cig bdag gis khyod la bshad/ /rga dang na dang 'chi 'gyur ba/ /gal te de gsum yod min na/ /bdag kyang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar
'gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /khyod la gos pa mi mnga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa legs pa lags/ /de nas rab
dga' dang rgyas pas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor byas te/ /thub dbang zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /bde gshegs kun nas rtog cing sdod/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag

gi bu yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams

dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar/ rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas byin sdig pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa/ zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis bden pa dag
mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de nas srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras sbu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'khor
de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni/ bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di
ltar mthu che ba yin no/ /snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin bden pa ma
mthong zhing khro ba'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes su 'jug par
bya ba la rag go /shAkya gcugs par gyur pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis de la smras pa/ lhas byin/ thong zhig /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin gyi/ de skad ma zer cig/
de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /nyi ma gnyis pa la skyed mos tshal skye yod du sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa byas nas/ der yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar/ rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang

nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa/ bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de na srog chags stong phrag mang po/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni/

bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no/ /snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa
ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin bden pa ma mthong zhing / khro bo'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig
rten thams cad rjes su 'jug par bya ba la rag go/ shAkya gcugs pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis de la smras pa/ lhas byin/ thong zhig /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin gyi/
de skad ma zer cig /de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /nyi ma gsum pa la skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa byas nas/
der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar/ rgyal po zas gtsang
dang / lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa/ bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/
de nas srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la
'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni/ bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no/ /snyam du ha cang dga' bas
bden pa ma mthong ngo / /lhas byin ni/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas
gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam dgongs na/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mi mthong ste/ sems ha cang mtho ba dang / ha cang zhum pas so/ /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems/ gzhon nu
don thams cad grub pa sngon chad lha dang mis mchod par gyur na/ da ni/ mis mchod cing lhas mchod par ma gyur to/ /snyam du ha cang zhum par gyur par thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang 'dul ba'i phyir lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs shing rig nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad na ni/ tha na srog chags grog sbur gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes la/
ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/ nyan thos la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos
de nas tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal
po zas gtsang gdul ba'i slad du lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems
kyis shes nas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu'i lag ngar bskums pa las rkyong bar byed pa'am/ brkyangs pa las bskum par byed pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha
rnams lha'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul
gyis rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khang bzang sgo bzhi pa sprul par mdzad de/ sgo bzhi po dag tu 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag sgo srung rnams su rnam par bzhag pa mdzad do/ /de nas gzugs
na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs su nye bar brten te 'khod
do| |'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yon phyogs su nye
bar brten te 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nyin mo lan gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nang
par sngar langs te khang bzang gi shar sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / yul 'khor srung gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khang par ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i
'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas/ 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzang khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po/ kho bo ni/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yin
no| |de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzang gi lho sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ma 'jug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba'
zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzang / khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po/ kho bo ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yin no/ /de nas rgyal po
zas gtsang khang bzang gi nub sgo ga la ba der song ba dang / mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ma 'dug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos
ston par mdzad pas/ 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzang / khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po/ kho bo ni/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yin no/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
khang bzang gi byang sgo ga la ba der song ba dang rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ma 'dug par sdod cig /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad
pas| 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ /bzhin bzang / khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po/ kho bo ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yin no/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang / kye ma bdag
gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen
nas khang bzang shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par mdzad pa dang / 'di ltar/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa me
long gi gzugs kyi nang na 'dug pa ltar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do/ /snyam mo/ /
de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas rgyal po zas gtsang la chos
bstan par brtsam pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs te/ da ltar rgyal po zas
gtsang su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do/ /snyam du ha cang dga' bas sems kyi rgyud mtho bar gyur par thugs su chud do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
chen pos/ btsun pa/ bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
dgal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu tshur gshegs/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu byon pa legs so/ /btsun
pa mo'u dgal gyi bu gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye ba mdzad pas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms
par zhugs te/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba
dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag byed do/ /me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus 'od
zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang / ser po dag dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po dag dang / btsod ka dag dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ngo / /cho 'phrul zung dag kyang
rnam par ston te/ lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /
shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin te/ phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir
bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u dgal
gyi bu chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa'i nyan thos mthu che ba/ gsum rig sems kyi rnam grangs shes/ /zag pa zad par gyur pa dang / /dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che bar ma zad kyi/ 'di ltar nyan thos rnams la yang rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba dag yod do/ /snyam nas/ de nas
rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud snyoms par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de nas bden pa mthong nas gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag
gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/
rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang /
mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /
chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'i/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsal/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /
tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/ bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/ /lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/ /sems ni mtho ris gzhol
bar gyur/ /bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/ /lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/ /sems ni thar la gzhol bar gyur/ /ngan song dag las legs phyung zhing / /khyod
kyis mtho ris thar pa la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste/ /khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mdzad/ /tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed/ /dge ba'i bshes
gnyen rnams la ni/ /nye bar brten pa bzang ba lags/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bden pa mthong nas zas dkar la smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod kyis rgyal srid byed du chug cig /nga ni/
rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /lha ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/ ngas bden pa dag mthong ngo / /lhas nam gzigs/ deng nyid do/ /lhas deng nyid gzigs
kyi| bdag gis gang gi gdugs la bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa nyid kyi gdugs la bden pa dag mthong ba lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas
la smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis/ khyed kyis rgyal srid byed du chug cig/ nga ni/ rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/ ngas bden pa
mthong ngo / /lhas nam gzigs/ deng nyid do/ /lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi/ bdag cag gis cher sngar mthong lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams kyi bu thu bo gang yin/ gzhon nu bzang ldan
lags so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyin gcig ma chad par rgyal po'i pho
brang du gdugs tshod gsol ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba dka' thub kyis lus mi sdug par snang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
nyid chen po 'di dag /sems ni/ bzang ba yin na/ lus mi bzang ste/ dka' thub drag po dag gis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor ni/ bcom ldan 'das
nyid ji 'dra ba 'khor yang de 'dra ba nyid du gyur na/ de lta na bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /
gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ lha/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/ lha/ zham ring bar 'gyur ro/ /'o
na| da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad na/ khyod kyi bu dag ci'i phyir zham ring mi byed/ lha/ ci lags/ de dag rab tu byung ngam/
rab tu phyung zhig /lha/ shAkya'i rigs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung zhig /lhas/ bka' stsal pa bzhin 'chal lo/ /
rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyi khyim re re nas re re rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/ /zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril bsgrags
de'i tshe na bzang ldan dang / ma 'gag pa dang / nam gru la sogs pa shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu byung ngo / /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu
lnga brgya rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba ni/ rnyed pa'i phyed dang nye ba yin no/ /zhes gsungs pas/
de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag gzhan gyi phyir kho nar rab tu byung ba yin na/ gzhan kho na la chags
so| |snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rnyed pa dang / bskur sti chen po byung ba gcad par bzhed nas ser skya'i gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod
ga la ba der gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// //
'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nye brgyad pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs dgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar

gyis mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo / /khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /
mthong nas kyang brang brdungs te smras pa/ 'char ka ci'i slad du khyod kyis bdag spangs te rab tu byung / 'char kas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpas btsun mo grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang /
ri dwags skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba ni/ shin tu dka' ba yin gyi/ rdul gyi rdza ba 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod/ 'char ka/ bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo / /de
ltar gyis shig /khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /'char ka de/ der dus dang mthun pa'i dus su 'ong zhing smras pa/ sbed ma rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ sbed mas smras pa/ da dung
khyim gyi bya ba legs par ma bsdus so/ /sbed ma/ dus de tsam gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i khyim gyi bya ba yang legs par bsdus par 'gyur ro/ /'char ka/ deng legs par bsdus te sang
rab tu 'byung ngo / /'char ka 'di snyam du sngon yang bdag cag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par gyur pas/ gal te bdag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung bar gyur na/
drug sde dag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung ngo / /zhes rgya cher zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te
rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs te 'dug go /sbed ma yang phyi de nyin
bar khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste dris pa/ 'phags pa dag /de gar mchis/ de su yin/ 'phags pa 'char ka'o/ /
de rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /sbed mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu / 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas/ khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus
la mchi zhig dang / bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo / /zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchi na/ de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas/ da ni/ bdag khyim na gnas
pa yang ma lags la/ rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so/ /dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sbed ma/ 'char kas spu gri'i phyir rgyal po'i khab tu song bas/ spu gri gsar pas khyod kyi skra
'breg par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas de dag gis sbed ma ngu ba mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu / 'phags pa 'char ka'i
mchid nas/ khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi zhig dang / bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo / /zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na/ de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis
pas| da ni/ bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so/ /g.yeng ma/ dge slong dag su zhig dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed/ 'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge

slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed kyi/ tshur shog dang / 'phags ma skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis khyod rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis de skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i gan du khrid
nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang sbed ma 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis de rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/ /'char ka
'di snyam du/ bdag gis lhung bzed nag po can rnams rjes su srung bas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'di rab tu ma phyung bas/ rgya cang dang / lcag pod dang / shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dag gi bar
chad kyang byas la/ de yang lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis rab tu phyung bar gyur na/ de dang 'phrad du yang mi ster ro/ /snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas
blangs so/ /mnyan yod na rgan zhugs shig mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa des/ lhung bzed dang chos gos mchan khung du bcug ste dgag dbye byas pa na/ dgag dbye legs
par byas so/ /dgag dbye shin tu byas so/ /zhes de rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der song ste/ mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka gtsug lag khang gi sgo na lam la rnam par lta zhing 'dug pa des/ thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas
'char kas bsam pa/ dge slong 'ong ba 'di/ gnas brtan gang yin/ bsu'o/ /snyam nas/ des smras pa/ gnas brtan byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /des smras
pa| slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /'char kas/ 'di ni/ rgan zhugs shig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes pa zhig go/ /snyam du shes nas 'char kas de gtsug lag
khang du 'jug tu bcug ste smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /'char kas bsam pa/ gal te dang po kho nar sbed ma'i gtam dris na/ 'phya bar
'gyur bas/ 'di ltar snga phyir byas te dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / snyan mi
mnga' ba dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka/ de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod ba chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung
pa dang / bde ba dang / snyun mi mnga' ba dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge
'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ ston
pa la blta bar 'dod dam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa 'char ka/ de bzhin te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge
bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas shing / ston pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i
chos nyan par 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ ji ltar gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / gzhan yang / dge
slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ btsun pa 'char ka de de bzhin
te/ gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ ji ltar ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / legs skyes dag shes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka/ de
bzhin te/ shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ 'o na khyod kyis khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma shes sam/ btsun pa 'char ka/ shes te/ de ni/ btsun pa 'char ka'i sngon gyi chung ma yin no/ /rgan
zhugs/ gtam shes so/ /de da dung yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma yin snyam mam/ de ni/ rab tu byung ngo / /sus rab tu phyung / skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis so/ /'char kas
bsam pa/ da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no/ /snyam nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs tshur shog /rkang pa dag khrus shig ces des de la rkang pa bkru ba dang / lag pa bsku ba mang po
byin nas/ des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ya gad btsugs te/ zung mthon po la bzhag nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'di ni/ zas dang bcas pa/ rnyed pa dang bcas pa
yin gyi/ gtsug lag khang 'dir mngon par dga' bar gyis shig /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bdag ni/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te/ 'gro ba yin pas bdag gnas
'di mi 'dod do/ /'char kas de'i mdun du sgo lcags dang lde mig kyog po dag bzhag ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnas
pa dang bcas par bya'i/ /mi gnas par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /zhes smras nas mig lam du mi snang bar song ste/ de mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas 'char kas rang gi
gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba gsar pa'i byug pas byugs te sgo bcad nas khri steng na phyi gan du nyal zhing / skad kyi gdangs kyis kha ton byed cing 'dug go/ /dge
slong ma 'dun pa 'bul ba dag lhags nas de dag gis/ de'i skad kyi gdangs thos nas de dag gis de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka/ khyod gar bzhud/ 'char kas smras pa/
rgyal po'i khab tu'o/ /de dag dbyar khang du dong nas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma dga' ba skyed cig /khyod kyi slob dpon 'ongs so/ /kho mo'i slob dpon gang / 'char ka'o/ /de ji ltar kho mo'i
slob dpon/ ci/ kho mos de'i gan nas bklags sam/ g.yeng ma/ khyod kyis mi shes kyi/ dge slong ma rnams ni/ dge slong ma rag mang du las kyi/ khyod song la ltos shig /sbed mas nas kyi ngar
phye dang / khrus kyi chal dang / 'bru mar thogs te 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang du song nas sbed mas 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo brdungs pa dang / 'char kas smras pa/ de su yin/ sbed mas
smras pa/ bdag sbed ma'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'ongs pa legs so/ /bdag da dung yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma lags sam/ 'o na ci yin/ /bdag rab tu byung ngo / /khyod sus rab
tu phyung / 'phags ma skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis so/ /kho bo re zhig bya ba de lta bu zhig byung nas/ de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po'i khab tu song na/ khyod la brtad

pa ci byung na/ de'i phyir khyod rab tu byung / khyod kyi zhal nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la shog cig dang / kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo / /zhes gsungs nas/ bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs
par bsdus te mchis na/ khyod rgyal po'i khab tu bzhud de/ gal te bdag 'phags mas rab tu ma byung du lags na/ bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rab tu byung ba yang ma lags
par 'gyur ro/ /'char kas smras pa/ sbed ma/ ci/ kho bo bdag nyid kyi lag ngar la sos 'debs par byed dam/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis rab tu phyung yang rung / kho bos rab tu phyung
yang rung ste/ legs kyi/ nang du zhugs shig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /sbed mas 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /des de la chos bstan
par brtsams te/ des de la ji tsam pa de tsam du chos bstan nas sngon gyi bgad pa dang / dga' bar byas pa dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dran par bya bar brtsams te/ sbed ma bdag
cag gnyis kyis skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu zas 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang / bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang / btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu
'thungs pa gang yin pa de dran nam zhes smras pa dang / 'char ka kun tu chags par gyur to/ /ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags par gyur pa de lta de ltar dral to/ /bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can

la la la/ ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa de shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal na gnas pa zhugs
pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na/ dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na/ dku
g.yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o/ /sbed ma des 'char ka chags so/ /snyam du shes nas/ sbed mas smras pa/ slad rol tu mchi'i/ slar mchi'o/ /'char kas bsam pa/ 'di bshang ba byed 'dod
dam/ gci ba byed 'dod gor ma chag snyam nas/ des smras pa/ song zhig/ sbed ma phyir byung nas shing nga dpung bcad brdzes te rgyug par brtsams pa dang / 'char ka de sgra la mkhas pa yin pas/ de

nas de'i sgra thos nas de'i phyi bzhin du byung ste/ dge sbyong ma mgo reg mo gar 'bros zhes de de'i phyi bzhin rgyug par brtsams pa dang / de la brla'i reg pas khu ba byung nas de kun nas dkris pa dang /
bral te glang po che chags pa dang bral ba bzhin du gzhi de dag nyid na 'dug go /sbed mas de kun nas dkris pa dang bral te phyir log pa mthong nas/ 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral lo/ /snyam
du rig nas drung du song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ gal te bdag gis dang du blangs par gyur na/ bdag kyang dge slong mar
mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur la/ khyod kyang dge slong du mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag nyid srung na/ gzhan srung bar byed la/ gzhan srung na/ bdag nyid
srung bar byed do/ /zhes pa legs par gsungs so/ /ji ltar bdag nyid srung na/ gzhan srung bar byed ce na/ sten par byed pa dang / goms par byed pa dang / lan mang du byed pa dang / rjes
su srung bar byed pa dang / reg par byed pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa ste/ de ltar bdag nyid srung na/ gzhan srung bar byed do/ /ji ltar gzhan srung na/ bdag nyid srung bar byed ce na/ mtho
mi 'tsham pa dang / mi gshe ba dang / mi 'tshe ba dang / rjes su brtse ba dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis te/ de ltar gzhan srung na/ bdag nyid srung bar byed do/ /
'phags pa/ sham thabs 'di tshur stsol/ bkru bar bgyi'o/ /'char kas sham thabs de/ sbed ma la byin no/ /sbed mas khu ba de mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag gi lus kyi phyogs
btsun pa 'char kas sngon ma mthong ba'am/ sngon ma mnams pa'am/ sngon ma byugs pa ci zhig yod na/ bdag gis dang du ma blangs pa ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /snyam du 'gyod pa
skyes so/ /sbed mas de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/ de kun tu chags shing dral bar gyur pa'i sems kyis khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi sgor blugs so/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pas/ de la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /de dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma/ kho mo cag gi khyod chos bzang po'i chos kyis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du 'gro
bar sems kyi/ kho mo cag gis des khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas par mi sems so/ /sbed mas smras pa/ phu nu mo dag /dge slong de ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ gang tshun chad rab tu
byung nas/ des kho mo sngan chad lan 'ga' yang lag gis kyang ma byugs so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ ma byugs na yang des khyod gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar byas na/ gal te byugs na/ des khyod
gnas skabs ji ltar byas par 'gyur zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod do/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong ma de ni/ pham par ma gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ phyogs dben par bzhag ste bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par gyis shig dang / bu gzhon nu 'od srung
zhes bya ba btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhon nu 'od
srung de ni/ nga'i gtam sna tshogs dang / gtam snyan pa dang / spobs pa dge ba can rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge
slong rnams nyes dmigs byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug pa las gyur pa yin no/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung
ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi
'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong
gang zhes bya ba ni/ 'char ka'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes pa dang / phrugs las brten
pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma yin no/ /gos zhes bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras
bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/ /rnying pa zhes bya ba ni/ dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang

yin pa'o/ /'khrur 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni/ tha na chur snyug par byed du 'jug na'o/ /'tshed du 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni/ tha na tshon snyug par byed du 'jug na'o/ /'chag tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/ tha na

thal mos rdeb par byed du 'jug na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang pa'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de

la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jug na/ spang
ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/
'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa spang ba'i
ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du
'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug
gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug
pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na/ nyes
byas su 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'chag
tu 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur
'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
'tshed du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'chag tu 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug
pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang /
'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'chag tu 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// //sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag /'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba 'di ni/ rnyed

pa rnams kyi phyed dang nye ba yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ de na yang shAkya'i khyim nas rab tu byung ba de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas de dag shin tu gos kyi cha ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson
pas gnas shing / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag kyang 'chang bar byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dus dang dus su chos bstan kyang de dag
gis bden pa dag ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir shAkya rab tu byung ba dag bden pa dag mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs nas/ de dag shin tu gos kyis chab

la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing / de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag 'chang ba'i phyir te/ gal te ngas shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams la smad na/
dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du dgongs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas/ dre nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ /dge slong dag/ nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nga nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyi/ nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso
sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stob
pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las/ gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod
snyoms stobs pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las/ gang bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro ba de/ bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed
du gzhug go/ /zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs pa na/ dge slong bsod snyoms stob pa gcig dang / de nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga
pa'i tshe ma gtogs par der dge slong 'ga' yang mi 'gro'o/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye sde zla ba shol ma bor bar dbyar ljongs su gnas par khas blangs la/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ zla ba shol bor
bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing / mdzes pa

'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde lhung bzed dang chos

gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ba dang / dge slong drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong

nas kyang 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /da lta kho na na nyung ngus dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba 'dral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ des de ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du
gzhug go /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ da lta sbyor ba la 'jug gi gang gi tshe dral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na des byed du gzhug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang du
dal bus khad kyis khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chab sgo dbye ba mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la/ dge slong khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs/ gang
las dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bya ba'i so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la/ nye sde/ khyod
da ltar ga las 'ongs/ gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag da ltar
ljongs nas mchis so/ /bdag ljongs su dbyar gnas par mchid kyis 'tshal to/ /nye sde/ ljongs su dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas sam/ btsun pa/ bgyis so/ /nye sde/ gang gis
khyod mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni/ gang yin/ rkyen ni/ gang yin/ btsun pa/ 'di na gal te bdag gis g.yar sngar rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhig mchi na/ bdag de la 'di skad ces
bzhin bzang / khyod tshur mchi/ dgon pa pa tshol cig ces mchi zhing / dgon pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid/ bsod snyoms pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa
dang / shing drung pa tshol cig ces mchi zhing / shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid do/ /gal te de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes mchi na/ de rab tu 'byin par bgyid do/ /gal te rdzogs
par bsnyen par 'tshal ba dang / gnas la zhugs pa dang / bklag pa la zhugs pa dang / mchid don la zhugs pa dang / yid la bgyi ba la zhugs pa zhig mchis na/ bdag de la yang 'di skad
ces/ bzhin bzang / khyod tshur mchi/ dgon pa pa tshol cig ces mchi zhing / dgon pa pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid/ bsod snyoms dang / chos gos gsum dang / phyag dar khrod pa

dang / shing drung pa tshol cig ces mchi zhing / shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid do/ /gal te de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes mchi na/ de la yid la bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ btsun pa/ gang gis

bdag mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni/ de lags/ rkyen ni/ de lags so/ /nye sde/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / lha dang

mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /nye sde/ gang la la zhig sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gi bsngags pa rjod par mi byed pa de ni/ nga'i bsngags pa rjod par

mi byed pa yin no/ /gang la la sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed pa de ni/ nga'i bsngags pa rjod par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag yun ring
po nas bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa'i phyir ro/ /nye sde/ khyod dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba mi srung ngam/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge 'dun gyi khrims ni/ gang
lags/ khrims su bgyi ba ni/ gang lags ma 'tshal to/ /nye sde/ 'di na ngas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag /nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyi/ nga'i spyan
sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang 'ong bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun
gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dang / /dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag
las/ gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag
cag las/ gang bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro ba de/ bdag cag gis ltung ba byed du gzhug go/ zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ glo bur du mchis pa lags te/ don
de ni/ dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi bsrung bar bgyi ba lags so/ /nye sde/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pas kyang dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba bsrung bar bya
ba kho na yin no/ /nye sde/ 'di ltar/ ngas dge slong glo bur bu lhags pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas dge
slong dag la gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yod ces dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'dri na/ de lta na legs/ gal te mi 'dri na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /nye sde/ de lta mod kyi/ ngas dge
slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/ /dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang /

rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang / zas phyis mi len pa dang / stan gcig pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phying ba pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / shing drung ba dang / dur khrod pa dang / tsog pu pa
dang / bla gab med pa dang / gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus
ma yin pa med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas drug sde dag/ tshe dang ldan pa nye sde ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye sde/ ci/ skabs phye zhig/

ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/ /khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar gyis shig /ltung ba ma mthong ngo / /khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ma dral tam/ dge 'dun gyi khrims su

bya ba ji lta bu yin/ drug sde dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nye sde de lta mod kyi/ ngas
dge slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/ /dge slong
bsod snyoms pa dang / rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang / zas phyis mi len pa dang / stan gcig pa dang / chos gos gsum pa dang / phying ba pa dang / phyag
dar khrod pa dang / shing drung pa dang / dur khrod pa dang / tsog pu pa dang / bla gab med pa dang / gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin
par bya ste/ dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag
'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba rnam par smad cing / 'dod pa chung ba bstod pa ni/ don gyis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag smad pa mdzad pa yin
gyi| bdag cag gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad de rgyud dag pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der

'dong ngo / /snyam mo/ /de nas dge slong de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa
dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag las lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang
ska rags lhag pa 'di dag bzhes shig /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'i/ de'i bar du sdod cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de/ bcom
ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir longs la blangs nas kyang gtsug lag khang chen po zhig
tu spungs te zhog la/ dge slong gang des brel ba'i dge slong de la de sbyin par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas shAkya
rab tu byung ba rnams las lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag blangs nas gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu spungs te bzhag go/ de nas shAkya rab
tu byung ba de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag nad ji lta ba dang / 'bras ji lta ba dang / zug rngu ji lta ba bzhin du spangs nas chos gos
gsum pa lhur len cing rgyud dag pa dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'di
ltar/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan par mdzad do/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha
mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya
mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag
nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba las ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho
ba| ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ mngon sum du bgyis so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun

pa| ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po dag tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang / bde
ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag par mdzad pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /dge slong dag/ da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sred pa med pa/ len pa med pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / shes bya thams cad la

mnga' rnyes pas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po dag/ rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing / 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang / bde ba mya ngan las 'das
pa la bzhag par mdzad pa ngo mtshar ci che/ 'di ltar/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa/ sred pa dang bcas pa/ len pa dang bcas pa/ skye

ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las rnam par ma grol bas kyang / shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya

po 'di dag/ rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing / 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la bzhag par mdzad pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag/ sngon byung
ba| 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor ba/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab

mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'khrug long dang / nad 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rab tu zhi ba byed du bcug ste/ des bu gcig pa snying du sdug pa dang 'dra

bar rgyal srid skyong du bcug go/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin la btsun mo tshangs ldan zhes bya ba dang / rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin de la bu med nas/ de bu 'dod pas zhi
ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i bye brag 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /
sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dag dang / chos mthun pa dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten
na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dag dang / bu mo dag skye'o/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni/ de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/
dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar/ gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ ma'i mngal du mngal na gnas pa 'jug par 'gyur te/
gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag mngon
du gyur pa las/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len pa la zhugs pa na/ sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa yi dam brtan
pa zhig sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas btsun mo tshangs ldan gyi mngal du zhugs so/ /bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la/ ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod do/ /lnga gang zhe na/ skyes
pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes
pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na/ dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na/ dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o/ /de yid dga' zhing yid
dga' nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni/ 'di ltar/ bdag gi dku g.yas par brten cing mchis pas/ nges par
khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang yid dga' yid dga' nas 'di skad ces/ kye ma/ kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang / kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing
mi mthun par mi skye ba dang / kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir gso ba dang / bgo skal la spyod pa dang / kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par
'gyur ba dang / bdag cag shi zhing dus las 'das pa dag la nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes
su 'gro bar gyur cig/ ces ming gis yon tan bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do/ /de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste/ mngal na gnas
pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na/ grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang / sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang

mi kha ba dang / ha cang mi skyur ba dang / ha cang lan tshwa mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi mngar ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa ba dang / mngar ba

dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang / khri nas khrir
dang / khri'u nas khri'ur dang / shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang / des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jug go/ de nas dus gzhan

zhig na btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ kye ma/ lhas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag byin par gyur cing / bsod nams dag byed par gyur cing / lho sgo dang / nub sgo dang /
byang sgo dang / dbus kyi bzhi mdor yang sbyin par dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag byed cing / btson thams cad thar bar byed par gyur cig/ snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs

ldan la 'dod pa de lta bu de skyes par thos nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed do/ /de bzhin du lho sgo dang / nub sgo dang / byang sgo dang / dbus kyi bzhi mdor
yang sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag byed cing / btson thams cad thar bar byas so/ /yang btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ kye ma/ bdag lha dang lhan cig skyed mos
tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs te rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par gyur cig snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa rnam pa de lta
bu de skyes par thos nas/ btsun mo tshangs ldan dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs te rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag byas so/ /yang btsun mo
tshangs ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ kye ma/ bdag lha dang thabs cig chur 'jug pa'i grur zhugs te rdzing bu tshangs ldan du rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod
par gyur cig snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar thos nas btsun mo tshangs ldan dang lhan
cig chur 'jug pa'i gru me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos bkang bar zhugs te rdzing bu tshangs ldan du rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga'
mgur spyod pa byas so/ /de gru de nyid du btsas pa las/ khye'u tshe rabs dran pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ gsal ba/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs lta bu dang
ldan pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i bzang mtho ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i
btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di chu'i nang du btsas pa de'i phyir khye'u yi ming chu
skyes zhes bya'o/ /zhes de'i ming chu skyes zhes bya bar btags so/ /gzhon nu chu skyes/ ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i
ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/ /de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag
gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/ /de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gang nas shi 'phos te
'dir skyes snyam na/ sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes so/ /las ci byas na/ des sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes snyam na/ lo drug cur rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid
byed du bcug pas de dag tu skyes par shes so/ /da ltar gang du skyes snyam na/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po'i rigs su skyes par shes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang rgyal srid byed du
bcug na/ yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur na/ ma legs kyi/ bdag gis sgyu thabs cung zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas des bdag nyid 'phye bo nyid du bstan te 'dug go /gang gi nyin

mo gzhon nu chu skyes btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin mo blon po lnga brgya dag gi bu dag kyang btsas te/ de dag kyang rang rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i ming dag btags par gyur to/ /blon po de dag gi kun tu

spyod pa ni/ nyi ma re re zhing rgyal po tshangs byin dang / gzhon nu chu skyes bltar 'ong ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag mchong pa dang / dkyus mo byed nus par gyur to/ /

de nas rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te nga'i bu gzhon nu chu skyes kyang 'phye bor ma gyur tu zin na/ de yang da tsam mchod pa dang / dkyus mo byed nus par 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ bdag
gis de 'phye bo yin yang bla'i/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu chu skyes kyis de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po 'di
ni| gcugs med par gnod pa byed pa yin gyi/ bdag gis lkug pa nyid du bstan te 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /des ched du bsam ste lkug pa nyid du bstan te 'dug go/ de na dus gzhan zhig na/

gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag smra nus par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gi bu gzhon nu chu skyes kyang lkug par ma gyur tu zin na/ de yang da tsam smra nus par

'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de'i tshe na gzhon nu chu skyes kyi ming / gzhon nu chu skyes/ gzhon nu chu skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing / gzhon nu lkug 'phye/ gzhon nu lkug 'phye zhes bya ba'i ming
chags par gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal
gtad de thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ltar/ nga'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba la/ bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas nga 'das nas gdung chad par yang 'gyur
la| bu gcig bdog pa de yang lkug 'phyer gyur na/ da ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa gnyer te sman pa la rmas nas smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu
'di'i dbang po gsal bar gda' ste/ 'di la bro nad kyi rnam pa ni/ cung zad kyang ma mchis pas bsdigs par bgyi ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma dag bkug nas gsang ste bsgo
ba| ngas gzhon nu lkug 'phye 'di skye bo phal po che'i mngon sum du yongs su btang bar bya'i/ khyed kyis gsad par mi bya'o/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'khor gyi nang du song ste
gshed ma rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas gzhon nu 'di yongs su btang gi/ khyed kyis 'or cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan nas gzhon

nu lkug 'phye shing rtar bcug de/ grong khyer wA ra NA si'i nang nas phyir khrid do/ /de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes grong khyer wA ra NA si 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci/ wA ra
NA si 'di stong pa yin nam/ 'on te gnas pa yin/ gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkug 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/ lha/ gzhon nu lkug 'phyes tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod do/ /zhes smras so/ /
de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lkug 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/ gzhon nu gang gsod du gzhug par bya/ gang srog dang dbral bar bya/ gang

la ci zhig sbyin par bya/ de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis yang gshed ma rnams la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu 'di yongs su btang gi/ khyed kyis 'or cig /gshed
ma'i mi rnams kyis/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes yang gzhon nu lkug 'phye shing rtar bcug ste grong khyer wA ra NA si'i nang nas phyir khrid pa dang / gzhon nu lkug
'phyes mi'i ro mi bzhis khyer ba zhig mthong nas smras pa/ ci/ ro 'di shi ba nyid kyi ro yin nam/ 'on te gson po'i ro yin/ gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkug 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/
lha| gzhon nus tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod do/ /zhes smras so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis yang gzhon nu lkug 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/ gang
gsod du gzhug par bya/ gang srog dang dbral bar bya/ gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/ de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma rnams la smras
pa| ngas gzhon nu yongs su btang gi/ khyed kyis 'or cig/ gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes yang gzhon nu lkug 'phye shing rtar bcug ste grong khyer wA ra NA si'i nang
nas phyir khrid pa dang / gzhon nu lkug 'phyes 'bru'i phung po chen po zhig mthong nas smras pa/ gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung ma zos na/ chen por 'gyur ro/ /gshed ma'i mi rnams
kyis kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/ lha/ gzhon nus tshig 'di lta bu brjod do/ /zhes smras so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces

smras so/ /gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/ gang gsod du gzhug par bya/ gang srog dang dbral bar bya/ gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/ de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin
gyis yang gshed ma rnams la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu yongs su gtang gi/ shes ldan dag song la gzhon nu nags khrod du myur du sa thams su chug cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed

ma'i mi rnams kyis yang gzhon nu lkug 'phye shing rtar bcug ste nags khrod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / dong rko bar brtsams so/ /de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/

kha lo sgyur ba ci'i phyir khyed/ /brtad dang bcas pas dong rko byed/ /ci'i phyir khyed cag dong rko ba/ /dris pa nga la myur du smros/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras bu mi smra ba/ /lkug 'phye btsas nas
de yis ni/ /myur bar 'di ni nags khrod du/ /dong du chug ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni/ drag shul can/ lag pa dmar ba/ snun pa dang /
rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/ gzhan gyi srog gcod pa/ gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa dag yin pas/ gal te na/ 'di dag gis bdag gsad par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam du rig nas/
de skrag ste gshed ma rnams la smras pa/ gal te lhas bdag la dam pa zhig stsal na/ bdag rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug cing / tshig kyang smra'o/ /gshed ma rnams kyis rgyal po'i gan du song ste rgyas
par brjod pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te da rgyal srid 'dod na/ ngas de yang gzhon nu la sbyin no/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis yid dga' nas blon
po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la grong khyer thams cad myur du rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par zhog la/ bdug spos dang / phye ma 'khrigs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba
dan bsgreng ba dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa gyis shig/ rgyal po rnams ni/ tshig gis 'grub la/ lha rnams ni/ sems kyis 'grub/ rnal 'byor pa rnams ni/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams
cad 'grub pas/ blon po rnams kyis/ lha/ bka' stsal bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma med par bzhag cing / bdug

spos dang / phye ma 'khrigs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa byas so/ /ljongs kyi mi 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang gzhon nu lkug 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du
