'jug cing / tshig kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ya mtshan skyes nas 'dus par gyur to// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nyer dgu pa/ de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phye rkang pas
grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ bdag lkug ma lags 'phye
ma lags/ /glen pa ma lags blo med min/ /gsal bar bgyid pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /smra ba bdag lags mi dbang po/ /bdag lkug ma lags 'phye ma lags/ /glen pa ma lags blo med min/ /dbang
po tshang ba gsal ba dang / /ldan pa bdag lags mi dbang po/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci'i phyir tshig smra bar mi byed cing / rkang pas 'gro bar mi byed/ lha de'i slad du gson cig/ bdag gis
sngon gyi tshe rabs su/ /dgung lo drug cur bdag gis ni/ /mi rnams nang du rgyal tshab kyi/ /rgyal srid rigs mthun bgyid stsal pas/ /dgung lo stong phrag drug cu ru/ /sems can dmyal bar rab tu
bsregs/ /sems dmyal sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /drag po 'jigs rung dran gyur nas/ /rgyal srid mngon par mi 'tshal zhing / /slan chad sems dmyal mchi mi bgyid/ /yab kyis bdag ni rab 'byung

bar| |rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ drang srong dag gang gi phyir dka' thub kyis gdung ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin byed pa ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na/ khyod ci'i
phyir rgyal srid lag mthil na 'dug pa spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/ de na gzhon nu lkug 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'khon gcugs 'thab rtsod bgyid pa yi/ /'dod la spyod pa
bdag mi 'tshal/ /'khon gcugs 'thab rtsod 'jig bgyid pa'i/ /tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad par bgyi/ /kim pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yi/ /'dod pa spyod par bdag mi 'tshal/ /'bras bu bdud rtsi'i
ro bda' ba'i/ /tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad par bgyi/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bde ba gang dang gang dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni/ rgyal po nyid yin
na| khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/ de nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur ba'i/ /bde ba de la bder mi sems/ /
gang las bde ba skye 'gyur ba'i/ /sdug bsngal de la bde bar sems/ /yab kyis bdag ni dka' thub kyi/ /nags su mchi ba gnang bar mdzod/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ 'dir ni/ yang thog gi steng
bdug spos dang phye ma 'khrigs par me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gnas mal 'jam po legs par bshams pa dag tu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med par nyal bar bya zhing / sil snyan gyi sgra snyan pa
dag gis sad par bya ba dang / gos 'jam po bgo bar bya ba dang / zhim po bza' bar bya/ zhim po btung bar bya ba yin na/ dgon par rab tu byung bas rtag tu shing drung du rtswa bting ba'am/ lo ma
bting ba la bred ngas kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ri dwags gdug pa dag dang lhan cig nyal bar bya ba dang / wa'i skad kyis sad par bya ba dang / g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun bgo

bar bya ba dang / rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag bza' bar bya ba dang / chu dron po rnyog pa can dag btung bar bya dgos na/ ci'i phyir khyod rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/ de nas gzhon nu lkug
'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ nags na shing shun rtswa gyon zhing / /rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang / /ri dwags gdug pa rnams dang ni/ /lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi/ /'jig rten
pha rol 'jig bgyid pa'i/ /mkhas pa rgyal srid slad du ni/ /gsod dang 'ching dang rdeg pa dag/ bgyid pa de lta ma lags kyi/ /yab kyis bdag ni dka' thub kyi/ /nags su 'chi ba gnang bar mdzod//

rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ je kho bo'i the tshom gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang / de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung ba mi dka'o/ /khyod kyis grong khyer wA ra Na si 'byor pa dang rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces/
ci| wA ra NA si 'di stong pa yin nam/ 'on te gnas pa yin zhes smras pa de/ khyod kyis ci las bsam ste smras/ lha/ de'i slad du gson cig/ lhas bdag rgyu ma mchis par khum zhig ces bka' stsal
nas/ 'ga' yang ci'i slad du gzhon nu 'di dgum par bgyi zhes chos dang ldan pa'i tshig mi smra bas/ bdag gis de las bsam ste smras so/ /bu/ ma nyes so/ /khyod kyis mi'i ro mi bzhis khyer ba zhig
mthong nas 'di skad ces/ ci/ ro 'di shi ba nyid kyi ro yin nam/ 'on te gson po'i ro yin zhes smras pa de/ khyod kyis ci las bsam ste smras/ lha/ de'i slad du gson cig/ gang nongs pa bgyid pa'i
las bgyid pa'i ro de ni/ gum pa nyid kyi ro lags la/ gang legs pa bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa'i ro de ni/ gson po'i ro lags pas/ bdag gis de las bsam ste smras so/ /bu/ ma nyes so/ /khyod
kyis 'bru'i phung po chen po zhig mthong ba dang 'di skad ces/ gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung ma zos na/ chen por 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa de/ khyod kyis ci las
bsam ste smras/ lha/ de'i slad du gson cig /lha/ zhing pa gang dag 'dru skyin po bgyis te 'tshal nas bgyid pa de dag ni/ 'bru smin pa na 'bru'i phung po chen po bu lon pa dag la 'bul bar bgyid
pas| de dag gis ni/ dang po nyid nas drung 'tshal ba lags so/ /de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag gis mi nyid rnyed pa na/ gal te de rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam gsog par mi bgyid pa
de'i| sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang rgyun chad par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad na bde 'gro las yongs su nyams shing ngan 'gro la brten par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis de las bsam ste smras
so| |de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig thos nas mchi mas brnangs pas bu blangs te tshig smras pa/ brtul zhugs nges 'chang rang gi chos spyod cig /bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas len to/ /de nas rgyal
po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te gzhon nu lkug 'phye rab tu ma byung na/ cir 'gyur/ lha/ rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/ lha/ zham ring bar

'gyur ro/ /'o na/ de da rab tu 'byung na/ khyed kyi bu de dag ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / lha/ bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/ /de'i tshe na grong khyer wA ra NA si dang ha cang mi ring ba na bsti gnas

shig yod pa de na/ drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ brtse ba dang ldan pa/ sems can la byams pa zhig 'dug nas/ gzhon nu lkug 'phye 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa/ 'byor pa

rgya chen pos drang srong de'i drung du rab tu byung ngo / /drang srong des lkug 'phye la gdams ngag byin nas lkug 'phyes brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa dang / bsgrims pa byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum
du byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ drang srong de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas gzhon nu lkug 'phyes drang srong de'i lus spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi phung por bcer te bsregs nas mchod pa

dang / bsnyen bkur chen po byas so/ /gzhon nu lkug 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag yongs su bskyang bar brtsams nas/ de'i ming gzhon nu lkug 'phye/ gzhon nu lkug 'phye zhes bya ba gang yin

pa de nub par gyur cing / ston pa lkug 'phye/ ston pa lkug 'phye zhes bya ba'i ming chags par gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lkug 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u lnga
brgya po 'di dag mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du mi byed snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba dang / blugs gzar ba dang / dgang
gzar lhag pa 'chang zhing / shin tu lo ma dang / khre rgod dang / ut+pa la'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas ston pa lkug 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/
gal te bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag smad na/ dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa
yin pas/ de nas ston pa lkug 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog 'dod kyi/ nga'i gan du bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang /

'bras bu stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis kyang / dbyar gyi nang dag tu bram ze'i khye'u
rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las/ bram ze'i khye'u gang gis kyang mkhan po la bltar 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /dbyar gyi nang
dag tu bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stob pa gcig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las/ bram ze'i khye'u gang mkhan po la bltar 'gro ba de/ bdag
cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go /zhes khrims su byas pa bcas so/ /ston pa lkug 'phye zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na/ de'i gan du bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang

'bras bu stob pa gcig dang / de nyid kyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u gang yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /ston pa lkug 'phyes thag ring po kho na nas ri dwags mthong ngo / /mthong

nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /ri dwags tshur shog /ri dwags khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/ khyod kyang lto khengs pa'i zas kyis chog shes pa dang / kun tu chog pa yin la/ kho bo

yang lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang / kun tu chog shes pa yin no/ /'di na kha cig shin tu lo ma dang / khre rgod dang / ut+pa la'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa dag ni/ ma
yin no/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gor ma chag par mkhan po'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/ 'di ltar/ mkhan po ri dwags dang lhan cig phebs par smras par byed do/ /snyam

du rig nas/ ston pa lkug 'phye ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas ston pa lkug 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas ston pa lkug 'phye cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas
bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mkhan po dud 'gro rnams dang lhan cig phebs par smra bar byed kyi/ mi rnams dang mi byed gor ma chags snyam nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas

ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston pa lkug 'phye ga la ba der song ba dang / ston pa lkug 'phyes ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can de thag ring po che kho na nas mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /ri
dwags kyi brtul zhugs can tshur shog /ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/ khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang la/ kho bo
yang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang ngo / /khyod kyang shing shun gcig dang / dbyug gu gcig dang / ril ba gcig dang /
blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar gcig 'chang la/ kho bo yang shing shun gcig dang / dbyug gu gcig dang / ril ba gcig dang / blugs gzar
dang / dgang gzar gcig 'chang ngo / /khyod kyang lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang / kun tu chog shes pa yin la/ kho bo yang lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa
dang / kun tu chog shes pa yin no/ /'di na kha cig g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba dang / blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar dang / dgang gzar lhag par 'chang ba dag
ni| ma yin no/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar/ mkhan pos 'dod pa che ba smad cing / 'dod pa chung ba nyid bstod pa ni/ don gyis na/ mkhan pos bdag cag smad
pa yin gyi/ bdag cag gis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba dang / blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar lhag par dag chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du bor te/ mkhan po ga la
ba der dong ngo / /snyam nas/ de dag gis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / dbyug gu dang / ril ba dang / blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar lhag pa dag chu klung zlog byed du bor nas rgyud dag pa
dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis ston pa lkug 'phye ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas ston pa lkug 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas ston

pa lkug 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas/ 'di ltar/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du

byas par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan par byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa lkug 'phye gang yin pa de ni/ nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na

bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong nye sde yin te/ de'i tshe yang

ngas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten nas 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing / 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la bzhag par byas la/ da ltar yang

ngas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dang / rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten nas 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang / bde ba mya ngan las
'das pa la bzhag pa mdzad do/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig
tu dkar ba yin/ 'dres ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dres ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa dang / 'dres ma spangs nas/ las
gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya/ dge slong dag /de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/ /'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba ste/ bzhi pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa ma bkag pa de'i tshe na/ dge slong ma
rnams kyang dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do/ /de nas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i

mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang nags mun pa can ga la ba der song ste phyin nas shing ljon pa'i drung zhig tu brten te skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug nas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do/ /dge slong ma de dag phye ma red mnyan yod du 'jug 'dod nas smras pa/ 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog bslang bar bya'o/ /kha cig
gis smras pa/ 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog ni/ mthu che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/ dang po kho nar dbyar khang du 'gro bar 'gyur pa'i gnas kyang yod do/ /zhes zer nas/ de dag gis de

ma bslangs pa kho nar dong ngo / /ut+pa la'i mdog kyang phye ma red langs nas dge slong ma de dag thams cad dong bar mthong ba dang / des bsam pa/ ci/ da 'gro'am/ 'on te 'di nyid du 'dug snyam nas de de
nyid du 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so/ /g.yon can lnga brgya rtsam gyis las dag byas nas nags mun pa can du lhags te de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag las nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ skal ba
dag bgo bar bya'o/ /nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ nags byul bar bya'o/ /zhes de dag las nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ skal ba dag bgo bar brtsams/ nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ nags byul bar brtsams
pa dang / de dag gis ut+pa la'i mdog 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de na kha cig na re/ shes ldan dag /'di ni/ tho yor zhig yin no/ /zhes zer/ kha cig na re/ 'di ni/ mi zhig yin no/ /zhes zer/ kha cig
na re/ 'di ni/ dge slong zhig yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pa des smras pa/ 'di ni/ dge slong ma zhig yin gyi/ dge slong ni/ ma yin no/ /ji ltar shes/ dge
slong dag ni/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ dge slong ma rnams ni/ skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug go/ de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas shes ldan dag/ 'di lta bu'i nags 'jigs su rung ba'i nang na/
dge slong ma gcig pu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs pa la ltos zhes zer ro/ /de dag dmag dpon gyi gan du dong ba dang / dmag dpon gyis de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed kyis nags
mun pa can 'di na ngo mtshar can cung zad mthong ba yod dam/ mchis te/ 'di lta bu'i nags 'jigs su rung ba'i nang na dge slong ma gcig pu mtshan mo gnas pa
khas blangs pa mchis so/ /de blta'i/ /'dong ngo / /zhes de dag de'i drung du dong ba dang / dmag dpon gyis dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa mthong ngo / /mthong
nas kyang mngon par dad par gyur nas/ de mngon par dad pa skyes pas smras pa/ kye ma/ dge slong ma 'di ni/ gnyi ga nas bzang ba yin te/ mtshan mo zla nyi mo ltar 'dug pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs

bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa gang yin pas so/ /zhes de bslang bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ ci'i phyir 'di slong bar byed/ zas sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis
smras pa/ 'di ni/ dus ma yin par mi za'o/ /dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ 'di ni/ dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa yin no/ /dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ kye ma/ dge slong ma
'di ni/ gnyi ga nas bzang ba yin te/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa gang yin pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa gang yin pas so/ /yang smras pa/ 'di la chang blud par bya'o/ /
dge slong gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa/ 'di ni/ myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin no/ /dmag dpon gyis smras pa/ kye ma/ dge slong ma 'di ni/ gnyi ga nas bzang ba yin no/ gzugs
bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa gang yin pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa gang yin pas so/ /yang smras pa/ kho bos yon gnas zhing 'di lta bu la bsod snyoms kyis bsgrub par ma nus
so| |zhes des ras yug chen po la 'os pa gcig dang / bsod snyoms kyi phud cig phul nas/ shing ljon pa'i yal ga la btags te bzhag nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ 'di ltar khyod la mi mkhyen pa dang /
mi gzigs pa dang / ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas/ bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms dang na bza' 'di 'bul lo/ /zhes smras te song ngo / /ut+pa la'i mdog nang par sngar langs

pas skye bo phal po che'i rjen shul mthong nas des bsam pa dang / g.yon can lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs par mthong nas mi mdzes pa 'ga' zhig rig par ma byas sam snyam nas/ 'ga' yang ma byas par mthong ngo //
shing ljon pa'i yal ga la ras yug chen dang bsod snyoms btags te bzhag pa mthong nas des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ dad par gyur pa rnams kyis dad pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /snyam nas des bsam
pa| gal te byin len stob pa la bsdad na/ bya'am spre'us chud gzan par 'gyur bas/ bdag ni/ dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud 'bul ba yin la/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams la mi rung ba gang yin
pa de ni/ dge slong ma rnams la rung ba yin la/ dge slong ma rnams la mi rung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong rnams la rung ba yin pas bdag rang nyid kyis 'di khyer te dge 'dun la bsod snyoms
kyi phud 'bul du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des de khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi

sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/ nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ ut+pa la'i mdog mthong nas smras pa/ sring mo/ ci'i phyir nang par sngar mnyan yod kyi sgo dag phye ste 'ongs/
des smras pa/ bdag mnyan yod du ma mchis kyi/ bdag mdang sum nags mun pa can du mchis par khas blangs so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ nye dga' ni/ nyin mo nyid nags mun pa can du zhugs na yang
spu dag gyen du 'greng bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ khyer ba 'di ci yin/ des smras pa/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya tsam der mchis nas/ de dag dad par gyur pas bdag la dad pa'i dbang du bgyis pa stsal
to| |sring mo/ khyod ni/ chom rkun pas kyang dad par bya ba yin gyi/ gal te nye dga' de dag gis mthong du zin na/ lcag rgod mang pos btab ste khur tsha bar 'khrid par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar/ gang
la ras yug chen 'di lta bu yod pa de ni/ gos gsar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim byas te sems las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa/ khyod ras yug chen 'di
bzhed dam/ lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud phul te slar mchis kyi bar du gzhes shig dang / de'i 'og khyod la ras yug
chen gsol lo/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di la bslangs pa dang / de la sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ sring mo/ bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag khrid de

'ong gi/ de'i bar du 'di nyid du sdod cig /nye dga' rgyal byed tshal du zhugs pa dang / des dge slong bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag snying las chung ngur 'khod pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa

dag /sbyin bdag dag ni/ khur gyis ngal zhing sdod la/ khyed cag ni/ 'di na snying las chung ngur 'khod na tshur sheg /bsod snyoms kyi phung longs shig /de dag gis gzhong bu thogs te dong ba dang / ut+pa
la'i mdog gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi phud phul nas ras yug chen sprugs nas nye dga' la phul lo/ /nye dgas/ khyod sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs
dang / don gyi mchog dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /ut+pa la'i mdog gis bsam pa/ da dbyar khang du song ste ci rung / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
'tshal du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas ut+pa la'i mdog / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu
'dug go /de'i tshe na ut+pa la'i mdog gi chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnying par gyur nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /dge
slong ma rnams kyis dbyar gyi gos rnyed pa ma grub bam/ btsun pa/ grub bo/ /'o na/ ci'i phyir dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog gi chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnying par gyur/
btsun pa/ sring mo 'di ni/ dad pa ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can lags te/ 'dis sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun nam/ dge slong yid du 'thad pa dag la ma phul ba'am/ yongs
su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/ 'dis deng yang ras yug chen rnyed nas/ de yang 'dis btsun pa nye dga' la phul bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag/ dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos
lhag pa len tam/ btsun pa/ len to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag /dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la/ 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos lnga tshang ngam/ 'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di
ltar thob bo cog len par byed kyi/ nye du la ni/ byin yang len par mi byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong ma
ut+pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos gos lnga byin cig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos gos lnga byin no/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos
rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul
ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de bdag gi khyim nor du ma
dang ldan na/ bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags cung zhig kyang ma khyer ro/ /snyam nas/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa chung mas mthong nas smras pa/
rje'i sras/ khyod ci'i slad du phyag la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ bzang mo/ /kho bo'i khyim nor du ma dang ldan na/ bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags cung zad
kyang ma khyer te/ gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol te/ re re la ras bcos bu gsar pa phrugs re bskon na/ des bdag gi 'jig rten pha rol gyi
lam rgyags khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de bzhin mdzod cig /de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs nas
bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par
dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol ba ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des/ bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa legs par sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te/
gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod sbyor ba'i dus lags na/ da bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du
gsol zhes gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong
gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/ khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon no/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag des
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mas
bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun re re la ras bcos bu gsar pa phrugs re gsol to/ /
de nas khyim bdag des stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang
ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las
bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin pha zad tsam du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir log ste rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na/ gtong ba rjes su
dran pa sgom pa na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags mang du khyer gyi/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /chung mas
smras pa/ rje'i sras kyis ni/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags bsnams na/ bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /bzang mo/ bdag cag gnyis kyi longs spyod dag thun mong ma yin nam/ rje'i sras/
'di ltar skol cag gi longs spyod dag thun mong lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis kyang skye rgu'i bdag mo chen po go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bshos gsol te chen
po la 'os pa'i gos dag phul na/ de lta na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ bzang mo/ ci sngar sbyin pa byin nas/

phyis sbyin par byar med dam/ de bzhin gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ga la ba der song ste phyin nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i rkang pa
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis khyim bdag gi chung ma de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag
par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de stan las langs te/ skye rgu'i
bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong ma'i dge 'dun
dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis khyim bdag gi chung ma de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des/ skye rgu'i

bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen
mo go'u ta mi'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des de nyid kyi mtshan
mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa legs par sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te stan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/ skye rgyu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la spyan 'dren gyis/ 'phags
ma| gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i dus lags na/ da 'phags mas de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dro la bos so/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi snga dro sham thabs
bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te dge slong ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/ khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i bkad sa ga la ba
der song ste phyin nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma'i
dge 'dun bde bar 'dug par rig nas rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang
zhing bsod pas/ rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ des chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag gi sprog ma phye nas/ chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs
su 'dug go/ de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad pa/ gal te re zhig blangs
par gyur na ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi 'khrugs par yang 'gyur/ gal te ma blangs na ni/ khyim bdag gi chung ma'i bsod nams kyi bar chad dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'i bar chad du 'gyur
ro| |snyam mo/ /dge slong ma rnams kyis bsam pa/ kye ma/ 'phags ma skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs par gyur cig /bdag cag gis blangs par gyur na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dus lags pa'i slad du gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas/ khyim bdag gi chung ma
la yon bshad pa byas te stan las langs nas song ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug
go |mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /go'u ta mi/ ngas gnang ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis shes pa legs so/ /legs so/ de lta bas na/ ngas dge slong ma rnams kyis chen po la
'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas dge slong rnams dang lhan cig brje bar bya ba rjes su gnang ngo / /de nas dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis/ gos de dag khyer te drug sde
dag gi gan du dong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad de/ bdag cag gis chen po la 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa
'di dag khyed bzhes la/ bdag cag la ngan pa dag stsol cig /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ sring mo dag /bdag cag la dge slong ma'i ras ma dag dgos pa med de/ de'i tshe yang bdag cag byis
pa| rmongs pa/ mi gsal pa/ mi mkhas pa dag la khur dag bslang bar gyur gyi/ bdag cag mi len to/ /dge slong ma gzhan dag /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du dong ste smras
pa| 'phags pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad de/ bdag cag gis chen po la 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa 'di dag khyed bzhes la/
bdag cag la ngan pa dman pa dag stsol cig /sring mo dag/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ brjes pa ma gtogs so/ /de la brje ba ni/ 'di yin te/ de tsam gyis sam/ ji tsam gyis dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas brje bar bya'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/ bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / phri ba dang / drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod

do| |dge slong rnams la yang de dang mthun pa dang / de dang 'tsham pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge

slong dag /de lta bas na/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa yin la/ 'di ni/ gnang ba yin te/ nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma
yin pa las gos len na/ brjes pa ma gtogs te/ spang pa'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ nye dga'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di

pa'o| |nye du ma yin pa las zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs bdun pa tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma yin no/ /gos zhes bya ba ni/ gos bdun po bal gos dang /
sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /len na zhes bya ba ni/ bdag gir byed na'o/ /

brjes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/ brjes pa bzhag ste'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas/ ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/ de na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /
zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gos len na/ spang ba'i ltung byed
du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las yid gnyis za bas gos len na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du las nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes
kyis gos len na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du las yid gnyis za bas gos len na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba dang / legs par smra ba la
ltung ba med do/ /rdzogs par brnyan par byed pa dang / bor brlag byung ba la ltung ba med do/ /rin gyis len pa dang brjes pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong ma grags pa bsod nams che ba yin la/
des dge slong gi mdun du bzhag nas 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa/ bdag la rdzas 'di lta bu dag mchis kyi/ 'phags pas bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig ces brjod de/ mi ltos

par song ba la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /len pa'i spang ba ste/ lnga pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las

chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o/ /rje'i sras/ re zhig gzhon
pa'i gnas skabs su rol ba dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes mgur spyod pa mdzod la/ bgres pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub par mdzod cig/ bzang mo/ ji tsam du gzhon pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni/
grang ba dang / dro ba bzod pa yin pas/ je nor bsgrub par bya zhing / rgas pa'i gnas skabs su bde ba spyod cing 'dug par bya'o/ /chung mas bsam pa/ bdag gis bskur bar bya ba gang yin pa de rang nyid
byed do/ /snyam nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de ltar mdzod cig /khyim bdag des chung ma de la kha zas tsam byin nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ngo / /de'i chung ma des bsam pa/ bdag gis khyim thab

grang ba na grang bas sbrebs bzhin pa dang / tsha ba na tsha bas gdungs bzhin pa dang / bkres pa dang skom pas gnod bzhin pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg
pa dag gis nyen bzhin du longs spyod dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir spro bar byed/ 'bad par byed/ rtsol bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi phyir bya'o/ /snyam pa yin pas/ bdag
las med par 'dug pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ des tshong 'dus su song ste ras bal bzang po blangs nas dog pa bzang po bkal te/ tha ga pa mkhas pa la ras zung bzang
po 'thag tu bcug nas/ des ras de spos sna tshogs kyis bsgo ste/ gos kyi za ma tog tu bcug ste bzhag go /khyim bdag des kyang don legs par grub nas khe spogs rnyed
de legs par 'ongs nas/ chung ma des khyim bdag de khrus byas nas de la ras zung de phul lo/ /khyim bdag des bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di la kha zas tsam bzhag pa gang yin pa de dag thams
cad kyis kyang ras zung 'di mi rnyed do/ /snyam du rig nas chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ /ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/ rje'i sras/ je gsol cig /khyim bdag des de gyon nas yang dris pa/ bzang
mo| |ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/ rje'i sras/ je bshos snoms shig /des zan zos nas yang dris pa/ bzang mo/ /ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/ des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gis
smras pa/ bzang mo/ /legs so/ /kho bo ni/ sgrub pa yin la/ khyod kyang 'di ltar sbed pa yin na/ bdag cag gi longs spyod dag ring por mi thogs pa kho nar 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur
ro| |chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ 'di dag ni/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs pa lags kyi/ khyod kyis su la yang ma stsol cig /khyim bdag de dad pa dang ldan pa/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa
can yin pas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du byung ste 'gro ba na/ mi sgo bas mthong nas des bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na/

'dis ni/ rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin no/ /snyam mo/ /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/ nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo
na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ khyim bdag de mthong nas bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di/ ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na/ 'dis ni/ rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin gyi/ gal te bdag gis 'di ma 'phrog na/
nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo / /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag /'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba bzhin du ga las 'khor 'khor/
'phags pa/ bdag zong thogs te yul gzhan du mchis par gyur to/ /khyim bdag /khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po grub bam/ 'phags pa/ chang chung tsam mo/ /khyim bdag /mtshe'u ni/ rnyog pa can nam/

dang ba'i rgyu mthun pas rig par bya ste/ khyod ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na/ khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po grub par mngon pas tshur shog /chos bstan par bya'o/ /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal
te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag /bdag cag lha rnams su skyes so/ /snyam du sems la/ gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag /rang gi sha gang yin pa de yang bcad
cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag /bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so/ /snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin no/ /khyim
bdag des/ nye dga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang / nye dgas de la chos bstan par brtsams nas des de la ci nas
kyang de'i sems dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi gtam byas so/ /de dad par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa la legs par gsungs pa'i na bza' phrugs cig 'bul lo/ /bzhin
bzang / a rog kya/ sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog dang / lha rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig/ bzhin bzang
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces/ sang dag 'chi yang sus shes kyi/ /de ring nyid du brtul te bya/ /'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/ /khyed cag bshes pa ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ bzhin
bzang / khyed kyis ras zung bzang po gyon pa 'di nyid kho bo la byin cig dang / kho bos 'di la snam sbyar nyis rim byas te/ sems las chung dus dge ba'i phyogs la bde bar tron bya'o/ /'phags
pa| khyod 'di bzhed dam/ lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /'phags pa/ bdag khyod la mi 'bul ba ma lags na/ 'di ltar/ 'di ni/ mchis brang gis bdag la stsal pa lags
so| |khyim bdag/ kho bos khyod gzhan la dad par byas na/ khyod ko bud med kho na'i dbang yin nam zhes nye dgas dngan dus kyi phyed kyis de'i bla gos blangs nas/ de lag pa gnyis 'dril
bar byed/ bzhin sgyur bar byed do/ /khyim bdag gis de la smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ci'i tha tshig /khyim bdag /'di ni/ khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni/ yod na/
yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni med de/ nam zhig na 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed nas/ 'di las chos gos byed par 'gyur bas/ 'di chos gos kyi rdang kho na la zad par
'gyur ro/ /'phags pa/ ci/ bdag sgren mor mchi bar bgyi'am/ khyim bdag /khyod la gos gyon pas ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims dang / rigs dang / spyod pa gyon pas chog mod/ gcer bu pa ngo tsha shes

pa dang / khrel yod pa nyams pa de dag ni/ sgren mor 'gro na/ mi sdug pa yin gyi/ khyod lta bu ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa la sgren mor 'gro ba mi sdug pa ci yod/ khyim bdag/ khyod dor
thung mi gyon nam/ 'phags pa/ 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag /khyim bdag rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ dor thung gyon te/ shing tshal thogs nas ba lang gi phyi bzhin 'gro ba yin pas/ khyod kyang shing tshal

thogs la ba lang gi phyi bzhin song zhig dang / skye bo dag gis ba lang bsur 'gro ba phyir byung ba zhig yin par shes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes nye dgas dang na dus kyi phyed kyis de'i smad g.yogs kyang blangs

so| |khyim bdag de shing tshal thogs te ba lang gi phyi bzhin zhugs pa dang / mi sgo bas mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /kho bos da ci kho na khyod chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung gyon par mthong na/ ci/
de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mam/ bzhin bzang / kho bo chom rkun pa dag gis ni/ ma bcom mod kyi/ 'di ltar/ btsun pa nye dgas kha'i chos kyis bcom
mo| |khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang bar sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la
phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba yin pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang par sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig mnyan yod nas byung ste 'gro ba/ mi sgo bas mthong nas des smras pa/ khyim
bdag /khyod kyis don mthun mang du khrid de 'ongs kyi/ ci nas kyang mi chom par bag gyis shig /kye nang rje/ rgyal byed kyi tshal dang lam gyi bar na chom rkun pa dag 'khod dam ci/ lam gyi bar
ma yin gyi/ rgyal byed kyi tshal nyid na 'khod do/ /kye nang rje/ khyod ni/ bal gyi rigs nag po dang 'dra ste/ sgo 'di nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gshegs
pa gang gis kyang khyod dkar por mdzad ma spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul ni/ bdag gis mgos blangs pa yin na/ kha stsang gi
nyin mo khyim bdag cig chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung gyon te byung ba de'i ras de/ nye dgas kha'i chos kyis 'phrog nas/ khyim bdag de smad cing dor thung gis zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ de ni/ bdag gi bya ba yin no/ /snyam nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / nye dgas mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag a rog kya/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/

a rog ma kya yang rung ngo / /khyim bdag /khyod kho bo la sngan chad du ba 'thul na/ de ni/ me kho nar 'bar ro/ /kho bo mer mi 'bar du ji ltar rung / gzhan dag rab tu byung ba ni/ 'dod pa spang ba'i phyir

yin na/ btsun pa nye dga' ni/ 'dod pa mngon par spel ba'i phyir kho nar yin no/ /kho bos ci byas/ khyed kyis khyim bdag cig rgyal byed kyi tshal bltar 'ongs pa de'i ras zung dang na dus kyis 'phrog nas
khyim bdag de smod par mi byed dam/ nye dgas smras pa/ de ni/ 'jig rten na lha ni/ sbyin par byed la/ yi dwags ni/ zlog par byed do/ /zhes zer ba yin no/ /ci/ des khyod la ril ba b+hing gar thogs
te phul lam/ khyim bdag /gal te mi bzod na/ bslab pa'i gzhi 'char chug cig /ci/ kho bos de yal bar bor du re'am/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa 'di dag khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa las gos slong bar bgyid na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang gis 'phags pa dag
khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa las gos slong bar mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' bar mdzad
pa'i rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung pas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung
bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byung ba 'di
dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par
mdzad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga'/ khyod kyis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa
las gos bslangs pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma
yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grang du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis
'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste/ gos slong na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po sum cu ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod

na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu don mthun pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong pa na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas/
de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste gos slong na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bslab pa'i
gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas/ 'di na bdag la nye du 'ga' yang med kyi/ bdag cag mnyan yod du song na/ der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gos dag gis bgo bsha' byed par
'gyur ro/ snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/ ci/ bdag cag sgren mor 'dong bar bya'am/ mtshan mo 'gebs par 'dong bar bya zhing / nyin mo tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs te 'khod la/ mtshan mo lam
du 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de dag mtshan mo 'gegs pas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / dge slong nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i
rjes su brtson pa dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/ gcer bu sgre byi dag/ 'di khyed kyi 'dug gnas kyang ma yin/ gtsug lag khang yang ma yin na/ khyed ga las 'ongs/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/
bdag cag ni/ gcer bu ma yin no/ /'o na/ khyed cag su yin/ dge slong dag go /dge slong la 'di lta bu dag yod dam/ gang dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa dag ci 'dra ba yin/ khyed
cag ming ci/ grong phreng ba can de'i dge slong bzhi bcu'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes de dag gis de dag la la las ni/ snam sbyar byin/ /la las
ni| bla gos byin/ la las ni/ mthang gos byin/ la las ni/ rdul zan byin pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de lta bas na/ dus ma gtogs te/ de la dus ni/ 'di yin te/ dge slong gos 'phrog gam/ gos brlags sam/ gos tshig gam/ gos rlung gis khyer tam/ gos chus khyer na/ de la de ni/
dus yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la yang de dang mthun
pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa yin la/ 'di ni/ gnang

ba yin te/ nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song song ste/ gos slong
na| dus ma gtogs te/ spang pa'i ltung byed do/ /de la dus ni/ 'di yin te/ dge slong gos 'phrog gam/ gos brlags sam/ gos tshig gam/ gos rlung gis khyer tam/ gos chus khyer na/ de la

de ni/ dus yin no/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ nye dga'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni/ skyes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni/ bud med do/ /

nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun ba tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma yin no/ /gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni/ drung du song ste'o/ /gos zhes
bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /slong na
zhes bya ba ni/ slong mo byed na'o/ /dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/ dus bzhag ste'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/ /de
la dus ni/ 'di yin te/ dge slong gos 'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam/ g.yon can dag gis 'phrog par gyur
pa'o/ /gos brlags sam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag brlags par gyur pa'am/ 'khyams par gyur pa'o/ /gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag
mes tshig par gyur pa'o/ /gos rlung gis khyer tam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa'o/ /gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos

dag chus khyer bar gyur ba'o/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ rin thang dang / kha dog dang / khru tshad las te/ ji ltar rin thang las she na/ dge slong gis gos kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba slong bar byed

cing / des kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos thob na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ kaR+sha pa Na bcu ri ba dang /

kaR+sha pa Na bco lnga ri ba dang / kaR+sha pa Na nyi shu ri ba dang / kaR+sha pa Na lnga bcu ri ba'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing / des kaR+sha pa Na lnga bcu ri ba'i gos thob na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur

la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos slong bar byed cing / lhag pa thob na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa thob na/ ltung ba med

do| |kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ kaR+sha pa Na bcu ri ba dang / kaR+sha pa Na bco lnga ri ba dang / kaR+sha pa Na nyi shu ri ba dang / kaR+sha pa Na lnga bcu'i bar ri ba'i gos slong zhing lhag pa thob na/ de slong ba

la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ lhag pa thob na/ ltung ba med do/ /de ltar rin thang las so/ /ji ltar kha dog las she na/ dge slong gis gos sngon po slong bar byed cing / des gos sngon po thob na/ de slong ba

la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /sngon po ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang / dmar po dang / gos stug po dang / srab mo slong bar byed cing / des gos srab mo thob na/ slong

ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gos sngon po slong bar byed na/ ser po thob na/ sngon po slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ ser po thob pa la ltung ba

med do/ /sngon po slong ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / stug po dang srab mo slong ba na/ stug po thob pa na/ srab mo slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gong ma thob pa la ltung ba med

do| de ltar kha dog las so/ /ji ltar khru tshad las she na/ dge slong gis gos khru lnga pa slong bar byed cing / des gos khru lnga pa thob na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur

ro| |khru lnga pa thob pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang / khru bco lnga pa dang / khru nyi shu pa dang / khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing / gos khru lnga bcu pa thob na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su
'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis gos khru lnga pa slong ba na/ lhag pa thob pa na/ khru lnga pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /

lhag pa thob pa la ltung ba med do/ /khru lnga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang / khru bco lnga pa dang / khru nyi shu pa dang / khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing / de gos khru lnga bcu pa slong

bar byed na/ lhag pa thob pa na/ gos khru lnga bcu pa slong bar byed pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ lhag pa thob pa la ltung ba med de/ de ltar khru tshad las so/ /ras ma slong ba na/ kha tshar thob pa
dang / kha star slong ba na/ ras ma thob pa dang / ras ma slong ba na/ ras yug tshan dang ras yug phran thob pa la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor
ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /slong ba'i spang ba ste/ drug pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /nye dga' la blo skyes pa/ 'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas phyin chad gang nas kyang bca' ba'i rin tsam yang bslab
par mi nus na/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong phreng ba can ba'i dge slong bzhi bcu la brten nas bslab pa'i gzhi bag yangs su mdzad pa yod pas/ bdag gis grong phreng ba can pa'i

slong bzhi bcu po sngon du btang ste rnyed pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag ga la ba der song ba dang / ji tsam na grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag rnyang
rnying dag 'tshem zhing 'khod pa mthong nas/ des de dag la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag gis gzhan thos la/ gzhan mthong ste/ bdag grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag bsam

gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed cing 'dug par sems kyi/ bdag tshe dang ldan pa dag/ 'di ltar/ rnyang rnying dag 'tshem
zhing 'khod par mi sems so/ /gnas brtan/ bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/ /kye ma/ ma legs so/ /ma legs so/ /gnas brtan su'i mya ngan byed/ ci/ kho bo cag gi'am/ ma yin

te| gang dag gis khyed cag bcom pa'i ma byin pa len pa de dag sgren mo kho nar skye bar 'gyur zhing / sgren mo kho nar dus byed par 'gyur bas/ de dag gi mya ngan byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed ci'i phyir
gos dag mi slong / gnas brtan/ su zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun spangs te kho bo cag la sbyin pa dang / bya bar sems par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed cag bcom ldan 'das

kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu nges par bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dag ma yin nam/ gnas brtan/ kho bo cag gis su la bslang ba yang mi shes so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa dag/ dge slong rab tu shes pa gang gis khyed cag gi gos dag slong bar 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig la ci'i phyir mi bcol/ gnas brtan/ dge slong rab tu shes pa su
zhig bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i phyogs su nyams par byas te/ kho bo cag gi don du gos dag slong bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ re zhig kho bo bdag nyid dang bcu pa la yang thabs yod la/
gzhan yang kho bo cag mi drug re re yang bdag nyid dang bcu pa yin pas/ kho bo cag mi drug cu la yang thabs yod do/ /gzhan yang gal te khyed cag la mi gnod na/ kho bo cag kyang gzhon nu dag
gi don du ras yug phran dang / ras yug chen slong bar byed do/ /gnas brtan de la kho bo cag la gnod pa ci yod/ re zhig re res kyang chos gos gsum gsum slong la rag go/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag/ kho bo cag gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang / gos dag bslang ba gnyi ga mi nus kyi/ 'di ltar/ gang gi tshe phyi rol tu zas la bos pa de'i tshe bslang bar bya'o/ /zhes nye dga' de gtsug
lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas des bsam pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na/ des mnyan yod thams cad chub par 'gyur snyam nas/ des
yang bsam pa/ je dang po kho nar dbul po'i srang du 'gro bar bya zhing / de'i 'og tu phyug po'i srang du 'gro bar bya/ de'i 'og tu ko sa lar byung ba rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang dang / btsun mo

rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma'i khyim dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin pa dang rnying pa gnyis kyi khyim dang / dge bsnyen ma
ri dwags 'dzin gyi mas ga'i khyim dang / dge bsnyen ma khyim bdag gi chung ma legs skyes kyi khyim dag tu 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas nye dgas gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gal te khyed cag la las su bsko ba dag 'ongs par gyur na/ khyed cag
gis mi mnod par 'di skad ces/ bdag cag la mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gi bya ba cung zhig yod do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /nye dgas/ phyi de nyin par gzhon nu zhig grong phreng ba can pa'i
dge slong bzhi bcu po dag gi gan du btang ste/ chos gos dag bslang gi/ tshur shog cig ces spring ngo / /gzhon nu der song ba dang / ji tsam na de dag snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas des bsam pa/

snying rje med pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba su zhig 'di dag ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong bar 'gyur snyam nas de nye dga'i gan du song ste smras pa/ slob dpon/ de dag snyoms par
zhugs shing mchis pas/ sus kyang de dag ting nge 'dzin de las slong bar ma nus so/ /nye dgas smras pa/ bkren pa/ khyod brtson 'grus 'di lta bus zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur
ram/ nye dga' rang nyid 'gro'o/ /zhes de song nas dpong sa'i khang par sgo glegs la rting bas brdabs pa dang / dpong sa'i khang pa thams cad 'gul nas/ de dag
ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong bzhi bcu po dag /chos gos gsum bslang bar bya na/ khyed cag snying las chung ngur 'khod dam/ tshur sheg /'dong ngo / /gnas
brtan/ je so shing bor nas 'dong ngo / /tshur sheg /lam ga nyid du 'or cig /de dag 'phags pa dang nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ kho bo cag drug sde dag ni/ bya rog dkar po dang 'dra
bas/ kho bo cag gis rgan rim bzhin du 'khod par mi bya bar/ bar bar du rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya'o/ /de dag dbul po'i srang du dong nas dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang / de dag gis mthong
nas nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/ bzhin bzang dag/ nyes dmigs byung ngo / /ci nongs/ khyod kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi
bcu po gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/ bkur ba/ bsngags pa/ rab tu bsngags pa de dag thos sam/ thos so/ /de dag chom rkun pa dag gis
bcom mo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mda' gzhu longs shig /phub dang / dbyug pa dag longs shig /chom rkun pa dag 'dzin tu 'dong ngo / /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ de dag
bcom nas yun ring du lon cing / yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/ /'o na ji ltar bgyi/ de dag la gos dag byin cig /de dag gis de dag la gos gsar pa dang rnying pa dag byin no/ /de
dag gis gos de dag khur du drags te/ gzhon nu dag la gtad nas smras pa/ dengs la 'di dag gtsug lag khang du skyol cig /gzhon nu dag gis de dag khyer te gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /
de dag phyug po'i srang du dong nas dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang / de dag nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/ nyes dmigs byung ngo / /ci nongs/ khyed
kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/ bkur ba/ bsngags pa/ rab tu bsngags pa de dag thos sam/ thos so//
de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mda' gzhu longs shig /phub dang / dbyug pa dag longs shig /chom rkun pa dag 'dzin du 'dong ngo / /drug sde/
dag gis smras pa/ de dag bcom nas yun ring du lon cing yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/ /'o na/ ji ltar bgyi/ de dag la gos dag byin cig/ de dag gis de dag la chen po la 'os
pa'i gos dag byin to/ /drug sde dag gis gos de dag khur du drags te gzhon nu dag la gtad nas smras pa/ dengs la 'di dag gtsug lag khang du skyol cig /de dag gis gos de dag khyer te gtsug
lag khang du dong ba dang / de dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang du dong nas dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang / ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
gyis de dag mthong nas nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/ lha/ nyes dmigs byung ngo / /ci nongs/ lhas grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi
bcu po gang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/ bkur ba/ bsngags pa/ rab tu bsngags pa de dag gsan tam/ thos so/ /de dag chom rkun pa dag gis
bcom mo/ /rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/ song la myur du chom rkun pa dag dang / rkun rdzas dag khug cig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ lha/ de dag ni/ bcom nas yun
ring du lon cing yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/ /'o na/ ji ltar bya/ lha/ de dag la gos stsol cig /rgyal pos dge slong re re la yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no/ /drug sde dag
gis gos de dag khur du drags te gzhon nu rnams la gtad nas smras pa/ dengs la 'di dag gtsug lag khang du skyol cig /de dag gis gos de dag khyer te gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /
grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan dag/ da chog gi/ thong zhig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ha cang
brtabs ma ngas shig /khyed la kho bo cag gis dang po nyid nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gal te khyed la mi gnod na/ kho bo cag kyang gzhon nu dag gi don du ras yug phran dang / ras yug chen
po dge slong ngo / /zhes ma smras sam/ de dag dge slong dbang cher grags pas bsgo bas cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /de dag btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma'i khyim dang / btsun mo phreng ldan

ma'i khyim dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa gnyis kyi khyim dang / dge bsnyen ma ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga'i khyim dang / dge bsnyen ma
khyim bdag gi chung ma legs skyes kyi khyim du mthar gyis dong ste sngar bsten pa skad brjod pa dang / de dag gis kyang dge slong re re la yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no/ /de nas drug sde dag
gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gal te dge slong brgya gral du ma bkod na/ gral stongs par 'gyur gyi/ dengs la gral du bkod cig /ma nyes te/ bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms blangs te

'ong ngo / /drug sde dag gis gtsug lag khang du dong ste/ rnyang rnying dag las bzhi bcu phung por byas te bzhag go/ /dge slong bzhi bcu po dag zas kyi bya ba byas te 'ongs pa dang / drug sde dag gis/

lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /tshur sheg /don nyung du dag bos shig /de dag gis de dag pos pa dang drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci/ kho bo cag khyod kyi gos
srung ba yin nam/ rang gi gos dag longs shig /dge slong bzhi bcu po dag gis phan tshun gdong du lta bar brtsams pa dang / drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci'i phyir

phan tshun gdong du lta/ gnas brtan dag/ thams cad rnyang rnying sha stag yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ 'di dag mdud pa 'or cig dang / snam sbyar yin no/ /'di dag ni/ drubs shig dang / bla gos yin no/ /
'di dag ni/ drubs shig dang mthang gos yin no/ /'di dag ni/ drubs shig dang rdul gzan yin no/ /gal te mi dga' na/ 'dong dang yang bslang bar bya'o/ /kye ma'o/ /gnas brtan dag /'di dag nyid kyang

ma blangs kyang rung ngo / /de dag gis rnyang rnying de dag khyer te dgon par dong nas 'tshem zhing 'khod do/ /thams cad du sgra grags pa/ grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag re res kyang yo byad bcu
gsum bdun bdun rnyed do/ /zhes de dag dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag gis gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/ bdag cag gis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge

slong bzhi bcu po dag re res kyang yo byad bcu gsum bdun bdun rnyed do/ /zhes thos na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gos rnyang rnying dag 'tshem zhing 'khod do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyed cag gis lta kho bo
cag rang rang gis 'phrag pa dag gis kyang khyer zhes kyang thos so/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen
bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag /khyed
len pa'i drod mi shes pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang / mi sbyor ba dang / ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags par mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs
pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/
dge slong gos 'phrog gam/ gos brlags sam/ gos tshig gam/ gos rlung gis khyer tam/ gos chus khyer na/ khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la gos
bslang bar bya'o/ /gal te de la bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa can zhig gis/ dus kyi gos mang po stob par 'dod na/ dge slong des de las gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i
mthar thug par blang bar bya'o/ /de las lhag par len na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /gos 'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di
lta ste| dge slong gis gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam/ g.yon can dag gis 'phrog par gyur pa'o/ /gos brlags sa ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag brlags sam/ 'khyams
par gyur pa'o/ /gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o/ /gos rlung gis khyer tam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer
bar gyur pa'o/ /gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi gos dag chus khyer bar gyur pa'o/ /khyim bdag ces bya ba ni/ skyes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni/ bud med

do| |nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma yin no/ /gan du song la zhes bya ba ni/ gan du song ste'o/ /gos
zhes bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /blang
bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ slong mo bya ba'o/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni/ gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/
stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni/ gnyis te/ dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang / khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong gi stod
g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni/ gsar pa las snam sbyar nyis rim dang / ras yug phran khru lnga pa dang / do pa'o/ /khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni/ ras yug chen

khru bcu gnyis pa dang / ras yug phran khru bdun pa dang / do pa'o/ /de las lhag par len na zhes bya ba ni/ gong ma'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba
bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang pa'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas/ khyim pa'i stod
g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/ lhag pa slong ba na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs

dang bcas pa slong bas dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/ lhag pa slong na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ thob na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong khyim
pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas/ khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/ gal te chung na yang bslang bar mi bya la/ lhag na yang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dge
slong dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas/ dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/ gal te chung na yang
bslang bar bya la/ lhag na yang sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar na/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las/ lhag par slong ba dang / dge slong gi stod g.yogs
smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag pa sbyin par mi byed na/ thams cad du spang ba'i lhung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/ de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/ ltung
ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/ ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan
zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de yang snga ma'i
rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/ de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na/ de la ni/ ltung ba med do/ /de bzhin du dge slong
gis ji tsam du spang ba'i dngos po de nyid kyis ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par ltung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ dra ba'am/ phor bu'am/ ska rags sam/ dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad

gang rung ba nye bar 'jog par byed na/ de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /slong bar rigs
pa'i spang ba ste/ bdun pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na
khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /khyim bdag de gzhan gyi chung ma la chags

par gyur nas/ de la chung mas/ rje'i sras/ de ltar ma mdzad cig ces phyir bzlog na/ ji tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang phyir ma log pa de tsam du de'i chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul pa
rtsom par byed do/ /khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/ chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas/ de ltar khyim de gnyi ga nas rgud par gyur nas/ de gnyis
la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas/ khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so/ /zhes khu tshur dang / thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do/ /bu mo des smras pa/ bdag gis khyim
rgud par gyur pa 'di ci las gyur par 'tshal mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags par brjod par bgyir rung / nye dgas de tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag
gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste/ ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags
pa brjod cing / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas/ des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so/ /khyim bdag de gtum pa/ rtun
ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin pas/ yang bu mo de la rdeg par brtsams pa dang / chung mas de la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe
ko rdeg par mdzad mod/ da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas/ 'di ltar/ 'jig rten ni/ rang gi las kyi
'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas/ su zhig su'i bran lags/ bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig/ bzang mo/ khyod zer ba ma nyes so/ /bu mo tshur shog /khrus gyis la shog cig /bu mo
de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang / des de la gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/ bu mo/ /dga' zhing las byos shig /bu mo des bsam pa khyim bdag khyo shug 'di/ sngon gtum pa/ rtun
ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin te/ yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang / thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed cing / zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed na/ da 'di bdag gi pham dang
'dra bar gyur to/ /snyam nas/ yang bsam pa/ gang tshun chad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas/ bdag gis
'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya snyam nas/ des bsam pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di las cung zhig brkus te dbul du ni/ khyim bdag 'dis bdag rdeg 'tshog mang po byas te/ sngon gyi
gnas su 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de sdod cing 'dug go/ khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig /'phags pa nye dga' ni/ bdag cag gi
dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ 'phags pa nye dgas bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/ yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis
sdud par byed pas/ bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bzang mo/ de bzhin bya'o/ /ci zhig bgyi/ de la ras yug chen gcig dbul bar bya'o/ /bu mo des de thos
nas bsam pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
la zhugs te/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang / bu mo des khyim legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas/ des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal
te smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par bgyi'o/ /khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsam pa/
sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so/ /snyam nas/ des gshe ste smras pa/ bu mo/ /gal te bden par gyur na ni/
ngas khyed la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya'o/ /ji ste rdzun par gyur na ni/ rdeg 'tshog mang po byed du bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyo ba mang du mdzad na/
bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /de zhugs nas/ stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag de chung ma dang bcas pas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ches dma'
ba blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun na 'dug go/ nye dgas smras pa/ khyim bdag de kho bo la bskon par bya ba'i ras yug chen gang yin pa de blta'o/ /de gnyis kyis phan tshun gdong du blta
bar brtsams te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag cag gis kyang gsang ste smras pa de/ 'phags pa la sus bgyis/ ci/ 'phags pas gzhan gyi sems kyang mkhyen tam/ nye
dgas smras pa/ kho bo lhung bzed du zos shing so lhags pa dang / skra dkar por gyur pa yin na/ kho bo la de tsam yang mi srid dam/ khyim bdag des ras yug chen de blangs te nye dga' la
phul ba dang / nye dgas ras yug chen de mthong nas lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/ bzhin sgyur bar byed do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar mdzad/
zhal sgyur bar mdzad/ nye dgas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ 'di ni/ khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni/ yod na/ yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni/ med de/
ras yug chen 'di ni/ mchil lham 'phyi ba'am/ skar khung glan par rung ste/ 'di ni/ chos gos kyi rdang la yongs su zad pa dang / mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /'o na/ ji ltar bgyi/ ras yug chen bzang
po gzhan byin cig /ras yug chen gzhan ma mchis so/ /tshong dus nas nyos la byin cig /rin ma mchis so/ /dus thob la byin cig /khyim bdag des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /
chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag cag la 'phags pa nye dgas phan btags kyi/ ras yug chen 'jol la de la phul cig /khyim bdag de nye dga' dang lhan cig tu srang du song nas tshong khang du phyin pa
dang / nye dgas bsam pa/ tshong pa 'di nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste/ des na ras yug chen bzang po ster bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ nye dgas khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ tshong pa 'di ni/ bcam
bu zhig yin pas/ 'di la ras yug chen bzang po med kyi/ gzhan du 'dong ngo / /tshong pa des de thos nas des chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen bstan te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ras yug chen la
gzigs/ ras yug chen 'di ni/ bzang na/ 'di rin ji tsam/ 'di dang 'di tsam mo/ /khyim bdag 'di 'jal lo/ /khyim bdag 'jal lam/ 'jal lo/ /dus ji tsam na/
dus 'di tsam na'o/ /tshong pa des khyim bdag de la ras yug chen de byin nas/ khyim bdag des nye dga' la phul ba dang / nye dgas khyim bdag a rog kya zhes smras nas/ khyod sbyin pa 'dis
sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig /ces smras te song ngo / /khyim bdag de
longs spyod bsrabs nas/ des rin de dus de tsam gyis 'bul bar ma nus nas/ tshong pa des khyim bdag de nyi ma la btags pa dang / de chung po grogs dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ ci/ khyod
zhun mar 'thungs sam/ 'on te rims kyis btab/ bu lon pas bzung ste 'dug go/ khyod kyi phas kyang bu lon pa yod par ma byas/ mes po dag gis kyang ma byas na/ bu lon pa ga las
gyur/ des smras pa/ gang dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la dad par byed pa de dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar/ gang byin pa de mi len par lhag pa slong bar byed do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes
bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye
dga' la rmas pa/ nye dga'/ khyod gang byin pas mi mgu zhing lhag pa slong ba bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/
rjes su mthun pa yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad
nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs
pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin dag
spags nas/ bdag gis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis/ gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no/ /snyam pa las/ de na gal
te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs bar rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste/ bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces/ tshe
dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs
par skon cig ces smas te gos grub na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni/ shAkya'i bu nye dga'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /khyim bdag ga ma zhes bya ba ni/ skyes
pa'o/ /khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni/ bud med do/ /nye du ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma
yin no/ /gos kyi rin dag ces bya ba ni/ gser ram dngul lo/ /gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig ces bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i
gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /nyos la zhes bya ba ni/ nyos te'o/ /dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang zhes bya
ba ni/ shAkya'i bu nye dga'o/ /de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no/ /snyam pa las zhes bya ba ni/ longs spyad par bzod pa'o/ /de na gal te dge slong de la de sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba
ni/ sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/ /rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste zhes bya ba ni/ bsnyen bkur byed po zhig byung ste'o/ /bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ rab dang mchog gi
