pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ gsar pa sra bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gal te de la
gding ba rnying ba bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba gzhan yod na'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/ ston pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang la ni/ tshad dang ldan pa'i

khru'i khru phyed dang do yod do/ /'khor bas zhes bya ba ni/ kun nas mtho res yod pas so/ /glan par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sbyar bar bya ba'o/ /ma glan par zhes bya ba ni/ ma sbyar bar ro/ /spang ba'i

ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong
gis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par ji tsam cung zad du gding ba gsar pa spyod par byed na/ thams cad kyi thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du
'gyur ro/ /gding ba rnying pa thams cad kyi thams cad du sha zad pa dang / bug rdol du gyur pa dang / bcos su mi rung ba yin na/ ltung ba med do/ /de tsam med na/ ltung ba med do/ /las
dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med da/ /mtho gang gi spang ba ste/ bco lnga ba rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni/ rkang pa spe'u'i

zhag gis bskus te 'gro ma yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed/ 'ong na yang glo bur 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /
yu bu cag ni/ khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong / gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa thob pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyi/ yu bu cag kyang
'dong ngo / /gang du 'dong / gang du don mthun 'grub par ro/ /de dag gis bsam pa/ gal te thams cad dong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis nye bar spyod pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag kyang
lhung bzed nag po can dag gis rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag gis gcig bzhag ste 'dong bar bya na/ su gzhag par bya/ btsun pa 'char ka'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka/
khyod 'di nyid du 'dug cig /kho bo cag 'dong bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig ces 'char ka de nyid du 'dug go/ lnga po dag gis don mthun bcal bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis
bal yul du 'gro ba'i don mthun mthong nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag/ khyed gang du 'phags/ 'phags pa dag bal yul du'o/ /bzhin bzang
dag /kho bo cag kyang khyed dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag/ bal yul ni/ rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba lags pas khyed cag der dgyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang dag/ gal te de
lta bu yin du zin kyang yul mthong bar 'gyur bas 'dong bar bya'o/ /'phags pa dag/ gal te de ltar na tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /drug sde dag don mthun de dang lhan cig bal yul du 'phags

nas mthar gyis bal yul du phyin pa dang / nyi ma gang kho na la bal yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas de dag nang par sngar langs te lam srang du dong ba dang / tshong
pa dag gis drug sde dag mthong nas/ de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bal yul ci 'dra/ khyed cag mngon par mi dgyes par ma gyur tam/ bzhin bzang
dag/ nyi ma gang kho na la bal yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/ /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis khyed dang po kho nar bal yul ni/ rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra
ba lags pas khyed cag der dgyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes ma bgyis sam/ bzhin bzang dag/ ci/ de ltar na 'gro'am/ 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis zong ma
bsgyur te/ de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag cag dang bshes pa'i tshong pa gzhan dag mchis pa de dag gis zong bsgyur bas de dag la gtad par bgyi'i/ de dag dang thabs cig bzhud
cig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ de ma nongs kyi/ de bzhin bgyi'o/ /bal yul na bal dang ldong ros gnyis mod pas don mthun de dag gis bal gyis shing rta bkang ste chas pa dang drug sde
dag kyang don mthun dang lhan cig 'phags so/ /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ rdul gyis 'jigs pas yang na ni/ don mthun gyi mdun du 'gro/ yang na ni/ phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro
bas| de dag don mthun gyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na tshong pa de dag gi shing rta'i srog shing chag nas tshong pa de dag gis bsam pa/ gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na/
sgras chom rkun pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis dang por bdag cag gsod par 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu nor yang 'phrog par 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag gis gces pa dag khyer te 'dong
ngo| |snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing 'khod pa dang / drug sde dag lhags nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ ci'i phyir yid mi dga' zhing 'khod/ 'phags pa dag/ shing rta'i
srog shing chag ste gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na/ sgras chom rkun pa dag mchi bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis dang por bdag cag bkum par 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu nor yang 'phrog
bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag gis gces pa dag 'chal te mchi'o/ /snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing mchis so/ /bzhin bzang dag/ khyed kyis bal dag yongs
su btang ngam/ yongs su btang ngo / /gal te khyed cag la mi gnod na/ zhwa dang / lham sgreg gu can dang / stod kor nang tshangs can dang / rgya cang dang / lcag bod dang / shur bu phre'u la
sogs pa'i don du cung zhig bkur ro/ /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag la 'dis ci bgyi/ thams cad snoms shig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ phyag dar khrod rnyed
do| |zhes de dag lnga char gyi lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag gcig gis bkur nas mi bzhis de nyid las thag pa bkal te khur po che bzhi drags nas de dag gis de khur te dong ngo / /de dag
gis khur de dag khyer te 'phags pa dang / tshong pa de dag gis drug sde dag bal gyi khur blangs te phyi bzhin 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis gla mi dag khrid
de mchi'o/ /snyam du bsam na/ khyed cag gis bal 'di thams cad bsnams te byon gyi/ 'phags pa dag la gla gsol lo/ /bkren pa dag/ kho bo cag khyed kyi gla mi dag yin nam/
'phags pa dag/ mad kyang bzhad gad bgyi'o/ /don mthun de'i nang na mu stegs can dag cig 'dong ba de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma drug sde dag/ khyed cag gang du khur 'jig par
'gyur/ gang du rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur/ khyed kyi ma'i lto dral te der khur 'jig par 'gyur zhing / der rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ gal te don
mthun dang lhan cig 'dong na/ mtho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gi don mthun gyi mdun du 'dong ngo / /zhes de dag don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags te 'dong ba dang / ri brag cig na chom rkun pa gcad
pa'i phyir yang rgod kyi mi mang po bkod cing 'khod pa de dag gis de dag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang nyam nga bar gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ glang po che dang
bcas pa'i dmag byung ngo / /zhes ri brag pa de dag thams cad skrag nas nags khrod du byer ro/ /de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag ma yin
gyi| 'di ltar/ rnga mo dag cig 'ong ba yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ rnga mo ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar glang dag cig yin no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ glang ma yin gyi/ 'di
dag ni/ khur thogs pa dag cig yin no/ /de dag thag nye bar gyur pa dang / yang rgod de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed cag 'di lta bu'i khur dag thogs pas de'i phyir ri brag pa
thams cad skrag ste nags khrod du byer ro/ /bkren pa dag/ gal te chom rkun pa dag gis khyed cag de ltar bred ngas par shes par gyur nas nyin mo'i nyi ma kho na la yang bcings te nags
khrod du khrid par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo nye dga'/ gal te lam du 'dong na/ mtho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gi/ lam gol bar 'dong ngo / /zhes de dag lam gol bar
zhugs te dong ba dang / sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba bsgugs pa'i phyir 'ge 'gu pa'i mi mang po dag bkod cing 'khod pa dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/ e ma'o/ /
tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag ci'i phyir sho gam dral te 'dong / bkren pa dag/ kho bo cag khyed kyi tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag yin na/ khyed cag su yin/ 'phags pa drug sde dag
gam/ yin no/ /bzhud cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'/ gal te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas zhugs na/ lhung bzed nag po can dag las mtho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung
gi| sge'u chung nas 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de dag sge'u chung nas zhugs pa dang rgan zhugs shig gis mthong nas des smras pa/ e ma'o/ /khur tsha ba dag/ ci'i phyir grong dral te 'jug
par byed/ rgan zhugs/ kho bo cag khyod kyi khur tsha ba dag yin nam/ des smras pa/ khyed su yin/ tshe dang ldan pa drug sde dag gam/ yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag byon pa legs so/ /byon
pa legs so/ /de dag nang du zhugs nas de dag gis bal gyi khur de dag bshig pa dang / ri rab kyi rnam pa 'dra ba'i phung po chen por rnam par gnas so/ de dag la dge slong rnams kyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed cag khur 'di lta bu dag thogs na/ khyed la mtho 'tsham pa dag mi 'byung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci/ kho bo cag gis bza' ba kho na'i phyir kha mngon
par bsgrubs sam/ gang kho bo cag la mtho 'tsham par byed pa de la kho bo cag gis kyang nyis 'gyur sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong don nyung ngu dag/ ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis
ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed
kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/
tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad pa mdzad nas/ dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca'
bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la 'dod
na| dge slong des blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas 'khyer ba med na/ dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par khyer na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge
slong zhes bya ba ni/ drug sde dag gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /lam du zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni/ dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pas so/ /lug bal dag ces bya ba ni/ lug gi bal dag
go| rnyed la zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las so/ /'dod na zhes bya ba ni/ gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /dge slong des blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mnod par bya'o/ /blangs nas 'khyer ba med na zhes bya
ba ni/ rung bar byed pa med na'o/ dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bar tshun chad du'o/ /bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/
bdag rang gis bkur bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ de las thal bar khyer na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba
bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis lug bal dag rnyed la khyer ba med na/ bdag nyid kyis dpag tshad
gsum gyi mtha' las 'das par khyer na/ rgyang grags phyed du phyin na/ nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khyer ba yod bzhin du bdag nyid

kyis khyer na/ rtsom pa'i dus kho na na/ nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rgyang grags phyed du phyin na/ nyes byas gzhan zhig tu 'gyur/ rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /rdul
phra rab drug la rdul phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/ chu rdul drug la lcags rdul gcig go/ lcags rdul drug la ri bong rdul gcig go/ ri bong rdul drug la lug
rdul gcig go/ lug rdul drug la glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul drug la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go /sro ma drug la shig gcig go/ shig drug la
nas gcig go/ nas drug la sor gcig go/ sor bzhi drug la khru gang ngo / /khru phyed dang bzhi la mi'i srid do/ /khru bzhi la gzhu'o/ /gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags gcig go/ rgyang grags
brgyad la dpag tshad gcig go/ de la dge slong dgon pa ba lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la de blangs te 'khyer ba med na/ rgyang grags kyis chod pa'i grong bdun po dag gi grong phyed du
ni| nyes byas su 'gyur la/ grong gi mthar ni/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /grong nas dgon pa'i lam du 'jug na/ rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/

rgyang grags re rer spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /zhwa dang / lham sgro gu can dang / stod kor nang tshangs can dang / rgya cang dang / lcag bod dang / shur bu phre'u la sogs pa'i don du de tsam dag
khyer ba la ni/ ltung ba med do/ /las dang po ba dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /bal thogs pa'i spang ba ste/ bcu drug pa
rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga'
bo nye dga'/ bal bgo bar bya'o/ /cha dur bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis btsun pa 'char ka 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pa la ci'i phyir skal pa sbyin/ cha ldar bya'o/ /'char kas

thos nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed kyis der rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang khyed kyis gyis shig/ kho bo 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang kho bo nyid kyir bya'o/ /
nye dgas bsam pa/ 'di 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa mang po grub gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag dus thams cad du drug sde yin na/ da
ci'i phyir lnga sder 'gyur bar bya/ cha drug kho nar bya'o/ /sus dgod du gzhug/ btsun pa 'char ka ma dub pa yin gyi/ de 'god du gzhug go/ 'char kas drug tu byas te bdag nyid kyi skal ba rang
gi gnas khang du bcug ste bzhag go/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ khyod kyis rnyed pa gang grub pa de khyer shog/ bgo'o/ /'char kas smras pa/ kho bos de'i bar du ka ka ni/
gcig tsam yang ma rnyed do/ /khyod kyis kho bo cag bslus so/ /'char kas bsam pa/ bdag gis bal nyung du ma zhig rnyed pa 'di/ su rmal du gzhug/ gal te khyim pa dag la bcol na ni/
de dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa yin pas thams cad brkus par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcu gnyis sde dag la bcol na ni/ bca' ba'i rin du 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin la
bcol du yang / chos sbyin ma ni/ mdo sde'i mtha' pa yin la/ 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ de mdo sde'i tshig dag sems pa na/ dus 'gyang par 'gyur ro/ /go'u
ta mi skem mo la bcol du yang / go'u ta mi skem mo ni/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin la/ 'khor yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ de 'di ni/ ltung ba yin no/ /'di ni/ ltung ba ma yin no//
zhes sems pa na/ dus 'gyang par 'gyur ro/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ni/ spong ba pa yin la/ 'khor yang spong ba pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ de sems rtse gcig tu 'jog pa
la bal rmel ba mi gnod kyi/ bdag gis de la bal rmel du bcol snyam nas/ de de snyam zhing 'dug pa na/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der 'ongs pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas smras pa/ go'u ta mi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub ste/
de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa de/ legs par gsungs pa yin te/ da gzod kho na bdag kye ma skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'ongs na ci ma
rung snyam pa'i blo skyes na/ khyed kyang 'dir 'ongs so/ /bdag gis bal nyung zhig rnyed pa de khyod kyis rmel du chug ste byin cig /'phags pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
'tshal te slar mchis nas dge slong ma gnyis btang gi/ de gnyis kyi sug par stsol cig /'char kas bal de dag gzar thag gis bam po gnyis su dam du rab tu bcings te sgo
glegs kyi phag tu bzhag go/ de nas skya rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te dbyar khang du song nas des de'i gan du dge slong ma gnyis
btang ste/ 'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du dengs la bal de bskur du gsol zhes gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de gnyis dong ste smras pa/ 'phags pa/ go'u ta mi'i mchid nas bal de
bskur du gsol zhes mchi'o/ /'char kas de gnyis la smras pa/ sgo glegs kyi phag na bam po gnyis 'dug pa de gnyis khyer la dengs shig /de gnyis gnas khang du zhugs te gdeg par
brtsams pa dang / bsgul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci/ 'dir rang 'thag gi gor ma dag stsal tam/ gzhon nu ma gnyis/ ci khyed gnyis gzhon nu ma
gta' gam pa yin nam zhes des mthe'u chung gis btegs te/ gcig ni/ gcig gi mgor bskur/ gcig ni/ gcig gi rked du bskur ro/ /de gnyis mgo chag la thug go /rked pa chag la
thug go /zhes zer zhing dbyar khang du dong nas khur sa la bzhag ste khri'i steng du bsgyel cing 'dug go/ dge slong ma rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis/ gzhon nu ma gta' gam pa
yin nam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ khyed cag las/ stobs dang ldan pa gang yin pa des je 'di thogs shig /de dag gis de gdeg par brtsams pa dang / bsgul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas
de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ma gnyis/ ci/ 'dir rang 'thag gi rdo dag bcug gam zhes de dag gis bam po de gnyis bshig pa dang / ji tsam na phung po chen por rnam par gnas par
gyur to/ /dge slong ma rnams kyis rta bgad kyis btab ste smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka na re/ bal cung zhig ces zer na/ gal te mang bar gyur na ni/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ skye rgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa/ nu mo dag/ mgo bregs shing mchan khung ral bu can dag yin na/ dgod du ci yod/ 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas bal
nyung zhig ces mchi na/ gal te mang bar gyur na/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa/ nu mo dag de dag ni/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag yin pas/
de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la 'drums pa ltung bas ltung bar byed do/ /nu mo dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gnyis ni/ skyes bu dam pa yin te/ khur ma blangs pa
mi len pa gang yin pa dang / khur blangs pa mthar phyin pa byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ 'di ni/ khur blangs pa yin pas mthar phyin par bya dgos kyi/ khyed cag las/ gang
gis ji tsam rmel bar spro ba des de tsam rmel la/ de'i gan du khyer te byin cig /de dag yun ring du thogs pa dang 'char kas bsam pa/ de dag gis bal de bca' ba'i rin du bzhag
gor ma chag/ bdag gis ma legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag gis bal de ni/ char pas 'jigs pas gang la khar bzhag pa dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /dge slong ma gnyis kyis
bal kha cig rmel te khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka/ bal dag 'tshal te mchis na/ gang du gzhag par bgyi/ 'char kas bsam pa/ da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang
bcas pa yin no/ /snyam nas smras pa/ gnas khang du chug ste zhog cig /de gnyis kyis bzhag ste song ba dang / gzhan dag gis kyang khyer te 'ongs so/ /ji tsam na thams cad kyis kyang khyer te 'ongs
so| |de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe na skye rgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ btso blag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar/ dmar pa dang / shin tu dmar bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag
mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /go'u ta mi/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ btso blag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar/ dmar ba dang / shin tu dmar
bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ bgyi ba gzhan lags na/ gzhan bgyid do/ /ji ltar gyur/ 'phags pa 'char kas bdag bal rmel du stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jug gam/ btsun pa/ rmel du stsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/ 'char
ka khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jug pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa
ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas
rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca'
bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug
bal 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ 'char ka'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge
slong ma zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni/ nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni/ nye du ma yin no/ /lug
bal zhes bya ba ni/ lug bal lo/ /'khrur 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni/ tha na chur snyug pa byed du 'jug na'o/ /'tshed du 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni/ tha na tshon du snyug pa byed du 'jug na'o/ /rmel du

'jug na zhes bya ba ni/ tha na 'da' bar byed du 'jug na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do//
zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
'tshed du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /rmel du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang rmel du 'jug gam/
'tshed du 'jug pa dang 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du
'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur
ro| 'ched du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /rmel du 'jug pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'ched du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / rmel du
'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug pa dang 'khrur 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug pa dang
'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug
bal dag 'khrur 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /rmel du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang 'tshed du 'jug gam/
'khrur 'jug pa dang rmel du 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang rmel du 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug pa dang 'khrur 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug
pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas lug
bal dag 'khrur 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'tshed du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /rmel du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'khrur 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/
'khrur 'jug pa dang rmel du 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug pa dang rmel du 'jug gam/ rmel du 'jug pa dang / 'khrur 'jug gam/ rmel du
'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang 'tshed du 'jug pa dang / rmel du 'jug na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / /smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor
ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /bal rmel du 'jug pa'i spang ba ste/ bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan+da
ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu
'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la grong dpon gtsug na nor bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyi ches snga ba zhig na/ rgyal po'i pho
brang na rgyal po dang / blon po'i 'khor mchis shing mthun par gyur pa rnams la par skabs kyi bka' mchid kun tu brjod pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to/ /shes ldan dag /ci/ dge slong rnams mngon
mtshan can rung ngam/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/ 'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams gser bdag gir
mi bgyid ces mchi nas/ de na kha cig ni/ 'di skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi/ kha cig ni/
'di skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do/ /zhes mchi na/ btsun pa/ de
la gang dag de skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi na/ btsun pa/ ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi
ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la skur ba 'debs par mi bgyid cing / ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su
smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang / gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos
'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam/ grong dpon/ gang dag de skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do/ /zhes

zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na/ nga la skur ba 'debs par byed cing / ha cang thal bar byed pa dang / de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba ma yin pa dang /
chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par byed pa ma yin pa dang / smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong
ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung

zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /grong dpon/ ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod
par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / gsar bdag gir byed pa

de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i
sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma
lags so/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /btsun pa/ gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ grong dpon/ ngas khyod la
don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang
la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so/ /zhes bka'
stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni/ rgya cher bzang ba lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid do/ /dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi
dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lags so/ /
grong dpon/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan
can rung zhing / gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/ /de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bus bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de'i tshe na tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dpon
gtsug na nor bu song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan+da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar
brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par sdus shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'od ma'i tshal ka lan+da
ka'i gnas na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'od ma'i tshal ka lan+da ka'i gnas na
dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing mthun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das dpong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ da ci grong dpon gtsug na nor bung la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig
tu 'dug nas/ nga la grong dpon gtsug na nor bu 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyi ches snga ba zhig na/ rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang / blon po'i
'khor mchis shing mthun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka' mchid kun tu brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/ shes ldan dag/ ci/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung
ngam| shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/ 'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid
ces mchi nas/ de na kha cig ni/ 'di skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi/ kha cig ni/ 'di skad
ces| dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do/ /zhes mchi na/ btsun pa/ de la gang dag de skad ces/ dge slong rnams
la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi na/ btsun pa/ ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa
na| bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi bgyid cing / ha cang thal ba mi bgyid pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su
mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang / gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam zhes zer na/ ngas de
la 'di skad ces/ grong dpon/ gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do/ /zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod

par byed pa na nga la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang / de dag las smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par

byed pa ma yin pa dang / smra ba'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon/ dge slong rnams
la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing /

de ni| shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /grong dpon/ ngas khyed la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing /
shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi
chos ma yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / de nga la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung
zhing | shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing / de ni/
shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /btsun pa/ gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces| grong dpon/ ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser
bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing / de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so/ /zhes
bka' stsal ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni/ rgya cher bzang ba lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras
kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / gser bdag gir bgyid pa de la ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lags
so| |zhes zer ro/ /ngas de la 'di skad ces/ grong dpon/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed
de| gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing / gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing / de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/ /zhes smras pa/ de nas grong dpon gtsug na

nor bu des ngas smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te nga'i drung nas song ngo / /dge slong dag/ de ltar grong dpon gtsug na nor
bu des rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can
rung zhing / gser bdag gir byed pa de la ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang gdon mi za bar rung ba yin no/ /zhes cha gcig bzung ste/ khyu mchog gi tshig rgya chen po smras shing / 'khor gyi nang
du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge slong dag/ ngas kyang de skad ces/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/

gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni/ shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na khyed kyis
gang dang phyin chad shing 'dod pa dag gis shing yongs su btsal bar bya/ rtswa 'dod pa dag gis ni/ rtswa/ shing rta'i las 'dod pa dag gis ni/ shing rta'i las/ mi blas
'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ mi blas yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /zhes smra'i/ 'di skad ces/ rnam grangs gang gis kyang gser bdag gir bya ba ni/ mi smra'o/ /'di ni/ re zhig byung ba yin gyi/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni/ mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/ len du 'jug par byed/ phung po gcig tu byed/ phung po
gnyis su byed/ khri dang / khri'u dang / khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog par byed nas gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag ni/ ma log /ma spangs/ so
sor ma spangs pa yin te/ 'di ltar/ rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/ len du 'jug par byed/ phung po gcig tu byed/ phung po gnyis su byed/ khri dang / khri'u
dang / khri'u chung du dag tu 'jog par byed do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag kyang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/ len du 'jug par byed/ phung po gcig tu byed
phung po gnyis su byed/ khri dang / khri'u dang / khri'u chung ngur 'jug par byed na/ shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'di la bye brag ni/ ci
yod| bsam pa ni/ ci yod/ tha dad tu bya ba ni/ ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer
bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu
ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len pa dang len du 'jug par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam
par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par
gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la bslab
pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam/ len du 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ drug
sde dag gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi lag pas so/ /gser dang dngul zhes bya ba ni/ dbyig dang gser ro/ /len tam zhes bya ba ni/
bdag nyid kyis so/ /len du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan no/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang
ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ gzhi bco brgyad kyis te/ 'di longs shig/ 'di nas longs shig/ 'di tsam longs shig ces bya ba dang / 'di
khyer shog/ 'di nas khyer shog/ 'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang / 'di zhog cig/ 'dir zhog cig/ 'di tsam zhog cig ces bya ba dang / de longs shig/ de nas longs shig/ de
tsam longs shig ces bya ba dang / de khyer shog/ de nas khyer shog/ de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang / de zhog cig/ der zhog cig/ de tsam zhog cig ces bya bas so/ /de la/ 'di
longs shig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/ gser 'di longs shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed
du 'gyur ro/ /'di nas longs shig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza bo nas sam/ sgrom nas sam/ ko lpags nas sam/ za ma tog nas
longs shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di tsam longs shig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs
su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum longs shig sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di khyer shog ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par
'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser 'di khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ khyer na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di nas khyer shog
ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza bo nas sam/ sgrom nas sam/ ko lpags nas sam/ za ma tog nas khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste
de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum
khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ khyer ba la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di zhog cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par
'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/ gser 'di zhog cig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'dir zhog
cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po cher ram/ zangs su'am/ rdza bor ram/ sgrom du'am/ ko lpags su'am/ za ma tog tu zhog cig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ sgo bar
byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di tsam zhog cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum zhog
cig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de longs shig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su
dbyig gam/ gser de longs shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de nas longs shig ces bya ba ni/
'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza bo nas sam/ sgrom nas sam/ ko lpags nas sam/ za ma tog nas longs shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de
sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de tsam longs shig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum longs shig
ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de khyer shog ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser
de khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ khyer ba na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyer shog ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su
zangs po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza bo nas sam/ sgrom nas sam/ ko lpags nas sam/ za ma tog nas khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs
na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes
byas su 'gyur la/ khyer na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de zhog cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/ gser de zhog cig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo
bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /der zhog cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po cher ram/ zangs su'am/ rdza bor
ram/ sgrom du'am/ ko lpags su'am/ za ma tog tu zhog cig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/ spang ba'i
ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /de tsam zhog cig ces bya ba ni/ 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum zhog cig ces sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bzhag pa na/
spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'di longs shig /'di nas longs shig /'di tsam longs shig ces bya ba dang / 'di khyer cig /'di nas khyer cig /'di tsam khyer cig ces bya ba dang / 'di
zhog cig /'dir zhog cig /'di tsam zhog cig ces bya ba dang / de longs shig /de nas longs shig /de tsam longs shig ces bya ba dang / de khyer cig /de nas khyer cig /de tsam khyer
shog ces bya ba dang / de zhog cig /der zhog cig /de tsam zhog cig ces bya ba de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyogs su sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa dang /
khyer ba dang / bzhag pa na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dbyig la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gser la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dbyig dang
gser la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dbyig gam gser brdungs pa la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dbyig dang gser mngon mtshan can la reg

na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dngul la reg na/ spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /nor bu la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /mu tig la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /

bai DUR+Ya la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya la reg na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis yul gyi tha snyad can gyi dbyig dang gser la reg

na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /ra gan dang / zangs ma dang / lcags dang / rno lcags dang / ro nye dang / zha nye dang / khro chu la reg pa la ltung ba med do/ /zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la
nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po so gsum pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na tsam pa ka na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bzang po sbyin pa zhig 'dug pa des/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang / skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa snying dang / mig 'phrog pa/ mtho ris kyi
them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug nas der dge slong mang po dag dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/ de dag gis dgag dbye byas nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag cag mnyan yod du ston pa dang /
dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'i/ bdag cag la gos dag byin cig /khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa
dag /'di na gos bzang po dag ma mchis te/ don mthun dag mchis zhes grag gi /don mthun dag mchis kyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig dang / de nas gos bzang po dag 'jal
te gsol lo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te gros bzang po dag med na/ gos ngan po dag byin cig /'phags pa dag /bdag ni/ bzang po sbyin pa lags na/ ji ltar
bdag gis ngan pa dag gsol bar bgyi/ gal te khyed cag rings na/ gos kyi rin kaR+sha pa Na dag snoms la bzhud cig /khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis kaR+sha pa Na dag bkag
bas bdag cag mi len to/ /'phags pa dag /'di ltar bdag la ma byin pa ni/ mi mnga'i/ gos ngan pa dag sbyin du mi rung ngo / /dge slong de dag gis kaR+sha pa Na dag ma blangs par gos
ngan pa dag kho nas dong ste/ mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag gis dbyar gnas pa'i gos kyi rnyed pa ma rnyed dam
ci nas gang gi phyir khyed cag gos dag ngan par gyur/ ma rnyed do/ /khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs/ tsam par ro/ /khyim bdag gang la brten/ che ge mo zhig la'o/ /khyim
bdag de bzang po sbyin pa zhes grags so/ /de'i phyir ma rnyed do/ /de'i phyir de dag gis skabs de/ rgyas par brjod pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la/ nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyi/ ngas nyan thos rnams la rung
bar bya ba cung zhig gnang bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang
dge slong gis zhal ta byed pa spro bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis zhal ta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen spro bar
bya ste/ kun dga' ra ba pa zhes bya ba ni/ rung bar byed pa'o/ /dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni/ gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'o/ /dge slong dag yul gzhan du 'dong ba na/ de
dag 'di na bdag cag la sbyin pa dag 'ga' yang med do/ /zhes 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag de nyid ji srid du gson pa dang / 'dug pa dang / 'tsho
ba dang / sdod pa'i bar du shin tu ring du song ba yang nyams pa med do/ /dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rin dag rnyed la sbyin bdag med nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes te mi len pa'i skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong gi mdun du 'greng
ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo/ /dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par
bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mtha' 'khob dag tu gtsug lag khang dag byed du bcug nas de na dus dang dus su skrag pa dag byung nas
dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par bor te byer ro/ /ma byin par len pa dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par rig nas gtsug lag khang bcom pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi dbyig dang gser sbas te 'gro bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sba bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang gis sba
par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen gyis sba bar bya'o/ /gang dag sbed par byed pa de dag nyid rku bar byed nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis sba bar bya'o/ /dge bsnyen dad pa can med na/ dge tshul gyis sba bar bya'o/ /dge tshul med na/ dge slong dag gis rang gis sba
bar bya'o/ /de la dong brko bar bya ba yod nas gang gis brko bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen gyis brko bar bya'o/ /de
nyid rku bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis brko bar bya'o/ /dge bsnyen dad pa can med na/ dge tshul gyis brko bar bya'o/ /dge tshul med
na/ dge slong dag gis rang gis brko bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa dang bral na/ rnam pa de lta bu nyid kyis phyung ste dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas phongs pa'i dus dag tu gnang
ba gang yin pa de/ bde ba'i gnas skabs dag tu spyad par mi bya ste/ spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis
nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /gser dang dngul dag la reg pa'i spang ba ste/ bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe na thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ngo / /
zhes sgra grags te/ de'i nyan thos rnams 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag phyed pas/ gang dag de la mchod
pa dag byed pa de dag ni/ shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / gsal ba che ba dang / rgyas pa che bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/
shes ldan dag/ yul dbus su 'dong ngo / /der khe spogs mang po yang bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la yang mchod par bya'o/ /zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa de
dag zong thogs te de la dbus su 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /mnyan yod na shes pa can rtsis mkhas pa zhig 'dug pa des/ byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs zhes
thos nas des bsam pa/ song ste je bltas na/ der cung zad 'thob bo/ /snyam nas/ des cung zad dmigs pas kyang shes/ cung zad rtog ges kyang shes nas des song ste ded dpon la ming dang rus nas

brjod cing / 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod kyi ma ni/ ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyi pha ni/ ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyi rdzas ni/ 'di snyed cig 'ongs so/ /nyi ma ga ge mo
zhig la ni/ khal 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /khe spogs ni/ 'di snyed cig 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / ded dpon des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang dag 'bar ba dang /
gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul byed ces grags pa de dag las/ 'ga' zhig 'di yin gor ma chag snyam nas/ des de la dad pas byang lam gyi nags kyi 'bras bus slong

phor bkang ste phyin nas la ba srin bu'i mdog lta bu zhig kyang bskon no/ /shes pa can des/ de blangs shing gyon te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du song ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas
smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyis mgo bzlog ste nyal ba gang zhig las thob/ des smras pa/ byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bo ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas/ des

kho bo la dad pas dad par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shes pa can/ bdag cag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag rtag tu khyed cag la tha ga pa dag dang / phreng rgyud dag dang 'bru

mar mkhan dag las/ gzhan pa mi gtso bo 'ga' yang mngon par dad par mi byed do/ /zhes mtho 'tsham par byed kyi/ khyod la ba 'di gyon te song la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag gi snying dag gas par gyis

shig /de ltar bya'o/ /zhes smras te/ de nas shes pa can de/ la ba de gyon nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs pa

rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/ rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/ /snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong bar mi 'jog
pas| nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ shes pa can de thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /de nas nye dgas bsam pa/ gcer bu pa ngan
pa 'di la ba bzang po zhig gyon te 'ongs kyi/ gal te bdag gis de ma 'phrog na/ nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo / /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod gcer bu pa
yin la/ la ba 'di lta bu gyon na/ phyir babs sam ci/ kho bo phyir ma babs te/ 'di ltar byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bos ded dpon la ming dang rus brjod nas/ des
kho bo la dad pas dad pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /ma legs so/ /ma legs so/ /khyod kyis rgas pa'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims 'chal ba kun tu spyad do/ /tshur shog/ 'dug
cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /shes pa can de/ nye dga'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / nye dga' yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas de la sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/ /drug
sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams su skyes so/ /snyam du sems la/ gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na/ nyan
pa po dag rang gi sha gang yin pa de yang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su
skyes so/ /snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin pas/ nye dgas shes pa can de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ ngan pa la mos pa yin te/ gal te de bzang po 'dod par gyur na/ des

khyed cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang / zas ro brgya ba dang ldan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya ba yang gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig na ma gnang ngo / /kho bo cag gi ston pa ni/ bzang po la mos pa

yin pas des kho bo cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang / zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya ba yang gnang ngo / /gal te khyod la ba 'di lta bu gyon te slong mo la 'gro bar gyur na/
bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis/ shes pa can 'dis tshul khrims 'chal ba kun tu spyad do/ /snyam du shes pas khyod kyis slong mo yang mi rnyed par 'gyur gyi khyod kyi la ba 'di kho
bol byin cig dang / kho bos khyod la la ba gzhan zhig sbyin no/ /kho bo la ba 'di gyon te bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis kho bo mthong nas btsun pa
nye dgas la ba 'di lta bu ga las rnyed ces zer na/ kho bos de dag la 'di skad ces/ shes pa can che ge mo zhig gis byin no/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ des na de dag gis shes pa can dad
pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /snyam du shes par 'gyur zhing / de dag gis khyod slong mo la zhugs pa la chang dang nu rtsis slong phor bkang ste sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'
bzhes shig /nye dgas smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni/ tshul khrims 'chal ba yin pas khyod de dag gi tshig thos nas
yang phyir 'phrog tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do/ /btsun pa nye dga'/ ci/ kho bo'i la ba 'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/ la ba 'di ni/ kho bo nyid dbang ba
yin gyi/ bzhes shig dang slar 'phrog tu mi 'chi'o/ /nye dgas la ba de blangs nas/ la ba rtsub po gzhan zhig de la byin nas shes pa can de/ la ba rtsub po de gyon nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
rnams kyi gan du phyir song ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur te nyal ba gang zhig las thob/ des smras pa/ 'di ni/ glo gzhan nas grub
pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ kho bos la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas/ des kyang kho bo la la ba 'di byin to/ /de dag gis spyos te smras pa/ shes pa can/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams
ni| yu bu cag gson pas kyang mi dga' ba yin no/ /drug sde dag ji lta bar gzhan de lta ma yin la/ nye dga' ji lta bar drug sde gzhan de lta ma yin no/ /gal te khyod kyis dge slong
gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig la byin par gyur na/ kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed na/ khyod kyis nye dga' la byin te/ de ni/ bdag cag las zong gis kyang khrag gi phyis bu

lan par 'dod pa yin gyi/ gal te la ba khyer te 'ong na/ de lta na legs/ gal te khyer te mi 'ong na/ kho bo cag gis khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas dbyung bar bya zhing / tshul shing

yang dbyung bar bya/ spang leb khri'u yang bskyur bar bya/ slong phor yang khas dbub par bya/ 'khar ba yang dor bar bya'o/ /de skrag nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dgas thag ring po kho na nas de 'ong
ba mthong nas des bsam pa/ shes pa can 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni/ bdag gi la ba 'phrog par byed pa yin snyam nas/ de gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas sgo bcad de 'dug go/ shes pa

can des bsgo brdung bar brtsams te btsun pa nye dga' btsun pa nye dga'/ zhes bos pa dang / nye dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go /dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod la btsun pa nye dgas ci bya/

des smras pa/ des kho bo'i la ba zhig khyer ro/ /shes pa can/ gal te khyod la ba 'dod na/ song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su sgrubs shig /de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shes

pa can de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed shes pa can thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba la ltos shig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin

'tshal/ 'di ni/ la ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ gal te la ba thob na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes pa can de phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ btsun pa nye dgas bdag gi la ba 'tshal ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la slar stsal du gsol cig/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la la ba

slar stsal du ma stsal na/ 'di ltar bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas phyung bar 'gyur zhing / tshul shing yang phyung bar 'gyur/ spang leb khri'u yang bskyur bar 'gyur/ slong phor yang
khas phub par 'gyur/ 'khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la nye dga'i gan du song ste/ shes pa
can gyi la ba phyir byin cig /gal te mi sbyin na/ shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do/ /zhes gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun
pa| bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dgas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa/
shes pa can gyis pho nya 'di lta bu khrid de 'ong bas 'dis kho bo'i la ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nye dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig/ gal te 'di'i la ba phyir myur bar ma byin na/ shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas

de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes byung ngo / /nye dgas smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ston pa'i bka' mnyan par zad kyi/ gzhan du na sgre byi gcer bu 'di phrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba bas
gal te shes pa can sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de dag thams cad khrag tsha ba
skyugs te kha dag cing dus byed par gyur kyang nye dga'i spu'i rtse mo tsam yang mi g.yo ste/ 'on kyang bzhud cig dang sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/ kwa'i
gcer bu pa nyon cig /khyod kyi ston pa rdzun ma des brdzun du smra bas 'jig rten bslus nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de'i lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed par byed na/ khyod

kyang de bas kyang rdzun ma chen po yin pas/ khyod kyi lce la yang thong gshol stong gis rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang kho bo'i la ba khyod kyis spyad na/ ci/ kho bos kyang khyod kyi la ba spyad snyam mam/
btsun pa nye dga' ma lags so/ /nye dga' de'i la ba des 'doms kyi phyogs thams cad phyis nas bzhi ltab tu bltab ste lag pa g.yon pa'i stong du bzhag nas lag pa g.yas pas thal lcag gis
bsnun pa dang rim pa thams cad rdol bar gyur nas smras pa/ shes pa can/ lag pa gnyis rkyongs shig/ des lag pa gnyis brkyangs pa dang nye dgas gang gis de khas bub tu sgyel bar
'gyur ba de lta bu'i shugs kyis la ba lag tu phyin pa dang / de khas bub tu sgyel nas/ nye dgas rdog pas bsnun te smras pa/ gcer bu pa sgre byi/ gtsug lag
khang sla btsas ma gtal bar song zhig /btsun pa nye dga'/ gal te ma gum na/ mchis te slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o/ /de ni/ re zhig byung ba yin gyi/ bcom ldan
'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni/ ma mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed
par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar
kun tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ kun tu rtsom par byed/ yul tshol bar byed/ shing rta gsog par byed/ yul du 'gro ba'i rdzas shom par byed/ le'u pa dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang /
smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ brgya shas dang / bcu shas dang / bcu gnyis shas kyi phyir dpang po dang / gro

ga dang / snag cha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar bun 'gyed par byed ce na/ nas dang / 'bru rnying pa gser phye dang nyi sde'i phyir gtong ba dang

gzhal ba'i snod dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed do/ /de ltar bun 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar skyed 'gyed par byed ce na/ dung gi tshogs

kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / mu tig tshogs kyi phyir bai DUR+Ya tshogs gtong bar byed cing / dbang po dang / gro ga

dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed do/ /de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan
can gtong bar byed do/ de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan med pa gtong
bar byed do/ /de ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan
can gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can
ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin pa gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag
shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ ma log /ma spangs/ so sor ma spangs pa yin te/ 'di ltar mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar
byed| rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /

bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /
byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na/ shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
rnams la bye brag ci yod/ bsam pa ni/ ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni/ ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar
kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs
'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs
pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/
mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/ de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin
no| |zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu
yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i
gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ drug sde dag gam/
gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa du ma'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni/ kun tu spyod par byed pa dang / rab tu sbyor bar byed
pa dang / bun 'gyed par byed pa dang / skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod pa byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas
ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas yul gyi tha snyad kyi zong

kun tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la shing rta dang / glang dang / gla mi dang / dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ sho gam dang / la gcan dang /
gru btsas sbyin par byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa dag bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod
pas dbyig gam/ gser rab tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du
nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa dag bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang / 'bru'i bun 'gyed par byed cing / de de la gzhal blugs

dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang / dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/

rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong

bar byed pa dang / mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir baiDUR+Ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing / de de la dbang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag
gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi
bca' bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i li tsa byi dag gi khang pa
drug brtsegs dang bdun brtsegs su byed do/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug brtsegs dang bdun brtsegs su byed pas/ de dag mtho
ches pas brtsigs shing brtsigs shing rdib nas sbyin bdag dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag gson zhing 'dug ste/ 'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na/
shi ba rnams kyi ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis mkhar lan gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa dbul bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag mi zad pa thogs te dge slong rnams kyi gan du song nas phyin pa dang
dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag /mkhar lan gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di dag bzhes shig /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang
dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas/ bdag cag mi len to/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni/ sum brtsegs su bya'o/ /dge
slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyar khang ni/ nyis brtsegs su bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mi zad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/
sbyin bdag 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang gi mkhar len mi bgyid/ kaR+sha pa Na dag med do/ /'o na bdag cag gis khyed la mi zad pa dag ma phul lam/
dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ci/ kho bo cag gis mi zad pa dag zos snyam mam/ dge 'dun gyi mdzod na 'dug go/ 'phags pa dag/ de ltar na/ mi zad par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar
zad par 'gyur te/ ci/ bdag cag gi sdum pa na gnas ma mchis snyam mam/ ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi
bca' bar mdzad pas/ bdag cag rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya zhing / de las skyed gang grub pa des/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
'dun la mchod par bya'o/ /de dag gis de dag nyid la byin nas de dag la bdas pa na rtsod par byed cing / 'phags pa dag /ci'i phyir bdag nyid kyi nor las rtsod pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs de/
dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis phyug po dag la byin nas/ de dag la bdas pa
na mthu dang ldan pa la brten cing mi ster ba dang / bla'i grwa'i mthus mi ster nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis dbul po rnams la byin nas
de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gta' nyi rir blangs te dbang po dang bcas pa'i dam rgya'i glegs bu bris te sbyin par bya'o/ /glegs bu de la yang lo dang /
zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge skos dang / len pa po dang / rdzas dang / skyed rnams kyi ming bri bar bya'o/ /gang la sbyin par bya ba dge

bsnyen dad pa can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi ri kho nas sbyin par bya'o/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /
mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'i spang ba ste/ bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed do/ /ji ltar len par byed ce na/ gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong

khyer du lo nyes pa de'i tshe na/ ljongs nas grong khyer du len par byed do/ /de ltar len par byed do/ /ji ltar gtong bar byed ce na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer du lo legs shing ljongs su lo nyes pa de'i tshe na/ grong

khyer nas ljongs su gtong bar byed de/ de ltar gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar nyo bar byed ce na/ gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i tshe na nyo bar byed de/ de ltar nyo bar byed do/ /ji ltar tshong bar byed ce na/ gang gi

tshe na rin che ba de'i tshe na tshong bar byed de/ de ltar tshong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ ma log/ ma spangs/ so sor ma spangs pa yin te/

'di ltar nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed cing / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/
gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed na/ shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di la bye brag ni/ ci yod/ bsam pa ni/ ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni/ ci yod/ su zhig dge
sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dag bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed nyo tshong
rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su
mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas
rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi
bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang nyo tshong
rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ drug sde dag gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa

mang po'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni/ len par byed pa dang / gtong bar byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/

dngos po spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed/

tshong bar byed na/ de nyo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tshong ba la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing / rnyed pa mi 'dod pas tshong bar byed na/

nyo bar byed pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tshong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing / rnyed pa 'dod pas tshong bar byed na/ nyo bar byed pa la ltung

ba med la/ tshong bar byed pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing / rnyed pa mi 'dod pas tshong bar byed na/ gnyi ga la ltung ba med do/ /yul gzhan gyi
sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs
pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshong pa lam gyi bgrod par zhugs pa dag gis gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang
ldan pa/ skar khung skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ mig dang snying 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa dag mthong nas de dag dad par gyur te/ de dag gtsug lag khang
du dong nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston bgyi'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ mchod ston gyi yo byad dag khyer te shog
rtsig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag glo bur du lhag pa dag lags te/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag rin dbul gyi/ khyed kyis 'bras dag stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi
bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag 'bras dag mi tshong ngo / /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi
bya bar 'di ltar gang dge 'dun gyi phyir mchod ston byed pa de la rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ ri ba kho nas sbyin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gtsug lag khang de nyid du mchod ston byed pa de la 'theb dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes bca' bar
mdzad pas/ mang po dag mchod ston byed nas thams cad la byin nas 'bras dag spyad pas/ spyi bungs chad par gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar rin des 'bras gzhan dag nyo bar bya'o/ /'bras rnying pa dag kyang so sor brtags nas gal te srog chags med na/ dus su
btsongs te 'bras gsar pas bang ba dag dgang bar bya'o/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /nyo tshong byed pa'i spang ba
ste| nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //sdom la/ lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis/ sbyin 'phrog ston zla tha chung dang / /dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang / bsngos pa dang ni gsog 'jog
go| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag
thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis khyab par byas pas phyin chad gang nas kyang rnyed pa sgrub par mi nus so/ /snyam nas de de snyam sems pa na/ dga' 'dun

drug cu skyed mos tshal du dong ba de dag nye dgas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag las rnyed pa ma grub na/ nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming gzung bar mi bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /drug
sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag gis rang gi sha dag bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du sems la/ gal te tshul khrims kyi
gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /snyam du sems so/ /gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so/ /snyam
du sems pa yin pas/ des lhung bzed gsal ba/ zlum pa/ longs spyad par bzod pa mchan khung gis khyer te dga' 'dun de dag ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dga' 'dun pa gcig la ci nas kyang
de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas sems dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci'i phyir byon/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag la lhung bzed
