'das kyis bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song
la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/
chos gos kyi las kyis shig ces sgos shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/
bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro bar des chos gos kyi las gyis shig /dga'

bos thos te thos nas kyang nye dga' la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das
ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/ chos gos kyi las kyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te
bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni/ sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te/ ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ci ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu 'gro na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
dang thabs cig 'gro na/ re zhig chu yang rnyog ma can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang gos thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khrid
de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na/ de lta na/ bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing / rnyed pa mang po yang
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas smras pa/ slob dpon/ re zhig gser gyi snod spangs te sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/ khyod kyi lhan cig gnas pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod
pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa su la yod/ des kho bo mthong bar yang mi 'dod do/ /slob dpon/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra
ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa gang dag bka' stsal pa de dag las/ slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byas pa yod dam/ de ni/ thams cad kyi thams
cad du med do/ /de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi snam sbyar rnying nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsam pa/ bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te
snam sbyar btsem par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des de khyer te dga' bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang / de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod gar 'gro/
des smras pa/ kho bo'i snam sbyar rnying ste/ kho bos ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas/ bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus la snam sbyar btsem par bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ gal te khyod
snam sbyar gsar ba gzhan 'tshem na/ snam sbyar rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig /de bzhin bya'o/ /de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag gi snam sbyar rnying ste/ bdag gis ras
yug chen 'di rnyed pas snam sbyar btsem par zhu'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ slob dpon/ 'di ni/ de'i dus lags so/ /dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos/ kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa de kho
bos khyod la sbyin no/ /mkhan po/ mi 'tshal te/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di nyid las snam sbyar drubs te bcang bar bgyi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos/ kho bos ko gzhan thos la
gzhan mthong ste/ kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes
so| |ci khyod/ mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dam/ de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no/ /des
de blangs nas smras pa/ mkhan po/ khyod ras yug chen 'di bzhes shig /tshe dang ldan pa chos/ ci/ kho bos khyod la brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin pas ras yug chen gang khyod nyid khyer cig /des
bsam pa/ bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bya zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o/ /
snyam nas smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis bslangs
bas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la phul zhing / snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la byin no/ /phyi de nyin par de
snam sbyar de gyon te mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / dga' bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod shes par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ dge slong rnams la tshe
dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar
spro ba des/ chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni/ sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /ci ste bcom
ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod par gsungs pas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan
'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na/ re zhig chu yang rnyog ma can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob
par mi 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na/ de lta na/ bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing / rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur
ro| |mkhan po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad mchis par bka' stsal pa/ gang dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te/ bdag ni/
re zhig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o/ /dga' bos smras pa/ kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dang lhan cig mchi'o/ /dga' bos spyos te smras pa/ ngan

pa/ ci/ kho bos khyod la chos la chos nyid bzang pos snam sbyar byin snyam nas khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin pa yin na/ gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gro na/ snam sbyar 'on cig /khyod la
mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos kyis bsam pa/ bdag la chos gos 'phrog pa ni/ bla'i/ bdag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni/ mi rung ngo / /snyam nas/ des de
la snam sbyar phyir byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang
ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang /
ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar pa lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi
tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su
bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
ba| yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thags bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su

bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang
po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can
brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /
thugs rje chen po ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu pa/ nyag cig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis zhugs pa/ rig
pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la
legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par
'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan
lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa brgya phrag

bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong
dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis na/ sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta ltangs kyis la las legs par ma bgos pa dang / legs par ma sbyangs par ma gyur
tam snyam du rnam par gzigs par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa chos/ chos gos
stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dbyar gnas pa
rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam/ bcom ldan 'das/ grub bo/ 'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos/ chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/ des skabs de/
bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dag/ dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/ btsun pa/ 'phrog par bgyid
do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la rmas pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis dge slong la gos byin nas
yang phyir 'phrog pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de
ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de
lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la
bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas 'phrog gam/ 'phrog tu 'jug cing / de la
'di skad ces/ dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyi/ phyir byin ces zer na/ dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing / btang na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /
yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ shAkya'i bu dga' bo'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /dge slong la zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pa'o/ /gos zhes bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang /
sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /byin nas zhes bya ba ni/ phyir sbyin mi
dgos par ro/ /de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni/ dus gzhan no/ /khros 'khrugs rngam par 'gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni/ khro ba ma sangs par ro/ /'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni/ bdag nyid
kyis so/ /'phrog tu 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan no/ /dge slong des zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong gang yin pa des so/ /lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o/ /phyir sbyin par

bya zhing zhes bya ba ni/ gtang bar bya zhing ngo / /btang na zhes bya ba ni/ lus dang bral bar byas na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par
bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ lus g.yo bar byed pa dang / tshig rjod par byed pa dang / de gnyi ga dang ldan pa dang / gzhan dag
gis so/ /de la ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas lus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par byed/
khrid par byed la/ tshig gis dge slong khyed la gos mi sbyin gyi/ phyir byin ces ni/ mi zer na/ ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus
las bral bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas so/ /ji ltar tshig rjod par byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs

rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyi/ phyir byin cig/ ces tshig rjod par byed la/ lus kyis rtul bar mi byed na/ ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de

srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar tshig rjod pas so/ /ji ltar de gnyi ga dang ldan pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos
byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas/ lus kyis kyang rtul bar byed cing / tshig gis kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyi/ phyir byin cig ces zer na/ ji srid du

gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar gnyi ga dang ldan pas so/ /ji ltar gzhan dag
gis she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas/ de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas/ dge slong 'phrog tu 'jug na ji srid du gos
kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ gnyi ga la spang ba'i ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge
slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas
re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i
'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas dge slob ma 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos
kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ dge slob ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam
par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas dge tshul 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar

byed na/ dge tshul la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas dge tshul
ma 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyas byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ dge tshul ma la nyes byas nyid du
'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid ma rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid du

gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ khyim pa la
bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas/ de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ yid

ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jug na/ ji srid gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur
la| gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na/ khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/ de ltar gzhan dag gis so/ /don gzhan
dang 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni/ ltung ba med do/ /ji ltar don gzhan gyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag
'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang / chu klung gi kha'am/ yur po che'i khar 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang / mkhan pos chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis gos
dag 'phrog par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam pas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jug pa ste/ de ltar don gzhan gyis so/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig
gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i zla bo dang / sdig pa'i bsten grogs dag dang lhan cig sdig pa bsten cing lam du 'gro bar gyur na/ de dag la mkhan po dang /
slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i zla bo dang / sdig pa'i bsten grogs la bsten par gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam pas gos dag 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jug pa ste/ de

de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /'phrog pa'i spang ba ste/ nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ri brag cig na/ khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam
pa can zhig 'dug pa de dgon par dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/ mthong khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog par byed
pa| mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/ khri dang / khri'u dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ de na dge slong drug cu gnas pa de dag la khyim bdag des chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
la sogs pas mkho ba stob par byed do/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas khyim bdag de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du dge slong de dag dong ste smras pa/
bzhin bzang / khyod kyi phas dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur na/ khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang /
bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stob par byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ la la ni/ brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/ la la ni/ stong la/ la la ni/ 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa
yang yod/ la las ni/ bdag nyid kyang gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thogs so/ /de nas dge slong de dag gtsug lag khang de nas dong ngo / /rgan zhugs ri brag de nyid nas rab tu byung ba
gnyis shig/ bsod snyoms rgyus nas gtsug lag khang de nyid na 'khod do/ /byang lam nas don mthun dag lhags nas de dag gis gtsug lag khang de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dag der
dong ste tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang ston par 'dug nas de dag gis bsam
pa| dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/ yang na nyin mo spyod du dong gor ma chag snyam nas/ de dag de na yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis de gnyis la
smras pa| 'phags pa gnyis/ dge slong dag gar dong / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag/ 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do/ /ci'i slad du/ khyim bdag gang gis gtsug lag khang
'di byed du bcug pa des dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur te/ de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams kyis de
la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste/ bzhin bzang khyod kyi phas dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur na/ khyod kyis kyang kho
bo cag dge slong drug cu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stob par byed nus sam zhes smras pas/ de na re/ 'phags pa dag /la la ni/ brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/
la la ni/ stong la/ la la ni/ 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/ la las ni/ bdag nyid kyang gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thogs so/ /zhes zer nas dge slong de dag
dong ngo / /kho bo cag gnyis ni/ bsod snyoms rgyus nas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na 'khod do/ /ded dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag yun ring po nas smon pa/ kye ma bdag cag gis
dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du gzhug cing / gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstab par bya'o/ /snyam na/ gtsug lag khang 'di ni/ byas zin pa yin
pas| gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstab par bya'o/ /zhes des ras yug chen bting ste shes ldan dag/ khyed cag las gang gis ci yongs su btang ba de 'dir phul cig
ces smras pa dang / de dag gis kyang ci 'byor pa de phul nas der rnyed pa mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang / ded dpon gyis rgan zhugs de gnyis la smras pa/ 'phags pa gnyis/ 'di ni/ dge slong drug
cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms lags so/ /'di ni/ brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston gyi bsod snyoms lags so/ /'di ni/ na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad lags so/ /'di ni/
rnyed pa lags so/ /'di ni/ chos gos kyi zong lags kyi/ dge slong bzang po dag spyan drongs shig/ bdag cag dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te/ dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstab par bgyi'o/ /
zhes smras te dong ngo / /rgan zhugs gcig gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sus sba bar bya/ gcig shos kyis smras pa/ gang gzhon pas so/ /de gnyis las gang gzhon pas rnyed pa
de sbas nas des smras pa/ rgan zhugs mnyan yod nas dge slong dag 'bod na/ der gang 'gro bar bya/ rgan pas smras pa/ gang gzhon pa 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhon
pas smras pa/ kho bos rnyed pa sbas kyi/ khyod der song zhig /rgan bshos mnyan yod du dge slong sbron du song ngo / drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang / khyim
bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/ rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/ /snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas/

rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/
smin ma 'phyar ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsam pa/ dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ongs pa 'di/ gang yin pa bsu'o/ /snyam nas des de la gnas brtan byon pa legs so/ byon pa legs
so| |phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / de na re/ slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes zer nas nye dgas bsam pa/ kye ma/ 'di ni/ rgan zhugs shig ste slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan
po yang mi shes so/ /snyam nas des de la smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ ga las 'ongs/ ri brag gi gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig nas mchis so/ /rgan zhugs/ ci/ de gtsug lag khang yin
nam| 'on te phongs pa yin/ gtsug lag khang ni/ ci 'dra/ phong pa ni/ ci 'dra/ gang na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni/ gtsug lag khang yin la/ gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni/ phongs
pa yin no/ /de sngon ni/ phongs par gyur la/ da ni/ gtsug lag khang du gyur to/ /ji ltar gyur/ byang lam nas don mthun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod

snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang / chos gos kyi zor dag phul nas 'di skad ces/ 'phags pa/ dge slong bzang
po dag pos shig/ bdag cag kyang dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te/ dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstab par bgyi'o/ /zhes mchi'o/ /nye dgas smras pa/ 'on tang khyod dge slong rkur 'ongs mod/ lags
so| rgan zhugs/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /
rnying pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / legs skyes dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can mang po gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis
bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyi ma re re zhing yon bshad pa byed pa na yang gnas 'dir dge slong gang dag ma 'ongs pa de dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon
par dga' bar gyur cig /ces zer la/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad dag gis brel
ba med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon sum du chos ston par mdzad pas/ 'di na chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ gal te dge slong rnams kyis
khyod dge slong rkur 'dir 'ongs par shes par gyur na/ khyod gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi/ dge slong gzhan la de skad ma zer
cig /'di ltar/ kho bo cag mi drug re re la yang 'khor bcu bcu yod pas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /slob dpon/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchis te slad
kyis mchi'o/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di mthong zhing / de thos nas dang po kho nar 'gro bar gyur na mi rung ngo / /snyam nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis lha
ni/ yid kyis bskor ba yin gyi/ lus kyis bskor ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / chos rnams yid kyis 'dren byed cing / /yid gtso yid kyi 'gros can
yin/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ 'di nyid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig /ces des de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste/ rgan zhugs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag
'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes gyis shig ces 'dud du bcug go /slob dpon/ skom gyi/ je skom 'thung du mchi'o/ /'di nyid du sdod cig dang / kho bos skom gyis phor bu bkang ste

khyer te 'ong ngo / /zhes des skom gyis phor bu bkang ste blud nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ da song zhig ces des de thag ring por bskyal nas da phyir ma ldog cig /ces bsgos te bdag nyid phyir log go /drug sde

dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang cung zad ci thos pa de phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde rnams la smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa dag /bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/ khyod kyis thos pa cung zhig yod dam/ yod de/ ri brag gi gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig tu byang lam nas don mthun dag

lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug cu'i dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang /
chos gos kyi zong dag phul gyi/ der dong ngo / /ci/ de nyid du dbyar gnas par bya ba'am/ mi bya ste/ 'di ltar/ dbyar gyi nang nyid du de dag zos te/ 'di nyid du 'ongs la dbyar phyi ma nye bar sgrub
pa'i dus su gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ /de dag der 'ongs pa dang / rgan zhugs gnyis kyis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa
legs so/ /zhes de gnyis kyis de dag gi gnas khang dag bsko shing / gnas mal dang / khri dang / khri'u dang / chu ra dang / phor bu dang / chu tshags dang / lde
mig kyog po dag phog go /de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag don gang gi phyir lhags pa de/ je brtag par bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis/ 'dir rnyed pa ci
grub pa dag je blta'i/ 'on cig /rgan zhugs de gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas/ de gnyis kyis/ 'di ni/ dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms so/ /'di ni/ brgyad
ston no/ /'di ni/ bcu bzhi ston no/ /'di ni/ nya ston no/ /'di ni/ na ba'i rkyen to/ /'di ni/ sman gyi yo byad do/ /'di ni/ 'di'i rnyed pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos gos kyi zong ngo / /zhes rnyed pa/ de
dag thams cad bstan to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rgan zhugs ser sna can yin pas zas bsod pa sbyin par mi nus la/ 'di ltar/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis kyis dge
'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pas yongs su spangs pa sbyin no/ /zhes de dag gis de gnyis la yongs su spangs pa byin nas de gnyis kyis kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis yongs su spangs pa
thob bo/ /zhes dga' bar gyur to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ dge slong lto 'dun can 'ga' zhig la bcol na/ dge 'dun la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang /
tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag gis dge slong lto 'dun can zhig la bcol ba dang / des de dag la nyi ma
re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang / tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par byed pas dus cung zad cig gis bsod snyoms thams
cad spyad pa dang / dge bskos kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /da ni/ dge 'dun gyis gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs shig mchis so/ /de dag gis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gang dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa de dag ni/ brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi dang / nya ston byed kyi/ bdag cag bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa dag de mi byed kyi/ de
yang bza'o/ /zhes de dag gis de yang zos pa dang / dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ da ni/ dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi

bungs shig mchis so/ /drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ji srid du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'tsho ba de srid du bdag cag rtag tu nad pa yin pas/ na ba'i sman de yang bza'o/ /zhes
de dag gis de yang zos nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khur ya gcig ni/ 'dug par dga' ba yin gyi/ gos kyi rnyed pa 'di yang bgos la khur do mnyam pas/ bde bar 'dong
bar bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis de yang bgos pa dang / dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ da ni/ dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig
kho na'i spyi bungs las ma mchis so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis/ khyed gnyis na re/ dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms yod do/ /zhes zer na/ dbyar gyi
nang du zad par gyur to/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ ci/ de dag gis bca' ba rnam pa bco brgyad dang tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sha stag
rims shig /ces smras sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis gnya' ba smad de spyod spyod la da smod par byed kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ 'di gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las
gyis shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis/ myur du bzod pa gsol cig /phyir bzod pa gsol na/ ltag pa'i spu byi bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis bzod pa gsol bar brtsams
pa dang / kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin gyi/ 'di gnyis la bzod pa gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs
gnyis bzod par bya'o/ /ri brag 'di na ma dad pa mang pos 'dir bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyi/ gal te lhag rol cung zad yod na/ de yang byin cig /'on te med na ni/ kho bo cag 'dong

ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci yang med kyi/ dengs shig /de dag de nas dong ste mnyan yod du song nas de dag der phyin pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/ /dbyar 'das pa dang don mthun de dag
yang lhags nas/ de dag gis de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par mthong nas
de dag gis bsam pa/ dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/ nyin mo spyod du dong gor ma chag snyam nas de dag de na yongs su bskor ba na/ rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag
gis smras pa/ 'phags pa gnyis/ dge slong dag gar dong / bzhin bzang dag/ 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do/ /'phags pa gnyis/ bdag cag gis dge slong drug cu'i zla ba gsum
gyi bsod snyoms ma phul lam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ dge slong dag lhags par gyur nas/ de dag gis dbyar gyi nang nyid du thams cad zos te dong ngo / /khyed gnyis kyis dge slong gang
dag khrid de 'ongs/ drug sde dag go /'phags pa gnyis/ khyed gnyis rgya mtsho chen por dong nas nor bu mching bu dag khyer te 'ongs so/ /de na dge slong gzhan dag med dam/ ci na drug sde
dag khrid de 'ongs/ de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni/ tshig go /bram ze'i tshul ni/ tshig ste/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag gi dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag tu bcom mo/ /
zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis dbyar
gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgos pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul
dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma
bzhin no/ /'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed par dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong
rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed par dbyar gyi nang du 'god par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar
mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong ma skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi dang
chos sbyin gnyis las skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi ni/ spong ba ma/ 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin la/ chos sbyin ni/ mdo sde'i mtha' pa/ 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang ldan
pa yin te/ de gnyis dbyar khang gcig tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas gang gi tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na chos sbyin gyis rang gi
'khor la/ nu mo dag/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen
mo go'u ta mi la brten pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni/ bsod nams mang du bskyed par byed do/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ khyed cag kyang re zhig mi rtag

pa nyid yid la bya ba sgoms shig /ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgom par rtsom mo/ /gang gi tshe chos sbyin gyi 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na skye
rgu'i bdag mo go'u ta mi yang rang gi 'khor la/ nu mo dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyod pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag
gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad/ sems can la phan pa'i rgyu yin la/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni/ bsod nams mang po skyed par byed do/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ khyed cag kyang re zhig mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton gyis
shig /ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton byed par rtsom mo/ /dge slong ma dag /de ltar phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge
ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/ chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin no/ /chos sbyin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas des yo byad thams cad kyis de mgron du bos so/ /dus gzhan
zhig na dge bsnyen sa ga chos sbyin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / chos sbyin gyis de la smras pa/ bzhin bzang / dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar khang gcig tu dbyar gnas
par khas blangs pa de dag phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/ chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin du gyur na/ khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar
khang byed du 'jug nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag la kaR+sha pa Na dag ni/ mchis na/ sa gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba mdzod cig dang / der bdag gis
dbyar khang bgyid du stsal to/ /dge slong ma chos sbyin btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/ 'phags ma byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /'phags
ma sku don ci zhig gi slad du byon/ bdag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal na/ sa gzhi rgyal po mnga' bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /'phags
ma khyod bzhud cig dang / bdag gis 'phags ma'i slad du lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /chos sbyin song ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste/

des smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags ma chos sbyin byon par gyur pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de ci'i slad du byon/ de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid du stsol bar bzhed
na/ dog sa rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad du rgyal po la gsol bar bgyid ces mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'phags ma chos sbyin re zhig gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs
la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go /gal te mi bzhed na/ gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag go/ btsun mo phreng ldan mas chos sbyin la lhas 'phags ma la dam pa
gsol te/ gal te 'phags ma chos sbyin gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go /gal te mi bzhed
na| gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsal la rag ces byung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /chos byin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag la dam pa
byin te/ gal te 'phags ma chos sbyin re zhig gnas 'di nyid bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go /gal te mi bzhed na/ gang du dgyes
pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsal la rag ces byung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang / rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod
pa las/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom dmag gi gnas su song ba dang / de dag gi chung ma rnams skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pas phyogs de go skabs dben par
gyur nas/ chos sbyin gyis smras pa/ phyogs 'dir dbyar khang byed du chug cig /dge bsnyen sa gas phyogs der dbyar khang byed du bcug nas/ dge slong ma rnams kyi der gnas par brtsams
so| |ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ongs te/ de dag gis chung ma de dag bkug cing bkug cing brdeg par brtsams pa dang / srang dag na de dag ngu ba'i sgra rta'i skad dang /
glang po che'i skad lta bu'i skad mthon po dang skad chen po dag byung ngo / /dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag cag dgung char gyis 'jigs pas dang la kha'i 'og tu zhugs so/ /chos sbyin
gyis bsam pa/ 'di dag las/ kha cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod dam snyam du bsam na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag lus snyam du bsam na/ bdag nyid la rag lus par mthong nas des smras pa/
nu mo dag /gdul ba la ltos pas thams cad bzod par bya'o/ /chos sbyin gyis phyogs gcig tu gyo mo gsar pa bzhag ste dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/ nu mo dag /khyed cag gang la sder lhag
yod pa de thams cad gyo mo 'dir chug cig /de dag la sngar lhag ci yod pa de thams cad gyo mo der 'jug par byed do/ /de nas byis pa dag der 'ongs par gyur nas chos sbyin gyis de ni/ khye'u gang dag
yin pa de dag la ni/ 'bru mar byin nas gcig gis gcig gi mgo skud du bcug ste/ rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ bdag nyid kyi 'bru
mar gyis mgo bskus nas rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /byis pa de dag gis de dag khyer te rang rang gi khyim dag tu dong ba dang / de dag gi ma dag gis dris pa/ khyed cag la 'di
dag sus byin/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ma chos sbyin gyis so/ /chung ma de dag gis bsam pa/ don gyis na/ 'phags ma chos sbyin ni/ bdag cag la ma ma'i bya ba mdzad do/ /snyam du
rig nas de la mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dag gis bsam pa/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gis khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'dong ba de'i tshe na bdag
cag gis khyim thab dag bskyal nas 'phags ma chos sbyin la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'phags pa dang / chos sbyin
gyis de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba gsar pa'i byugs pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang /
me tog dang / pog phor bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / chung ma de dag kyang khyim thab dag bskyal te chos sbyin gyi drung du lhags nas chos sbyin gyis de dag la
'dag rdzas dang / lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog phor dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge
'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos sbyin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la
nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags
mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes rnams kyis
kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i
ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi
rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ 'phags ma bdag cag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /'phags ma/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun
la skyabs su mchi'i/ bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas khyim khyim du
dong ste khyim chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba gsar pa'i byugs pas bskus te spyod lam zhi bas 'khod do/ /de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas
nas phyir 'ongs pa na bsam pa/ bdag cag gi chung ma glang po che 'tsho ba'am/ ba lang rdzi'am/ su zhig dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed cing 'dug snyam mo/ /de dag gis bdag cag
gi khyim thab dag 'ongs zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bshes pa'i tshig gis rje'i sras dag /byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /zhes bsus nas de dag rang rang gi khyim du dong ba dang / de dag
rang rang gi chung ma dag gis bsku mnye dang dril phyi byas te khrus byas nas lag pas bskus te zas byin no/ /de dag gis bsam pa/ 'di dag gi spyod lam 'di lta bu ni/ sngon ma byung ngo / /snyam nas
de dag la dris pa/ bzang mo dag /khyod kyi spyod lam 'di lta bu 'di sngon ma byung ba yin na/ ci las gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ rje'i sras dag /'phags ma chos sbyin gyis bdag cag la ci nas
kyang bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba rnams slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag gis bsam pa/ 'phags ma chos sbyin ni/ ma
dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin te/ des 'di dag btul ba lta ste/ gang gi phyir bdag cag gis 'di dag gsad pa dang / bcing pa dang / brdeg pa dang / spyo bas gdul bar ma nus pa dag
'phags ma chos sbyin gyis chos bstan pas btul bas/ 'phags ma chos sbyin gyis bdag cag la phan btags kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po bltas te 'phags ma chos sbyin la bsnyen bkur bya'o//
snyam mo/ /chos sbyin gyis kyang de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par byugs/ lci ba gsar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang / chu dang / dri dang /

bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog phor dag bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang / de dag kyang rgyal po bltas nas chos sbyin gyi drung du lhags pa dang / chos sbyin gyis de dag
la 'dag rdzas dang / lag pa snyal ba'i chu dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / pog phor dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun

gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /chos sbyin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang

rang bzhin khong du chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan
par byas so/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu
ni| bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/
dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshegs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag
las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi
rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /'phags ma/ bdag cag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ 'phags ma/ bdag
cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'i/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas
skyabs su mchi'o/ /de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas yang smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag gis da ni/ srog chags grog sbur la yang bsam bzhin du srog 'gum pa'i rngo mi thogs
la| bdag cag ni/ mtshon chas 'tsho ba lags na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos sbyin gyis smras pa/ gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang / mda' mde'u med pa dang / shing gi ral gri
dag thogs shig /de dag gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang / mda' mde'u med pa dag dang / shing gi ral gri dag thogs so/ /gang gi tshe de dag gis bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na/ phyin chad rgyan po rtse
bar mi byed/ chang 'thung bar mi byed/ bud med gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed pas/ de dag longs spyod dag gis phyug pa dang / nye bar bsags par gyur to/ /de dag

gis glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang yongs su ma spyad pas/ tsho ba dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur to/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brag pa zhig log nas
der dmag ru zhig btang nas bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang / so sor bcom par gyur te phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa btang na/ de yang bcom pa dang / rab tu bcom pa dang /
so sor bcom par gyur te phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ ri brag pa'i dpung ni/ skyes shing / lha'i dpung ni/ nyams te/ gal te lha nyid der ma gshegs na/ ri
brag pa sgrub dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byas te nga'i yul na mtshon chas 'tsho ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad der 'gro bar bya'o/ /zhes bsgos nas rgyal po yang
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te chas so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang / rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom
gnyis yod pa las/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni/ mdun du 'gro ba'i mi yin la/ rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom ni/ phyi nas 'ong ba'i mi yin pas/ rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom mdun

du song ba'i mi dag tsho zhing / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang tsho zhing pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
blon po rnams la rmas pa/ shes ldan dag /khrom 'di gang gi yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom ral gri'i mthu can zhes bgyi ba mdun du mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos rgyab tu bltas pa dang /

ji tsam na rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom gyi mi dag rid pa dang / nyam chung pa dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob pa dang / de dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag kyang rid pa dang / nyam chung
ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang / lus ma thob par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di gang gi khrom yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i khrom rgyal rigs
bzang po zhes bgyi bslad bzhin mchi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci 'di dag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ dbang thang mnyam par
stsol to/ /de dag pos shig /de dag bos pa dang / rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/ lha/ mnyam par stsol to/ /'o na ci'i phyir ral gri mthu
can gyi khrom 'di dag ni/ 'byor pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur la/ rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom khyed ni/ rgud pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rke ba dang / skam pa dang /
lus ma thob par gyur/ lha/ gal te bdag cag kyang gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri dag thogs shing / mtshon cha dag btsongs shing btsongs
shing 'tshal bar gyur na/ bdag cag kyang 'byor pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / 'di dag gi glang po che dag dang / rta dag ni/ yongs su ma spyad la/
bdag cag gi rta dang / glang po che dag ni/ yongs su spyad do/ /rgyal pos de dag la rmas pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed de ltar gyur pa bden nam/ lha/ mad do/ /ci khyed cag nga der khrid la ri brag tu
gsad par 'dod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ ci lags/ mtshon chas g.yul sprod dam/ mis g.yul sprod/ rgyal pos spyos te smras pa/ gal te mtshon chas g.yul mi sprod na/ khyed
cag nyid dengs la ri brag pa de phob cig ces smras te/ rgyal po de nyid nas phyir log go /ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag chos sbyin gyi gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag
rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su bskos na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos sbyin gyis smras pa/ dengs shig dang khyed cag der song ba rnams la
nyes dmigs 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar/ gang dang gang du brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa ltos shig /nyi ma gang la ri brag bskor bar byed pa'i nyi ma de

la mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa gyis shig /de dag gis 'phags ma chos sbyin gyis smras pa la mngon
par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te 'phags nas de dag gang dang gang du brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa klog par byed cing / gang gi nyin mo ri brag bskor bar
byed pa de'i nyin mo mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon
chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa byas pa dang / de'i tshe na rgyal po chen po rnam
thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gnod sbyin rnams 'dul bar 'phags pa des/ yon bshad pa byed pa de thos nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi ming gis yon bshad pa byed pa 'di su zhig snyam nas ji tsam na
chos kyi spun dag gnas ma yin par bskos pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen la smras pa/ nga'i chos kyi spun 'di dag gnas ma yin par bskos kyi/ song la
ri brag de phab ste 'di dag la byin la/ srog chags 'ga' la yang mi gnod par gyis shig /gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas ri'i rtse mo lta

bu'i glang po che dag dang / rnga mo lta bu'i rta dang / gzhal med khang lta bu'i shing rta dag dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa lta bu'i mi dag mngon par sprul nas ri brag pa dag gis de dag thag ring po kho
na nas 'ongs pa mthong ngo / /de dag gis de dag mthong nas skrag ste bsam pa/ yul dang srog la gnod byung na/ /skyes bus kun tu srog bsrung bya/ /blo yis gnyi ga dpyad byas nas/ /yul ni
yang rnyed srog rnams min/ /snyam nas de dag gis ral gri mgul du btags te ri brag nas byung ba dang / de dag gis de dag bzung nas rgyu dpya dang bcas te mnyan yod du bdas nas ko sa lar
byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du dong ste smras pa/ lha/ ri brag pa ni/ 'di lags/ rgyu dpya ni/ 'di dag lags so/ rgyal po dga' nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyu dpya dag
khyed cag nyid khyer cig /de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag gson zhing lhags pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'phags ma chos sbyin gyi mthu yin pas/ bdag
cag dong la rgyu dpya 'di dag 'phags ma chos sbyin la dbul lo/ /snyam nas de dag gis de dag khyer te chos sbyin gyi gan du song nas smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag cag gson zhing lhags pa
dang / bdag cag gi dpal dang / skal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'phags ma kho na'i mthu lags kyi/ rgyal pos bdag cag la rgyu dpya stsal pa 'di
dag 'phags mas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ des smras pa/ bu dag /lha rnams kyi nang na yang lha dbul po yod kyi/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa
gyis shig dang / des khyed cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du yo byad
thams cad kyis spyan drangs nas de dag snga dro ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed/ phyi dro ni/ chos nyan par byed do// //'dul ba rnam
par 'byed pa/ bam po so drug pa/ dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ri brag pa gzhan zhig logs nas/ rgyal pos rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom la
bsgo ba/ deng la ri brag pa de phob cig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag ni/ rgud pa lags la/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni/ 'byor pa lags na/ 'di'i tshe de dag la bka' stsal cing /
bdag cag res gzhan la mchi bar ci gnang / rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo ba/ dengs la ri brag pa che ge mo zhig phob cig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis res 'khor
lags so/ /dengs shig dang res gzhan la mi gtang ngo / /de dag gis bsam pa/ de'i tshe ni/ bdag cag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brag pa de phab kyi/ da ni/
bdag cag gis de nyid du 'chi bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs pa de dag la chos gos dag phul te
'dong bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag chos gos dag thogs te gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su btang ste/ gal te
na bdag cag de nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis par 'gyur bas/ chos gos 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
pa dag /khyed cag gis bzhes te zhog la dgag dbye bgyis nas bgo bar mdzod cig /ces de dag gis de dag gnas khang du bcug ste dong ngo / /de dag 'phags
pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gar 'dong / khyim bdag /dmag gi gnas su mchi'o/ /khyed kyis res ma 'khor ram/ khyim bdag /
res 'khor ro/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'dong / lha'i zhal nas/ dengs shig dang res gzhan du mi gtong ngo / /zhes byung ngo / /kho bos lha la zhu'i/ de'i bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /de rgyal po'i gan
du song ste smras pa/ lhas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom gang du bka' stsal/ khyim bdag /ri brag pa che ge mo zhig log nas de 'bebs su'o/ lha/ de dag gis res ma 'khor ram/ khyim
bdag res 'khor ro/ /'o na ji slad du bka' stsal/ res gzhan du mi gtong bar byas so/ /ci lhas gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang / mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang / zhugs shing gi ral gri
thogs pa de dag gis ri brag pa dag mi phebs par mi mkhyen tam/ gzhan yang de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag ste/ de dag gis srog chags grog sgur la yang bsam bzhin
du srog 'gum pa'i rngo mi thogs so/ /'di ltar/ de'i tshe yang de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brag pa de phab bo/ /'di ltar/ de dag der mchis
su lags na/ nongs dmigs 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des lha la yang ma legs par 'gyur gor ma bkum mo/ /khyim bdag /ci/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag yin
nam| lha/ de lags te/ de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma chos sbyin la brten nas thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i
rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /deng phyin chad khyed kyi dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo bar bya'i/ ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo bar mi bya'o//
de nas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag phyir mkhos su phab nas dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i tshe dge slong de dag gis de dag gis gan du song ste smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /kho bo
cag dgag dbye byas kyi/ chos gos dag byin cig /'phags pa dag /bdag cag gis chos gos dag phul lags kyi/ de dag bzhes shig /dge slong de dag dong ste gnas khang sgo
phye ba dang / phyogs des snum zhing dngar bas chos gos de dag srin dag gis rmugs te rdul du brlags te 'dug par snang ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gos sbed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa ni/ bsko
bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gas 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs
pas 'gro ba dang / gos kyi rnyed pa sbas pa dang ma sbas pa mi shes pa'o/ /gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/
lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gos sbas pa dang ma sbas pa shes pa'o/ /'di ltar
bsko bar bya ste/ je dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro'am/ gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og
tu gnas mal bshams pa byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgos nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong
gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/
gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi
rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa
rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa
sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi
bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags
te| 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang / bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs
pa rnams dang / phri ba rnams dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / mdzes pa rnams dang / drod rig pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dag |de lta bas na/ snga ma ni/ bcas pa yin la/ 'di ni/ gnang ba yin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gis ston zla
tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na/ dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i
dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par 'chang na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di pas so/ /ston zla tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad
du zhes bya ba ni/ zhag bcu na dgag dbye 'byung ba tshun chad du'o/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig ces bya ba ni/ brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad pa
la sbyin pa dang / nad pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'chi ba la sbyin pa dang / shi ba'i phyir sbyin pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa'o/ /rnyed pa la zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las so/ /'dod na
zhes bya ba ni/ gal te don du gnyer na'o/ /dge slong des zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong gang yin pa nges so/ /gos de zhes bya ba ni/ bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i
gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ral bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdag gir bya ba'o/ /blangs
nas gos sbyin pa'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sba bar bya'o/ /dge slong gi gos sbyin pa'i dus ni/ gang yin/ dus ma yin pa ni/ gang yin zhe na/ sra brkyang ma bting
ba'i gnas ni/ ston zla tha chung nya tshun chad ni/ gos sbyin pa'i dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni/ dus yin no/ /sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni/ ston zla tha chung nya phan chad nas dpyid zla 'bring
po nya tshun chad ni/ dus ma yin la/ lhag ma ni/ dus yin no/ /de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni/ de las thal bar 'chang na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po
de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du dbyar gyi rnyed pa
dbyar gyi nang du bdag gir byed dam/ gos sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par 'chang na/ thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag bdag gir byed
pa dang / sbyin bdag gis rang gi lag nas sbyin par byed na/ ltung ba med do/ /gos sbed pa'i dge slong bskos pa dang / sbyin bdag 'ongs te 'phags pa dag bzhes shig dang / gos 'di
dag bdag mchis nas rang gi sug pa nyid las dbul lo/ /zhes zer ba la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba
med do/ /brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba ste/ nyi shu drug pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag cig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa/ nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste/ de
yang dad pa can/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas/ des dge 'dun la bsngos te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang / skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang /
lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go /gtsug lag khang der dge slong drug cus dbyar gnas dag byas te dong
nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gis khri'am/ khri'u dag ma brkus par gyis shig /ces srung ma'i mi bzhag go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan drug cu
ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brag der phyin nas bsti gnas rnyed par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang du mi gnas/ bzhin bzang /
gtsug lag khang ga la yod/ 'phags pa dag /dgon pa 'di na'o/ /dge slong dag der dong ba dang / srung ma'i mis mthong nas des/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen
bkur byas te gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba la sogs pa dag phul te/ spyangs tshags g.yar nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /re
zhig chab bcag par mdzod cig dang / de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o/ /zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /khyed kyi gtsug lag
khang du dge slong glo bur du lhags pa drug cu mchis so/ /khyim bdag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong gi dge 'dun
byon pa de dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par bya'i/ /bu ram dang / hwags dang / li kha ra dang / rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u longs shig ces khyim bdag des legs par sbyar ba'i
btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / dge slong dag kyang chu btsags te rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod do/ /khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po kho nas mthong ste/ des
gtsug lag khang de mtsho pad+mas gang ba bzhin du mthong nas rgya cher dad pa'i shugs kyis bsgrubs pa'i rgyud kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ grong ngam yang na dgon pa'ang rung / /gshong ngam yang
na thang yang rung / gang na 'os pa gnas pa yi/ /sa gzhi de ni dga' byed yin/ /de nas legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sta gon byas te rang gi lag nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de tshim par byas nas
rang nyid kyis spog phor thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug go /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan
gyis yon bshad nas/ khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te sang bdag gi sdum par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar ci
gnang zhes smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis kyang dang du blangs nas khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /khyim bdag des phyi de nyin par zas bsod pas dge slong dag
tshim par byas shing / dus ma yin par yang btung ba blud nas/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan to/ /phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang /
khyim bdag de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag gi gtsug lag khang 'di/ bdag nyid kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal/ nye du rnams kyi slad du yang
bgyid du ma stsal gyi/ 'di ltar/ 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du bgyid du stsal pa lags kyi/ 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes shig dang / bdag gis 'phags pa rnams
la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /mnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing / dus dang dus su dge
slong che ge mo zhig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/ che ge mo zhig gis ni/ mi sdug pa grub bo/ /zhes shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang thos par 'gyur/ rgyal po yang bstan pa
la shin tu dad/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma dang / gzhan
yang dad pa can mang du yod pas der zang zing gi longs spyod dang / chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang 'grub pas/ bdag cag de nyid du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag /chos kyi longs spyod ni/ 'phags
pa dag nyid la rag las pa lags kyi/ zang zing gi longs spyod ni/ bdag la rag las pa lags pas/ dgyes pa skyed cig dang / cung zad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas
brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa can gyi dad pa spel bar bya zhing / sbyin bdag la rjes su snying brtse bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ 'di nyid du 'khod par
bya'o| |zhes de dag der 'khod nas blo brtan pas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas par so sor brtag par brtsams pa dang / gtsug lag khang de me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum
tshogs pa/ shin tu dga' bar mthong nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gtsug lag khang 'di/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
pa| shin tu dga' ba yin pas/ gal te bdag cag gis 'dir dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blangs nas me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad yongs su spyad par mi gyur gyi/ bdag cag gis
nges par dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/ /khyim bdag de la gtsug
lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas sbyin pa dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brag de na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan
med pas ri brag pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin par byed do/ /ri brag de'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan
med pas/ ri brag gi nye 'khor pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas/ der dbyar gnas par khas
blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo / /ston zla tha chung gi g.yon can dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus te bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na/
des btsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing / bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/ /de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong 'di
dag gzhom par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni/ sgo 'phar brgya rnyed bda' bar byas kyang lto khengs pa 'grub par dga' bas/ de dag la ci yang med
na| bdag cag ci'i phyir yun de srid du bsdad par bya/ de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pas smras pa/ khyed ci shes/ de dag la mang du yod do/ /ji ltar re zhig gtsug lag khang
'di gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag de ni/ dad pa can/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can yin la/ khyim bdag de la yang gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas/ de sbyin
pa dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brag 'di na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas/ ri brag 'di dag kyang sbyin pa
dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/ /ri brag 'di'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brag gi nye 'khor
pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang / bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas/ 'dir dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams
la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo / /gal te yid mi ches na/ song la ltos shig dang / rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na/ khyed nyid ji song la mngon sum du gyis shig dang /
kho bo cag phyis 'ong ngo / /des smras pa/ legs kyi/ de bzhin gyis shig dang / kho bo 'gro'o/ /zhes de gos tshags bcos te 'phags shing / de nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang der zhugs so/ /ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs can de 'dug nas g.yon can des de'i rkang pa la phyag
'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ bzhin bzang / khyim bdag che go mo
zhig gi yin no/ /'phags pa/ ci/ 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzang / gtsug lag khang ni/ ji lta bu yin/ phongs pa ni/ ji lta bu
yin| 'phags pa/ gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni/ gtsug lag khang lags so/ /gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni/ phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / 'o na 'di ni/ gtsug
lag khang yin gyi/ phongs pa ma yin te/ 'di na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yod kyi/ 'di na yo byad med pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa/ zas za ba ni/ 'ga' yang rdul mi za la/
gos dag gyon pa ni/ 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas/ khyed cag la gos cung zad ma mchis sam/ rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas/ des g.yon can de'i
lag nas bzung ste gnas khang du bcug nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / gos kyi rdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos/ 'phags pa/ ci/ 'di khyod kyi lags sam/ 'on te
dge 'dun gyi lags/ bzhin bzang / 'di kho bo gang zag gi yin no/ /'phags pa/ 'o na khyod ni/ gor ma bkum par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam/ chos sgrog pa zhig lags so/ /bzhin
bzang / kho bo ni/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la/ chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ kho bo ni/ dge 'dun gyi gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no/ /'phags pa/ de ni/ 'jal
na| 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad ma mchis sam/ bzhin bzang / mang du yod do/ /re zhig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos po bdun po dag thob bo/ /'phags pa/ de yang 'jal gyi/ 'di
zhu'o/ /gtsug lag khang 'di na gang la la 'tshal ma bgyid na/ de rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshod dam/ 'on te zangs mi'i snod du 'tshod/ bzhin bzang / khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam/ 'phags
pa| mthong ngo / /bzhin bzang / gnas khang 'di dag zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug go /g.yon can des bsam pa/ legs par bris zin gyi/ da ni/ 'gro'o/ /snyam nas g.yon can des smras pa/
'phags pa/ khyod kyis dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams pa ni/ bdag gi don yongs su nyams pa lags bas bdag slad kyis kyang mchi yi/ de ni/ mchi'o/ /bzhin bzang / de bzhin gyis shig /g.yon can

des rgan zhugs de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas g.yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi drung du song ste smras pa/ pad+ma'i mig can dag /rdzas thams cad kyis gang ba'i grub bo che skam sa la 'dug gi/ 'phrog
cig /'phrog cig /de na gcig gis smras pa/ de na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug cu po dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grags pas/ de bzhin du gzhom
par mi nus kyi/ gang gi tshe de dag mtshan mo chos nyan pa de'i tshe gzhom mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ nyi ma gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ des smras pa/ tshes brgyad dang /
bcu bzhi la 'byung ste/ de la tshes brgyad ni/ thal zin pas tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag sor mo dag gis nyi ma bgrang zhing 'khod nas/ ji tsam na tshes bcu bzhi la bab ste/ dge
'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong byas nas chos sgrog bseng ge'i khri la 'dzeg ste 'di skad ces/ mi mchog gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur mdzad pa/ /
kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin gshegs/ /dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas/ /mnyan yod bzhugs pas bka' bzhin byed la gsungs/ /zhes smra bar brtsams pa dang / g.yon
can de dag gis sgo brdungs so/ /dge slong dag gis tshor nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag su yin/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go/ dge slong rnams kyis bsam pa/ ri brag

nas skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gi/ sgo dbye'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhugs so/ /ji tsam na gzhom par brtsams pa dang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan
dag /khyed cag na re/ bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go /zhes zer na/ da nged cag 'joms par byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag la ming gnyis mchis te/ slad rol du ni/

rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la/ nang du ni/ chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o/ /khyed cag gi ming 'dogs par byed pa ni/ nyams so/ /g.yon can de dag gis dge slong de dag bcom ste dong nas dge slong bcom pa de dag

gis gros byas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzhom par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang
ci bya/ bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/ bdag cag mnyan yod nyid du dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis/ chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
gros byas so/ /ji ltar 'dong bar bya/ mtshan mo 'gebs par 'dong zhing / nyin mo thibs por zhugs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo / /ji tsam na mthar gyis

mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong dag /nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam yo na rgyu ba mthong nas
smras pa/ gcer bu sgre byi dag/ khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod/ 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la/ 'dug gnas kyang ma yin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag cag gcer bu dag
ma yin no/ /'o na khyed su yin/ dge slong dag go/ 'di lta bu dag dge slong yin nam/ gang dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin/ khyed cag ming ci/ sangs
rgyas 'tsho'o/ /chos 'tsho'o/ /dge 'dun 'tsho'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste/ de dag la la las ni/
chos gos byin/ la las ni/ sham thabs byin/ la las ni/ rdul gzan byin/ la las ni/ lhung bzed byin/ la las ni/ chu tshags byin te bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du thams
cad bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dgon pa pas/ chos gos gsum
las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag
de nyid du dong ste nyal bar byed pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed cag ci'i slad du 'dir gzims par mdzad/ kho bo cag gis chos gos dag 'dir bzhag
go| 'phags pa dag /ci/ khyed kyi chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/ gal te thugs mi ches na/ bsnams te bzhud cig /ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der nyal bar mi bya'o/ /de dag phyir dong ste skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang / bud med kyi yul sgren mor nyal ba de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed cag
ci'i slad du mtshan mo nyid la 'dir byon/ /kho bo cag gis 'dir chos gos dag bzhag go/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ khyed cag gis chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/ gal te thugs mi ches na/ bsnams
te bzhud cig /ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der skya rengs 'char bar mi bya'o/ /de dag phyis dong ste bang rim

du skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang / de dag chom rkun pa dag dang / g.yon can dag dang / seng ge dag dang / stag dag dang / gung dag gi dbang du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang nyid du skya rengs 'char bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams la dge 'dun gyi dang / mchod rten gyi dang / gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir mtshams
kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos par gyur pa de dag bdag cag gis khyim gzhan du chos gos dag bzhag go/ zhes der mi 'gro ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o/ /dge slong drug sde dag bsam bzhin du zhag bdun du 'bral bar byed
pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi
dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag /ngas dgon pa bas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o/ /zhes
